translated: “The wise one should always

analyzed: mchod pa sna tshogs pa'i rgya mtsho brtsam par bya zhing bya ba la 'jug par bya'o //

analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po de nyid spros te bstan par bya ba'i phyir /

analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /

original: byang chub 'dod pas te //
analyzed: byang chub 'dod pas te //

original: dri ma'i rnyog pa thams cad 'khrud pas /
analyzed: dri ma'i rnyog pa thams cad 'khrud pas /

analyzed: ye shes skyed par byed pa'i phyir byang chub ste dbang bskur ba'o //

analyzed: de 'dod cing 'dun pas mchod par bya'o //

analyzed: mchod pa rnam pa lnga ni me tog la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: des mchod pas na mchod pa rnam pa lnga'o //

analyzed: de rnams kyi mchog ni shin tu phul du byung bas so //

analyzed: lha rnams dang bla ma'i thun mong gi mchod pa bstan nas /

analyzed: bla ma'i khyad par gyi mchod pa bstan pa'i phyir /

analyzed: rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

analyzed: rin chen ni 'khor pa ji srid par gnas pa /

analyzed: mchog tu zag pa med pa'i bde ba chen po de bskyed pa'i zhing du gyur pas 'byung gnas so //

analyzed: na chung ni lang tsho ma nyams pa'o //

analyzed: mchog ni bud med kyi yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa'i padma can no //

analyzed: rin chen sna tshogs mchog gis brgyan //

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: rin po che dpag tu med pa tha dang pa dang / gos dang / dri dang / byug pa la sogs pas brgyan pa ste /

analyzed: de lta bu'i bu mo yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs can dbul par bya'o // ci'i @62a * //

original: phyir zhe na /
analyzed: phyir zhe na /

analyzed: sgrub tshe rab tu 'grub pa'i phyir //

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is said.

original: bsgrub cing bskyed pa yin pas na sgrub pa ste /
analyzed: bsgrub cing bskyed pa yin pas na sgrub pa ste /
translated: Since it is accomplished and generated, it is the practice.

original: 'bras bu tha mal pa'o //
analyzed: 'bras bu tha mal pa'o //

analyzed: rab tu 'grub ba ni khyad par can 'grub pa ste /

original: gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is it?

analyzed: sangs rgyas nyid de 'di 'grub pa'i phyir zhes pa ni 'grub pa'i rgyur dbul bar bya'o //

analyzed: sangs rgyas kun la dbul bar bya //

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: Here,

original: de la dbul zhing rab tu bstan par bya'o //
analyzed: de la dbul zhing rab tu bstan par bya'o //

analyzed: bla ma la khyad par can gyi rdzas dbul bar bya ba'i don du /

analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

analyzed: de ltar slob man mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad bstabs nas /

analyzed: bla mas ci zhig bya zhe na /

analyzed: bdag po'i phyag rgyar zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [The guru] should perform the consecration of the secret place, and so on, with the master’s mudra.

analyzed: ji ltar rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i phyag rgya chen po gang yin pa der mnyam par bzhag nas /

analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis blang bar bya'o //

original: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu //
translated: In the middle of the buddha maṇḍala,

original: zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zhes pa ni /
translated: means

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo'i dbus su'o //
translated: in the middle of the maṇḍala of the tathāgatas.

original: 'dod chags ni bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags ni bde ba chen po'o //
translated: Attachment is great bliss.

original: gang gi blo der 'jug pa de dang ldan pa ni 'dod chags blo can te /
analyzed: gang gi blo der 'jug pa de dang ldan pa ni 'dod chags blo can te /
translated: One who has a mind that engages in that is one who has an attached mind.

original: 'dod chags kyi blo can de rnams kyi sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi blo can de rnams kyi sangs rgyas te /
translated: Those who have an attached mind are buddhas.

original: de bzhin @62b gshegs pa rnams la reg pa'i sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin @62b gshegs pa rnams la reg pa'i sbyor ba ste /
translated: They should be given the application of contact with the tathāgatas.

original: reg rdo rje las byung ba'i bde ba dbul par bya'o //
analyzed: reg rdo rje las byung ba'i bde ba dbul par bya'o //
translated: They should be given the bliss that arises from the vajra of contact.

original: de yang ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: de yang ji ltar zhe na /
translated: And how is that?

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: It is said, “in the realm of space,” and so on.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings ni nam mkha' ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ni nam mkha' ste /
translated: The realm of space is space.

original: de'i dbus na gnas par dkyil 'khor bkod pa bsgom pa bsgom par bya zhing bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i dbus na gnas par dkyil 'khor bkod pa bsgom pa bsgom par bya zhing bsam par bya'o //
translated: In the center of that, one should meditate on the mandala array, which is the abode.

original: de ltar bsams nas /
analyzed: de ltar bsams nas /
translated: Having contemplated in that way,

original: gzugs kyi phung po la sos par gyur pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi sku sprul pa'i sku 'dzin par bya ba'i phyir gzhug par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung po la sos par gyur pa'i rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi sku sprul pa'i sku 'dzin par bya ba'i phyir gzhug par bya'o //
translated: in order to take up the emanation body, whose nature is the pristine awareness body of Vairochana and so forth, which is the purification of the aggregate of form, one should enter.

original: de nas bdag gi lus rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi lug de bzhin gshegs pa ste /🔽rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phra rab las yongs su bskyed par byas la /
analyzed: de nas bdag gi lus rdo rje 'chang chen po'i ngo bo nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi lug de bzhin gshegs pa ste / rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phra rab las yongs su bskyed par byas la /
translated: Then, one’s body, which is the nature of Great Vajradhara, is the self, the Tathagata,🔽who is produced from the atoms of all the Tathagatas, Vairochana and so forth.

original: bla ma la bshad pa ste /🔽yul dang / gci ba ste /
analyzed: bla ma la bshad pa ste / yul dang / gci ba ste /
translated: One should please the guru with offerings of the objects and the faculties.

original: dbang po yin pas na /
analyzed: dbang po yin pas na /
translated: The objects are the objects of form and so forth, and the faculties are the faculties of the eyes and so forth.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul dang dbang po rnams kyis bla ma la mchod cing rjed pas tshim par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i yul dang dbang po rnams kyis bla ma la mchod cing rjed pas tshim par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, one should please the guru with offerings of the objects of form and so forth and the faculties of the eyes and so forth.

original: mchod pa de nyid ni bzhin bzang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston te /
analyzed: mchod pa de nyid ni bzhin bzang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ston te /
translated: That very offering is taught by “beautiful-faced” and so forth.

original: bzhin bzang zhes pa ni dga' bas sems rab tu dang ba'i yid tshim par byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: bzhin bzang zhes pa ni dga' bas sems rab tu dang ba'i yid tshim par byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: “ Beautiful-faced” is the satisfaction of the mind with a clear, delighted mind.

original: yid du 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: yid du 'ong ba'o //
translated: It is pleasing.

original: na chung ni slob mas bstabs pa'o //
analyzed: na chung ni slob mas bstabs pa'o //
translated: “ Young” is the offering of the disciple.

original: byin gyi rlabs kyi gnas bsams te /
analyzed: byin gyi rlabs kyi gnas bsams te /
translated: Having imagined the place of consecration,

original: lhag par gnas pas na byin gyis rlob pa ste /
analyzed: lhag par gnas pas na byin gyis rlob pa ste /
translated: it is consecrated by the consecration of the special place.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is Vairochana and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi gnas ni yi ge aom la sogs pa'i sa bon rnams te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi gnas ni yi ge aom la sogs pa'i sa bon rnams te /
translated: Their place is the seed syllables such as the syllable OṀ.

original: de phyag rgya'i lus la gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bsam zhing rnam par dgod pas /
analyzed: de phyag rgya'i lus la gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bsam zhing rnam par dgod pas /
translated: Having imagined them in the body of the consort just as they are situated,

original: rigs lngas byin gyis brlab pa byas la sangs rgyas mchod pa ste /
analyzed: rigs lngas byin gyis brlab pa byas la sangs rgyas mchod pa ste /
translated: one should imagine the consecration by the five families and make offerings to the buddhas.

original: de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can rab tu brtag cing byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid can rab tu brtag cing byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine and consecrate the offering of reality, which is characterized by meditative equipoise.

original: 'di nyid ni phyi'i mchod pa la ltos nas de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: 'di nyid ni phyi'i mchod pa la ltos nas de kho na nyid kyi mchod pa zhes bya ste /
translated: This is called the offering of reality in dependence on the external offering.

original: chags pa dang chags pa dang bral ba dang chags pa bar ma'i rim gyis /
analyzed: chags pa dang chags pa dang bral ba dang chags pa bar ma'i rim gyis /
translated: By the process of passion, absence of passion, and intermediate passion,

original: nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas mngon sum du byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: one actualizes the state of the purification of the afflictions.

original: mig bzang ste bud med kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mig bzang ste bud med kyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The “good eye” is the female consort.

original: brten pa'i blo ldan pa sti /
analyzed: brten pa'i blo ldan pa sti /
translated: The “steadfast one” is the bodhisattva.🔽Having taken the seminal essence with the thought of the eye of enlightenment,

original: byang chub las mig yo ba'i bsam pas khu ba blangs nas te snyoms par 'jug pa'i mchod pa'i 'og tu /🔽padma la gnas pa'i byang chub kyi @63a * //
analyzed: byang chub las mig yo ba'i bsam pas khu ba blangs nas te snyoms par 'jug pa'i mchod pa'i 'og tu / padma la gnas pa'i byang chub kyi @63a * //
translated: that is, after the offering of union,🔽one should take the bodhicitta

original: sems blangs la bza' bar bya ste /
analyzed: sems blangs la bza' bar bya ste /
translated: that is located in the lotus and eat it.

original: slob ma la bla mas byin pa 'dis rang gi lus la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tshim par bya'o zhes bsams nas bza' bar bya zhing spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: slob ma la bla mas byin pa 'dis rang gi lus la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad tshim par bya'o zhes bsams nas bza' bar bya zhing spyad par bya'o //
translated: One should eat it, thinking, “With this given by the guru to the disciple, I will satisfy all tathāgatas residing in my body.”

original: bla mas kyang byang chub kyi sems dung phor la sogs par bzhag la /
analyzed: bla mas kyang byang chub kyi sems dung phor la sogs par bzhag la /
translated: The guru should also place the bodhicitta in a conch shell and so on.

original: di'i chu dang bsres la bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas slob ma la dbang bskur bar bya ste /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du /
analyzed: di'i chu dang bsres la bkra shis kyi tshigs su bcad pa la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas slob ma la dbang bskur bar bya ste / bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du /
translated: Mixing this with water, one should confer initiation on the disciple, preceded by the verse of auspiciousness.

original: zla gsang thig le las /
analyzed: zla gsang thig le las /
translated: The Lord has said in the Candragarbha-tilaka:

original: byang chub sems ni rin chen 'bar phyung bas //
analyzed: byang chub sems ni rin chen 'bar phyung bas //
translated: The bodhicitta is the blazing jewel,

original: ma lus rgyal ba rnams ni lus skams la //
analyzed: ma lus rgyal ba rnams ni lus skams la //
translated: which dries up the bodies of all the Victors,

original: rnam dag rdo rje las byung ye shes chu //
analyzed: rnam dag rdo rje las byung ye shes chu //
translated: the water of intuition arisen from the pure vajra,

original: dri med rin chen spyir dbab dbang bskur ro //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: dri med rin chen spyir dbab dbang bskur ro // zhes gsungs so //
translated: the initiation is conferred by the descent of the stainless jewel.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni gang bshad ma thag pa'i mchod pa bstan pas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba ste /
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni gang bshad ma thag pa'i mchod pa bstan pas gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba ste /
translated: This is the secret initiation, which has just been explained as the offering.

original: de ni sngags rnams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'brel bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de ni sngags rnams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'brel bar gyur pa'o //
translated: It is the mantra of all the Tathagatas, which is connected with all the Tathagatas.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa ste // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is the offering of body, speech, and mind.

original: mi 'jigs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs bskyed pas so //
analyzed: mi 'jigs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs bskyed pas so //
translated: It is the generation of the fearless body, speech, and mind.

original: ye shes rdo rje can ni slob bzhin pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje can ni slob bzhin pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: The vajra of pristine consciousness belongs to the yogins who are in training.

original: gsang ba ni bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa la zhugs pa rnams la gsang ba yin pas so //🔽sngags kyi dngos grub byed pa zhes pa la /
analyzed: gsang ba ni bya ba'i rgyud la sogs pa la zhugs pa rnams la gsang ba yin pas so // sngags kyi dngos grub byed pa zhes pa la /
translated: The secret is secret for those who have entered the Action Tantra, etc.🔽The accomplishment of mantras means

original: sngags ni 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub rab tu ster bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: sngags ni 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub rab tu ster bar byed pa ste /
translated: mantras bestow mundane accomplishments.

original: a'a li dang k'a li las byung ba ste /
analyzed: a'a li dang k'a li las byung ba ste /
translated: They arise from the vowels and consonants.

original: sbrul zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngags so //
analyzed: sbrul zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngags so //
translated: The mantras are the mantras beginning with nāga and so forth.

original: de rnams kyi dngos grub ni mtshang pa med pa'i dngos grub skyed pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dngos grub ni mtshang pa med pa'i dngos grub skyed pa'o //
translated: Their accomplishment is the generation of infallible accomplishment.

original: de byed pas na sngags rnams dngos grub byed pa ste /
analyzed: de byed pas na sngags rnams dngos grub byed pa ste /
translated: Because they do that, the mantras are accomplishers of accomplishments.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is the literal meaning explanation.🔽In the commentary that elucidates the Lamp

original: sgron ma gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa las /
analyzed: sgron ma gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa las /
translated: of the middle way,

original: le'u brgyad pa mtha' drug gis bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u brgyad pa mtha' drug gis bshad pa'o /
translated: the eighth chapter is explained by the six limits.

original: // / dbang bskur ba rdzogs pas rmad du byung ba'i bya bas kyang byang chub bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: // / dbang bskur ba rdzogs pas rmad du byung ba'i bya bas kyang byang chub bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that one should also accomplish enlightenment through the performance of the marvelous deeds by the completion of the consecration,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “Then, all space,” and so on.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i 'og tu'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur ba'i 'og tu'o //
translated: “ Then” means after the secret consecration.

original: thams cad nam mkha' zhes pa ni /🔽nam mkha' bzhi'i bdag nyid can gyis na thams cad nam mkha'i ste /
analyzed: thams cad nam mkha' zhes pa ni / nam mkha' bzhi'i bdag nyid can gyis na thams cad nam mkha'i ste /
translated: “ All space” is all space.

original: bcom ldan 'das so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das so //
translated: The Bhagavān is the nature of the four spaces.

original: de nyid kyis na mi 'gyur che'o //🔽thams cad dbang bskur zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na mi 'gyur che'o // thams cad dbang bskur zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Therefore, he is “the great unchanging.”

original: bya ba'i rgyud la sogs par @63b rab tu zhugs pa rnams kyi dbang bskur ba'i spyod pa thams cad do //
analyzed: bya ba'i rgyud la sogs par @63b rab tu zhugs pa rnams kyi dbang bskur ba'i spyod pa thams cad do //
translated: “ All consecrations” are all the consecrations of the conduct of those who have entered into the Action Tantra, and so on.

original: de rnams kyi steng na gnas pas na thams cad dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog go //🔽dbang phyug dam pa kun don gyis //
analyzed: de rnams kyi steng na gnas pas na thams cad dbang bskur spyod pa'i mchog go // dbang phyug dam pa kun don gyis //
translated: Since he is situated above them all, he is “the supreme of all consecrations.”

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: “ The supreme lord of all aims,” and so on.

original: dngos grub 'dod pa thams cad kyis don du gnyer zhing gsol ba 'debs pas na kun don gyis te rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: dngos grub 'dod pa thams cad kyis don du gnyer zhing gsol ba 'debs pas na kun don gyis te rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
translated: Since all who desire powers seek and pray to him, he is the aim of all, that is, Vairochana and so on.

original: de rnams kyi dbang phyug dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa drug pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dbang phyug dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa drug pa ste /
translated: The best lord of those is the sixth transcendent lord.

original: de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje gsum mi phyed pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje gsum mi phyed pa'i dkyil 'khor bshad do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: The Blessed One, who is such, expounds the mandala of the three indivisible vajras, that is, the mandala of the three vajras that are not differentiated.

original: sku gsung thugs la longs spyod pa //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs la longs spyod pa // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The enjoyment of body, speech, and mind,

original: bdag nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi longs spyod la dkyil 'khor gang du nye bar longs spyod par mdzad pa de ni sku gsung thugs la longs spyod pa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi longs spyod la dkyil 'khor gang du nye bar longs spyod par mdzad pa de ni sku gsung thugs la longs spyod pa'o //
translated: is the mandala in which the enjoyment of one's own body, speech, and mind is enjoyed.

original: rdo rje mi phyed gsum ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mi phyed gsum ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
translated: The three indivisible vajras are Vairochana and so on.

original: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni shin tu rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //🔽sangs rgyas ye shes can gyis gsang //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni shin tu rmad du byung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro // sangs rgyas ye shes can gyis gsang //
translated: Their mandala is the very wonderful mandala.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The secret of the buddhas, the possessor of intuition,🔽is the secret of the buddhas, the transcendent lords, the possessors of intuition.

original: shin tu mchog tu gyur pas rin po che lta bu'i gang zag gi yul yin gyi /
analyzed: shin tu mchog tu gyur pas rin po che lta bu'i gang zag gi yul yin gyi /
translated: Since it is extremely sublime, it is the domain of the jewel-like person.

original: mdo sde theg pa la sogs par sangs rgyas kyi mu stegs can rnams skrag par byed pas ma gsungs pas so //
analyzed: mdo sde theg pa la sogs par sangs rgyas kyi mu stegs can rnams skrag par byed pas ma gsungs pas so //
translated: It is not taught in the sutra vehicle, etc., because it would frighten the tirthikas.

original: rnam pa de lta bu 'jig rten dang 'gal pa'i tshig gi sgo nas byang chub thob pa'i thabs bshad do zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu 'jig rten dang 'gal pa'i tshig gi sgo nas byang chub thob pa'i thabs bshad do zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The method for attaining enlightenment is explained by means of words that are contrary to the world in this way.

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
translated: This is literal.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
translated: In the center of the realm of space,

original: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya // zhes bya ba la /
translated: one should meditate on the mandala of the buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku'o //🔽rdo rje mi bskyod rab bsgoms nas //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku'o // rdo rje mi bskyod rab bsgoms nas // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The mandala of the buddhas is the body of Great Vajradhara.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las mi bskyod pa bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las mi bskyod pa bskyed pa'o //
translated: Having meditated on Akṣobhya,

original: lag tu rdo rje bsgom par bya //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: lag tu rdo rje bsgom par bya // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: one should meditate on the vajra in the hand.

original: phyag mtshan gyi gtso bo bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: phyag mtshan gyi gtso bo bshad pa yin te /
translated: This explains the principal hand implement.

original: phyag mtshan gzhan dag kyang dgag pa ni med do //
analyzed: phyag mtshan gzhan dag kyang dgag pa ni med do //
translated: There is no prohibition of other hand implements.

original: 'od 'phro ba ni 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba ste /
analyzed: 'od 'phro ba ni 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba ste /
translated: Radiance is the emission of light rays.

original: de rnams kyis mang por gyur pa dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis mang por gyur pa dang ldan pa'o //
translated: He is endowed with many of them.

original: de nyid kyis na 'bar ba dang dkar po la sogs pa'i 'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang ba'i rdo rje bsgom par byas la /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na 'bar ba dang dkar po la sogs pa'i 'od zer sna lngas rab tu gang ba'i rdo rje bsgom par byas la /
translated: By that very [reasoning], one should meditate on the vajra filled with the five light rays of blazing white light, and so forth.

original: 'dis khams gsum du byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bsgoms nas /
analyzed: 'dis khams gsum du byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bsgoms nas /
translated: Having meditated on the Tathagatas arisen in the three realms,

original: rdo rjes phye mar brlags pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rjes phye mar brlags pa ste /
translated: the vajra pulverizes them.

original: de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi longs @64a * //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi longs @64a * //
translated: The assembly of the enjoyments of the body, speech, and mind of those [Tathagatas]

original: spyod kyi tshogs rdo rje des phye mar brlags la nus pa med cing 'jig par gyur par bsgom ste /
analyzed: spyod kyi tshogs rdo rje des phye mar brlags la nus pa med cing 'jig par gyur par bsgom ste /
translated: is pulverized by that vajra, and one should meditate on them as powerless and destroyed.

original: de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i bsam gtan gyi mchog de bsgoms pas ni /🔽thugs kyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i bsam gtan gyi mchog de bsgoms pas ni / thugs kyi dngos grub 'thob par 'gyur pa ste /
translated: By meditating on that supreme concentration just explained,🔽one will attain the spiritual power of the mind.

original: sems kyi dbang phyug 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sems kyi dbang phyug 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: One will attain mastery of the mind.

original: rdo rje gsang pa 'di lta bus /
analyzed: rdo rje gsang pa 'di lta bus /
translated: By this kind of secret vajra,

original: sems can thams cad gsad cing stong par byas pas rnam par gzhig par bya'o //🔽bsam gtan gyi khyad par 'di lta bus rnam par bshig na mi bskyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyal ba'i sras te /
analyzed: sems can thams cad gsad cing stong par byas pas rnam par gzhig par bya'o // bsam gtan gyi khyad par 'di lta bus rnam par bshig na mi bskyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyal ba'i sras te /
translated: All sentient beings are to be killed and emptied, and thus destroyed.🔽If one destroys with this kind of special meditative stabilization, one is born as a son of the Victor, a bodhisattva, in the Akṣobhya Buddha-field.

original: byang chub sems dpar skye bar 'gyur ba 'di ni zhe sdang gi rigs kyi dam tshig de kho na'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpar skye bar 'gyur ba 'di ni zhe sdang gi rigs kyi dam tshig de kho na'o //
translated: This is the commitment of the family of anger.🔽Here, it is said:

original: 'dir gang zhig gcig pu gsang ba la //
analyzed: 'dir gang zhig gcig pu gsang ba la //
translated: If one is alone, it is secret;

original: mang po mya ngan 'das 'gyur te //
analyzed: mang po mya ngan 'das 'gyur te //
translated: if many, it is nirvana.

original: bsod nams phung po cher 'gyur gyi //
analyzed: bsod nams phung po cher 'gyur gyi //
translated: It becomes a great heap of merit;

original: gzhan du sdig pa'i phul yin no //🔽zhes gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: gzhan du sdig pa'i phul yin no // zhes gsungs pa'o //
translated: otherwise, it is the worst sin.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
translated: Then, Vajradhara, etc.

original: gti mug gi rigs kyi dam tshig gsungs pa yin te /🔽rdo rje 'chang chen po de nyid kyis mi shes pa ste /🔽rmongs shing ma rig pa des thar pa sgrub pa ste /
analyzed: gti mug gi rigs kyi dam tshig gsungs pa yin te / rdo rje 'chang chen po de nyid kyis mi shes pa ste / rmongs shing ma rig pa des thar pa sgrub pa ste /
translated: states the commitment of the family of delusion.🔽By that ignorance, i.e., by that delusion and nescience, one accomplishes liberation,

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' thob par mdzad pa ni mi shes thar pa rab sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' thob par mdzad pa ni mi shes thar pa rab sgrub pa'o //
translated: and attains the limit of reality.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'o //
translated: Pure by nature means pure by intrinsic nature.

original: bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dag gis ma gos pa ni gos pa med pa'o //
analyzed: bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa dag gis ma gos pa ni gos pa med pa'o //
translated: Unstained means unstained by either merit or demerit.

original: sems can thams cad kyi rgyud thams cad la zhugs pa'i ser sna'i nyon mongs pa sel ba'i bdag nyid kyi spyod pa ni byang chub kyi spyod pa ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi rgyud thams cad la zhugs pa'i ser sna'i nyon mongs pa sel ba'i bdag nyid kyi spyod pa ni byang chub kyi spyod pa ste /
translated: The conduct of enlightenment is the conduct of the nature of the removal of the afflictive emotion of miserliness that has entered the continuum of all sentient beings.

original: de shin tu ston par mdzad pas na byang chub spyod pa rab tu ston pas /
analyzed: de shin tu ston par mdzad pas na byang chub spyod pa rab tu ston pas /
translated: Since he teaches that very well, he is the teacher of the conduct of enlightenment.

original: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub skyed cing phyin ci ma log pas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub skyed cing phyin ci ma log pas /
translated: He is the one who generates the enlightenment of the buddhas and who, without error,

original: yang dag pa'i rdzas dgug pa'i dam tshig bka' stsal pa'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i rdzas dgug pa'i dam tshig bka' stsal pa'o //
translated: speaks the pledge to summon the authentic substance.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of “in the realm of space” and so forth has already been explained.

original: 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
analyzed: 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
translated: The wheel maṇḍala is the great seal of Great Vajradhara.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsgoms la /
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsgoms la /
translated: Having meditated on oneself as Vairocana from the transformation of that,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad de /
translated: All the buddhas🔽are the maṇḍala deities.

original: dkyil 'khor pa thams cad rnam par bsgom zhing dbyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor pa thams cad rnam par bsgom zhing dbyung bar bya'o //
translated: One should visualize and emit them.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: By the combination of all jewels.

original: rin po che thams cad ni dkar po la sogs pa'i mdog dang ldan pa'i rin po che'i rigs so //
analyzed: rin po che thams cad ni dkar po la sogs pa'i mdog dang ldan pa'i rin po che'i rigs so //
translated: All jewels are the jewel types having the colors white and so forth.

original: de'i don du rab tu sbyor ba ni rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis te /🔽@64b des rdo rje'i gzugs te mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su /
analyzed: de'i don du rab tu sbyor ba ni rin chen kun gyi sbyor ba yis te / @64b des rdo rje'i gzugs te mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams su /
translated: The combination of them is the combination of all jewels.

original: rab tu brtag cing gtong ba ste /
analyzed: rab tu brtag cing gtong ba ste /
translated: By that, one should imagine and emit the vajra forms, the tathāgatas Akṣhobhya and so forth.

original: rin po che gang dang gang de bzhin gshegs pa gang dang gang mdog mthun pa de dang de gdon par bya ba'i phyir de dang de gtang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rin po che gang dang gang de bzhin gshegs pa gang dang gang mdog mthun pa de dang de gdon par bya ba'i phyir de dang de gtang bar bya'o //
translated: One should emit them in order to take on any jewel and any tathāgata that has a corresponding color.

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par btang nas /
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par btang nas /
translated: Having thus emitted all the tathāgatas,

original: sgrub pa pos gang zhig nyams su blang ba de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sgrub pa pos gang zhig nyams su blang ba de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach what the practitioner should practice,🔽he says:

original: nor rnams thams cad ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: nor rnams thams cad ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: All wealth,

original: phrogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzas dgug pa'o //
analyzed: phrogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzas dgug pa'o //
translated: means all the articles of the Tathagatas.

original: rdo rje gsum gyis zhes bya ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs su rnam par bsgom pa ste ;
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyis zhes bya ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs su rnam par bsgom pa ste ;
translated: The three vajras, means the body, speech, and mind.🔽The hooks of light rays, means the hooks of white and so forth light rays that emerge from the pores.

original: / ba spu'i bu ga'i tshogs nas phyung ba'i 'od zer dkar po la sogs pa'i zhags pa rnams kyis mngon par 'dod pa'i rin po che'i rigs bcings la mi g-yo bar bya'o //
analyzed: / ba spu'i bu ga'i tshogs nas phyung ba'i 'od zer dkar po la sogs pa'i zhags pa rnams kyis mngon par 'dod pa'i rin po che'i rigs bcings la mi g-yo bar bya'o //
translated: The binding of the desired jewel family, means binding and not moving.

original: de nas rang gi lce'i padma'i 'dab ma las byung ba'i yi ge hr'i'i lcags kyus drangs nas /
analyzed: de nas rang gi lce'i padma'i 'dab ma las byung ba'i yi ge hr'i'i lcags kyus drangs nas /
translated: Then, having drawn it with the hook of the syllable hrīḥ that arises from the lotus petal of one’s tongue,

original: rang gi khyim du gzhag par yid kyis bsgom par bya'o //🔽nor gyi rgya mtshos zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: rang gi khyim du gzhag par yid kyis bsgom par bya'o // nor gyi rgya mtshos zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
translated: one should imagine it placed in one’s house.

original: ser sna'i nyes pa'i rnyog ma can gyi rgyud dang ldan pa rnams kyi rnam par dag pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ser sna'i nyes pa'i rnyog ma can gyi rgyud dang ldan pa rnams kyi rnam par dag pa gsungs te /
translated: The purity of those who have a mind that is turbid with the fault of miserliness is stated by the ocean of wealth, etc.

original: nor gyi rgya mtsho ni mi zad pa'i phyir na rgya mtsho ste /
analyzed: nor gyi rgya mtsho ni mi zad pa'i phyir na rgya mtsho ste /
translated: The ocean of wealth is an ocean because it is inexhaustible.

original: des yongs su gang zhing rgyas par 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: des yongs su gang zhing rgyas par 'gyur pa'o //
translated: It is filled and expanded by that.

original: yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur //
analyzed: yid bzhin nor bu 'dra bar 'gyur //
translated: It becomes like a wish-fulfilling gem.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is

original: yid la mngon par 'dod pa'i don rab tu skyed pa'i nor bu'i bye brag ste /
analyzed: yid la mngon par 'dod pa'i don rab tu skyed pa'i nor bu'i bye brag ste /
translated: a particular kind of gem that produces the desired aim.

original: de dang 'dra pa'i nor gyi rgya mtsho can gyi rdzas kyi bdag po gang yin par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de dang 'dra pa'i nor gyi rgya mtsho can gyi rdzas kyi bdag po gang yin par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It is the lord of the ocean of wealth that is like that.

original: 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa 'byor par 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi /🔽sangs rgyas kun gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i phun sum tshogs pa 'byor par 'gyur ba 'ba' zhig tu ma zad kyi / sangs rgyas kun gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: Not only does one obtain the excellence of the mundane,🔽but also

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'bras bu gsungs te /🔽sangs rgyas las skyes pas na sangs rgyas kyi sras te /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'bras bu gsungs te / sangs rgyas las skyes pas na sangs rgyas kyi sras te /
translated: the fruit of the supramundane is stated, beginning with “all the buddhas.”🔽The buddhas’ son, the chief of all the buddhas’ sons,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sras kyi gtso bor 'gyur ba dang / phyis de bzhin gshegs par yang 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sras kyi gtso bor 'gyur ba dang / phyis de bzhin gshegs par yang 'gyur ba'o //
translated: will later become a tathagata.

original: 'di ni rigs kyi rgya mtsho thams cad las zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rigs kyi rgya mtsho'i nang nas gti mug gi rigs te /
analyzed: 'di ni rigs kyi rgya mtsho thams cad las zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rigs kyi rgya mtsho'i nang nas gti mug gi rigs te /
translated: This is the family of all oceans of tathagatas, from among the oceans of families of Akshobhya and so on, it is the family of delusion.🔽

original: rnam par snang mdzad dang 'brel pa'i lha rnams kyi 'khor lo'i de kho na yang dag pa'i gsang ba ste /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad dang 'brel pa'i lha rnams kyi 'khor lo'i de kho na yang dag pa'i gsang ba ste /
translated: This is the reality of the wheel of the deities connected with Vairocana, the secret of the true reality of the family of delusion from the ocean of all the families of Akshobhya and so forth.

original: 'di nyid ni 'da' bar mi bya bas na dam tshig go //🔽de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis @65a * //
analyzed: 'di nyid ni 'da' bar mi bya bas na dam tshig go // de bas na bcom ldan 'das kyis @65a * //
translated: This is the commitment because it should not be transgressed.

original: dpal rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud las /
analyzed: dpal rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba spyod pa'i rgyud las /
translated: Therefore, the Bhagavat said in the glorious Tantra of Vairochanabhisambodhi:

original: 'di na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ma byin par len pa thams cad las slar log par bya ste /
analyzed: 'di na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ma byin par len pa thams cad las slar log par bya ste /
translated: Here, all bodhisattvas should turn away from all taking what is not given.

original: gzhan du na sems can gang dag ser sa can 'jungs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
analyzed: gzhan du na sems can gang dag ser sa can 'jungs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs so //
translated: Otherwise, those sentient beings who are miserly and greedy and so forth.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: Then, etc.

original: 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa yin te /
analyzed: 'dod chags kyi rigs kyi dam tshig la 'jug pa yin te /
translated: is the entry into the commitment of the family of passion.

original: bcom ldan 'das de nyid rang gi rang bzhin bsgyur pas rnam par shes pa chags par mdzad pa'i gzugs skyes pas na /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de nyid rang gi rang bzhin bsgyur pas rnam par shes pa chags par mdzad pa'i gzugs skyes pas na /
translated: The Blessed One, by transforming his own nature, creates the form of one who is attached to consciousness.

original: 'dod chags so //
analyzed: 'dod chags so //
translated: Therefore, he is Passion.

original: thar pa 'dod pa rnam la sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi thar bsgrub par mdzad pa ste /
analyzed: thar pa 'dod pa rnam la sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can gyi thar bsgrub par mdzad pa ste /
translated: He is the one who accomplishes liberation, which has the characteristic of the pacification of suffering, for those who desire liberation.

original: de bas na 'dod chags thar pa rab sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de bas na 'dod chags thar pa rab sgrub pa'o //
translated: Therefore, he is Passion, the Accomplisher of Liberation.

original: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can yin pas na gsang bdag pa'o //🔽mig nas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pas na /
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can yin pas na gsang bdag pa'o // mig nas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pas na /
translated: He is the Lord of Secrets, because he has the nature of the two truths.

original: dmigs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: dmigs pa med pa ste /
translated: He is Non-apprehending, because he abides in the nirvana without remainder.

original: 'od dpag tu med pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bka' stsal cing gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bka' stsal cing gsungs pa'o //
translated: He is the One who Speaks the Wheel of the Commitment Mandala of Amitābha.

original: nam mkha'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: nam mkha'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the sky, etc.

original: padma'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku ste /
analyzed: padma'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku ste /
translated: The lotus mandala is the body of Mahāvajradhara.

original: 'od dpag tu med pa skyed par mdzad pa'i nye bar gdags pas na snga ma bzhin te /
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa skyed par mdzad pa'i nye bar gdags pas na snga ma bzhin te /
translated: He is the One who Speaks the Wheel of the Commitment Mandala of Amitābha, because he is designated as the producer of Amitābha, as before.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po yongs su gyur nas 'od dpag tu med par rab tu bsgoms la /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po yongs su gyur nas 'od dpag tu med par rab tu bsgoms la /
translated: Having completely transformed into Great Vajradhara, one should meditate on Amitābha.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyis te dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams kyis gzhal yas khang gi nang thams cad dgar zhing gnas ji lta ba bzhin du spro bar bya'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyis te dkyil 'khor pa'i lha rnams kyis gzhal yas khang gi nang thams cad dgar zhing gnas ji lta ba bzhin du spro bar bya'o //
translated: The buddhas, the deities of the maṇḍala, should be delighted and emanated in all the inner parts of the celestial mansion, in their respective places.

original: dkyil 'khor der dkyil 'khor pa thams cad bud med dang skyes pa lta bu ni /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor der dkyil 'khor pa thams cad bud med dang skyes pa lta bu ni /
translated: In that maṇḍala, all the maṇḍala deities are like women and men.

original: bud med lta bur sbyar bar rnam par bsgom zhing bsam pa'o //
analyzed: bud med lta bur sbyar bar rnam par bsgom zhing bsam pa'o //
translated: One should imagine and meditate on the union with the women.

original: bud med lta bu ni lha mo lta bu ste /
analyzed: bud med lta bu ni lha mo lta bu ste /
translated: The women are like goddesses.

original: de lta bu'i sbyor bas te yang dag par sbyar ba ni bud med kyi rnam pa lta bur yongs su gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bu'i sbyor bas te yang dag par sbyar ba ni bud med kyi rnam pa lta bur yongs su gyur pa'o //
translated: The union with such is the perfect union, the complete transformation into the form of a woman.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is that like?

original: dam tshig bzhi yi sbyor ba yis //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dam tshig bzhi yi sbyor ba yis // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The union of the four pledges.

original: dam tshig bzhi ni rnal 'byor bzhi ste /
analyzed: dam tshig bzhi ni rnal 'byor bzhi ste /
translated: The four pledges are the four yogas.

original: rnal 'byor des lha'i rnam pa lta bur bskyed pas na /
analyzed: rnal 'byor des lha'i rnam pa lta bur bskyed pas na /
translated: Since those yogas generate the form of the deity,

original: dam tshig bzhi yi sbyor pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: dam tshig bzhi yi sbyor pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: they are called the “union of the four pledges.”

original: dam tshig bzhi'i sbyor pas bud med lta bur bsgom par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar par bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig bzhi'i sbyor pas bud med lta bur bsgom par bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on the woman, by the application of the four commitments.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bshad thag pa'i bsam gtan no //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bshad thag pa'i bsam gtan no //
translated: This is the meditation of the yogi.

original: rdo rje tshul zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po ste /
analyzed: rdo rje tshul zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po ste /
translated: The vajra way is the Great Vehicle.

original: de ni 'dod pa'i dbang @65b phyug gtso bo yin pas mchog go //
analyzed: de ni 'dod pa'i dbang @65b phyug gtso bo yin pas mchog go //
translated: It is supreme, since it is the chief lord of desire.

original: de ltar bsgoms nas ci zhig cig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar bsgoms nas ci zhig cig bya zhe na /
translated: Having meditated in this way, what should one do?

original: dbang po gnyis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dbang po gnyis ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He says, “the two organs,” etc.

original: rjes su mnyes pa sngon du 'gro ba'i rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor bas /
analyzed: rjes su mnyes pa sngon du 'gro ba'i rdo rje dang padma mnyam par sbyor bas /
translated: By the union of the vajra and lotus, preceded by the pleasing,

original: de dag thams cad sna tshogs pa dga' zhing bdag nyid rol ba'i bya ba bdag gis skad nye bar spyad par bya zhing rol bar bya'o //
analyzed: de dag thams cad sna tshogs pa dga' zhing bdag nyid rol ba'i bya ba bdag gis skad nye bar spyad par bya zhing rol bar bya'o //
translated: one should enjoy the play of all those various delights, and one should enjoy the play of one’s own activity.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'o //
translated: This is the just-explained.

original: rdo rje thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni sgrub po thams cad kyi'o //
analyzed: rdo rje thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa po thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni sgrub po thams cad kyi'o //
translated: Of all vajras is of all adepts.

original: mi phyed sku gsum bsgom pa'o //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mi phyed sku gsum bsgom pa'o // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: is the meditation on the three indivisible bodies.

original: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku gsum mi phyed pa sbrug cing bskyed la sgom pa ste /🔽'di ni 'dod chags kyi rigs te /
analyzed: chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku gsum mi phyed pa sbrug cing bskyed la sgom pa ste / 'di ni 'dod chags kyi rigs te /
translated: This is the meditation on the three bodies, the essence of the Dharma Body, the Enjoyment Body, and the Emanation Body, which are indivisible, and which are created and generated.

original: padma'i rigs kyi dam tshig tu bya ba'o //🔽sngags pas zhes pa ni /
analyzed: padma'i rigs kyi dam tshig tu bya ba'o // sngags pas zhes pa ni /
translated: This is the family of passion, and is the commitment of the Lotus Family.

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa la brtan par gnas pas bsgom par bya zhing sgrub pa nyams su blang bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa la brtan par gnas pas bsgom par bya zhing sgrub pa nyams su blang bar bya ba'o //
translated: The “mantrin” is one who is firm in the stage of generation, and who meditates and practices.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni don yod par grub pa'i dam tshig la 'jug pa yin te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni don yod par grub pa'i dam tshig la 'jug pa yin te /
translated: Then, etc. is the entrance into the commitment of Amoghasiddhi.

original: bcom ldan 'das de nyid rdo rje sngags kyis te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de nyid rdo rje sngags kyis te /
translated: The Bhagavat himself is the vajra mantra,

analyzed: bdag med pa de nyid ni sgyu ma lta bu'i sku dang ldan pas rdo rje 'chang chen po la bya'o //

original: nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: thams cad gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas //
analyzed: thams cad gzugs su rnam bsgoms nas //

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /

original: thams cad gzugs te /
analyzed: thams cad gzugs te /

analyzed: sems can thams cad de nyid du gnas par rnam par bsgom zhing yongs su shes par bya'o //

original: rdo rje'i tshig gi brdzun smra pas //
analyzed: rdo rje'i tshig gi brdzun smra pas //

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: @66a * // chos thams cad ni brdzun pa'o zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i tshig gi don la gnas pa'o //

original: de nas ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de nas ci zhig bya zhe na /

original: rgyal ba kun gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rgyal ba kun gyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

analyzed: de dag slu bar bya ste /

analyzed: de yang lha'i bu chos thams cad ni brdzun pa sgyu ma'o //

original: nga yang de bzhin du ston par byed de /
analyzed: nga yang de bzhin du ston par byed de /

original: des na nga ni brdzun du smra ba'o //
analyzed: des na nga ni brdzun du smra ba'o //

original: zhes gsungs pas so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pas so //

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'o //

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung ni /

original: dri ma med pa'o //
analyzed: dri ma med pa'o //

analyzed: ye shes blo can kun gyi gsang // sngags kyi dngos grub thob par bshad //

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /

analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes la lhag par mos pa gang yin pa de ni ye shes blo can te /

analyzed: don yod par grub pa'i rigs so //

analyzed: don ji lta ba bzhin spro bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni //

analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du spro ba la yang nas yang du bslab par bya ste /

analyzed: rtag par brdzun du smra bar bya // zhes gsungs pas so //

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /

analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dam tshig la 'jug pa yin te /

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das de nyid ni rdo rje gsum ste /

analyzed: sku la sogs pa'i rdo rje bsdus pa yin pa'i phyir phye zhing tha dad par byas pa ni phyed pa'o //

analyzed: mi phyed pas na rdo rje mi phyed gsum ste /

analyzed: tha mi @66b dad pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni rdo rje mi phyed gsum mo //

analyzed: rgyal ba ni dus gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so //

analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje mi phyed gsum rgyal gnas so//
