translated: Having explained the teaching of the two kinds of conduct,

original: bden pa gnyis kyi rnam par dbye bas de sgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyi rnam par dbye bas de sgrub pa bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the practice of those by means of the division of the two truths,

original: rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /🔽'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni /
translated: he says, “Son of noble family, it is like this…”

original: tshig gi phrad kun 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: tshig gi phrad kun 'byung ba ste /
translated: “It is like this” is a verbal particle.

original: dper na zhes bya ba ni don la rab tu 'jug go //
analyzed: dper na zhes bya ba ni don la rab tu 'jug go //
translated: “For example” is the meaning.

original: nam mkha' ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: Space is the ultimate truth.

original: thams cad kyi @69a * //
analyzed: thams cad kyi @69a * //
translated: “All”

original: rjes su song ba ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos thams cad la rjes su song zhing khyab pa'o //
analyzed: rjes su song ba ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos thams cad la rjes su song zhing khyab pa'o //
translated: means that it pervades and extends to all dependently arisen phenomena.

original: chos thams cad ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams te /
analyzed: chos thams cad ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams te /
translated: “All phenomena” are the aggregates, elements, and sense bases.

original: chos de rnams kyang nam mkha' gtogs pa'i chos nyid dag ni dbyer mi phyed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos de rnams kyang nam mkha' gtogs pa'i chos nyid dag ni dbyer mi phyed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Those phenomena are the indivisible reality of space.

original: 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni don 'di rnam par 'grel te /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams na mi gnas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni don 'di rnam par 'grel te /
translated: “Not abiding in the desire realm…” and so forth explains this meaning.

original: gzugs la sogs pa rnams 'dod cing tshol bas na 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa rnams 'dod cing tshol bas na 'dod pa ste /
translated: They are called desire realms because one desires and seeks forms and so on.

original: rgyal chen ras bzhi la sogs pa'i lha rnams so //
analyzed: rgyal chen ras bzhi la sogs pa'i lha rnams so //
translated: They are the gods of the Caturmaharajakayikas and so on.

original: de rnams 'dzin pas na khams te gnas so //
analyzed: de rnams 'dzin pas na khams te gnas so //
translated: The realms are their abodes.

original: de rnams kyi phung po la sogs pa der yang mi gnas te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi phung po la sogs pa der yang mi gnas te /
translated: They do not even abide in the aggregates and so on of those desire realm gods,

original: 'dod pa'i khams kyang don dam pa'i bden par gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams kyang don dam pa'i bden par gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the desire realm belongs to ultimate truth.

original: srid pa gang na gzugs tsam la chags pa de ni gzugs kyi khams so //
analyzed: srid pa gang na gzugs tsam la chags pa de ni gzugs kyi khams so //
translated: The form realm is where one is attached to mere form.🔽The formless realm is where one abides in mere consciousness, free from attachment to form.

original: srid pa gang na gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral bas rnam par shes pa tsam du gnas pa de ni gzugs med pa'i khams te de dag na yang mi gnas so //
analyzed: srid pa gang na gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral bas rnam par shes pa tsam du gnas pa de ni gzugs med pa'i khams te de dag na yang mi gnas so //
translated: They do not even abide in those.

original: 'byung ba chen po bzhi la yang mi gnas so zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po bzhi la yang mi gnas so zhes bya ba ni /
translated: They do not even abide in the four great elements.

original: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i rim gyis gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi yang yin pa /
analyzed: rlung gi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i rim gyis gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi yang yin pa /
translated: The four maṇḍalas that exist in stages, beginning with the wind maṇḍala,

original: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i gzhir gyur pa de ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi'o //
analyzed: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i gzhir gyur pa de ni 'byung ba chen po bzhi'o //
translated: are the basis of the moving and unmoving. Those are the four great elements.

original: de la yang mi gnas te /
analyzed: de la yang mi gnas te /
translated: And they do not abide in that,

original: thams cad kyang 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: thams cad kyang 'od gsal ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: because everything has the nature of clear light.

original: chos thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad ni phung po la sogs pa'o //
translated: All phenomena are the aggregates and so forth.

original: de ltar zhes pa ni rnam pa 'di nyid kyis so //
analyzed: de ltar zhes pa ni rnam pa 'di nyid kyis so //
translated: In this way means in just this way.

original: rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rjes su rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni shes par bya ba'o //
translated: One should understand means one should know.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis don gyi dbang 'di lta bu mkhyen cing zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis don gyi dbang 'di lta bu mkhyen cing zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The tathāgatas know this kind of meaning,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni bshad ma thag pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don 'di lta bu ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni bshad ma thag pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i don 'di lta bu ste /
translated: the tathāgatas know this kind of meaning of dependent origination just explained.

original: de rnams kyi dbang ni /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dbang ni /
translated: Their power🔽is the ultimate truth, which is not established from another cause or from itself.

original: don dam pa'i bden pa gzhan gyi rgyu dang rang las kyang ma grub pa nyid de lta bu mkhyen cing thugs su chud nas /
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa gzhan gyi rgyu dang rang las kyang ma grub pa nyid de lta bu mkhyen cing thugs su chud nas /
translated: Having known and realized that kind of power,

original: sems can rnams kyi dman pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas gnas pa'i bsam pa ste /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyi dman pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas gnas pa'i bsam pa ste /
translated: they know the aspirations of sentient beings, which are based on the distinctions of inferior and so forth.

original: lhag par mos pa mkhyen cing yongs su phye nas chos te /
analyzed: lhag par mos pa mkhyen cing yongs su phye nas chos te /
translated: Having understood and distinguished those, they teach the Dharma.

original: gsung du brtags pa'i mtshan nyid can sems can rnams la 'chad par mdzad cing rab tu ston par mdzad de /
analyzed: gsung du brtags pa'i mtshan nyid can sems can rnams la 'chad par mdzad cing rab tu ston par mdzad de /
translated: He teaches and demonstrates to sentient beings the Dharma, which has the characteristic of being examined by the speech.

original: yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang bum pa bzang po dang 'dra bar 'bad pa mi mnga' bas /
analyzed: yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang bum pa bzang po dang 'dra bar 'bad pa mi mnga' bas /
translated: Without exertion, like a wish-fulfilling gem or an excellent vase,

original: @69b sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang rjes su mthun par chos ston par mdzad pas /
analyzed: @69b sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang rjes su mthun par chos ston par mdzad pas /
translated: he teaches the Dharma in accordance with the thoughts of sentient beings.

original: 'dir ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the teaching arises just as it is.

original: de ltar rnam pa 'di nyid kyis nam mkha'i tshig nges par brjod pa ste /
analyzed: de ltar rnam pa 'di nyid kyis nam mkha'i tshig nges par brjod pa ste /
translated: In this way, this very aspect is the expression of the word “space.”

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i nges pa'i tshig ni nam mkha'i tshig nges par brjod pa ste //🔽nges pa'i tshig nges de dang mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig ces pa /
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i nges pa'i tshig ni nam mkha'i tshig nges par brjod pa ste // nges pa'i tshig nges de dang mnyam par de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig ces pa /
translated: The expression of the word “space” is the expression of the word “space” that is equivalent to space.🔽The expression of the word “space” is equivalent to the expression of the word “commitment.”

original: bshad ma thag pa de dag rjes su rig par bya'o //
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa de dag rjes su rig par bya'o //
translated: The expression of the word “commitment” should be understood as the commitment of the Tathāgata.

original: de ltar chos thams cad kyi don dam pa'i bden pa rnam par dag ba bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar chos thams cad kyi don dam pa'i bden pa rnam par dag ba bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the ultimate truth of all phenomena,

original: theg pa gzhan dang thun mong du 'gyur ba'i rdo rje'i sku skyed pa'i thabs kyi bye brag bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: theg pa gzhan dang thun mong du 'gyur ba'i rdo rje'i sku skyed pa'i thabs kyi bye brag bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the particular methods for generating the vajra body, which is not shared with other vehicles,

original: rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /🔽gtsub shing ni 'dis gtsubs pas me skyed pas na /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te / gtsub shing ni 'dis gtsubs pas me skyed pas na /
translated: it is said, “Son of good family, it is like this…” and so on.

original: gtsub shing ste shing bu'o //
analyzed: gtsub shing ste shing bu'o //
translated: The fire stick is the stick that generates fire by rubbing it.

original: gtsub gtan ni gzhi ste me gtsubs pa'i rten du gyur pa'i shing bu'o //
analyzed: gtsub gtan ni gzhi ste me gtsubs pa'i rten du gyur pa'i shing bu'o //
translated: The fire board is the base, the stick that serves as the support for rubbing the fire.

original: mi'i lag pa ni bskyod pa'i tshe gtsub bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: mi'i lag pa ni bskyod pa'i tshe gtsub bar byed pa ste /
translated: The human hand is the one that moves and rubs.

original: gsum po de dag gi rkyen la brten cing 'bad pas dro bar 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gsum po de dag gi rkyen la brten cing 'bad pas dro bar 'byung ngo //
translated: When the conditions of those three are relied upon and effort is made, heat arises.

original: de'i 'og tu du ba rab tu 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de'i 'og tu du ba rab tu 'byung ngo //
translated: After that, smoke appears.

original: dub 'byung ba'i 'og tu me 'byung zhing 'od dang ldan pa'i rnam par 'bar bar gyur nas 'dus te 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dub 'byung ba'i 'og tu me 'byung zhing 'od dang ldan pa'i rnam par 'bar bar gyur nas 'dus te 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: After the smoke, fire appears, blazing with light, and then it gathers and arises.🔽That fire also is not in the fire stick,

original: me de yang zhes bya ba ni dro ba dang du ba dang me de dag ni /
analyzed: me de yang zhes bya ba ni dro ba dang du ba dang me de dag ni /
translated: not in the fire board,🔽not in the hand,

original: gtsub shing la yang mi gnas /
analyzed: gtsub shing la yang mi gnas /
translated: not in the surrounding space,🔽and not in any other place.

original: gtsub gtan la yang mi gnas /
analyzed: gtsub gtan la yang mi gnas /
translated: It does not abide in the friction stick,

original: mi'i lag pa'i bskyod pa la yang mi gnas so //
analyzed: mi'i lag pa'i bskyod pa la yang mi gnas so //
translated: nor does it abide in the movement of the man’s hand.

original: de lta bur zhes bya ba ni /🔽ji ltar gtsub shing la sogs pa rnams la /
analyzed: de lta bur zhes bya ba ni / ji ltar gtsub shing la sogs pa rnams la /
translated: “Just like that” means

original: dro ba la sogs pa so sor dmigs su med do //
analyzed: dro ba la sogs pa so sor dmigs su med do //
translated: just as the heat and so forth are not individually observed in the friction stick and so forth,

original: de lta mod kyi tshogs pa las de dag nyid gong nas gong du skye bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta mod kyi tshogs pa las de dag nyid gong nas gong du skye bar 'gyur ro //
translated: nevertheless, from the assembly, they arise higher and higher.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig rjes su rig par bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig rjes su rig par bya ste /
translated: Likewise, the pledge of all the Tathāgatas’ vajras should be understood.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas su gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnas su gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the state of all the Tathāgatas.

original: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni thams cad stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni thams cad stong pa nyid do //
translated: There, all the Tathāgatas are the emptiness of everything.

original: rdo rje ni chen po stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: rdo rje ni chen po stong pa nyid do //
translated: The vajra is the emptiness of the great.

original: dam tshig ni shin tu stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dam tshig ni shin tu stong pa nyid do //
translated: The pledge is the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: rjes su rig par bya'o zhes pa ni stong pa nyid de gsum pa de dag gi rjes te /
analyzed: rjes su rig par bya'o zhes pa ni stong pa nyid de gsum pa de dag gi rjes te /
translated: “Should be understood” means that it is the state of those three kinds of emptiness.

original: phyi nas rig cing shes par bya ba yin pas na stong pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: phyi nas rig cing shes par bya ba yin pas na stong pa zhes bya ste /
translated: Since it is to be known and understood later, it is called empty.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa ni de ltar rig @70a * //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa ni de ltar rig @70a * //
translated: All tathāgatas, etc. should be understood in this way.

original: par bya'o // 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: par bya'o // 'gro ba dang 'ong ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Going and coming, etc. means

original: 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni stong pa gsum gyis don dam pa'i bden par 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni stong pa gsum gyis don dam pa'i bden par 'gro ba'o //
translated: going is the going to ultimate truth by means of the three emptinesses.

original: de las chen po stong pa nyid dang / shin tu stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid thob pa ni 'ong ba'o //
analyzed: de las chen po stong pa nyid dang / shin tu stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid thob pa ni 'ong ba'o //
translated: The attainment of the emptiness of the great, the emptiness of the very great, and the emptiness of emptiness is coming.

original: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni /
analyzed: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgra ni /
translated: The word etc.

original: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa yongs su gzung ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med pa yongs su gzung ste /
translated: includes both non-going and non-coming.

original: rdzogs pa la ni 'jug pa dang ldan pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rdzogs pa la ni 'jug pa dang ldan pa med pa'o //
translated: In completion, there is neither engagement nor possession.

original: de ltar mchog tu zab ba'i chos nyid thos shing bzung bas /
analyzed: de ltar mchog tu zab ba'i chos nyid thos shing bzung bas /
translated: Having heard and retained this Dharma nature, which is supremely profound,

original: 'dir yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'dir yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to demonstrate the exclamation of delight that is in accord with the mind here,

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said then, etc.

original: de nas skad cig de nyid la snang ba skyes pas ngo mtshar du gyur pa thob pa dang / de nas chos nyid rtogs pas rmad du gyur pas /
analyzed: de nas skad cig de nyid la snang ba skyes pas ngo mtshar du gyur pa thob pa dang / de nas chos nyid rtogs pas rmad du gyur pas /
translated: Then, by realizing the nature of reality, they attained the state of amazement.

original: mig gdangs shing thabs kyi ye shes skyes par gyur nas /
analyzed: mig gdangs shing thabs kyi ye shes skyes par gyur nas /
translated: Their eyes opened wide, and the gnosis of skillful means arose.

original: 'og nas bshad pa'i so so rang gis rig pa'i chos nyid ston pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshig 'di skad ces smras bar gyur to //
analyzed: 'og nas bshad pa'i so so rang gis rig pa'i chos nyid ston pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshig 'di skad ces smras bar gyur to //
translated: Then, they spoke these words of the essence of the teaching on the nature of reality to be realized by each one for themselves, as will be explained below.

original: rmad byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rmad byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: The words wondrous and so forth are as follows.

original: 'dir rmad byung chen po'i chos rnams ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir rmad byung chen po'i chos rnams ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: Here, the phenomena of the great wonder are the ultimate truth.

original: thams cad du khyab pas na de nyid ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: thams cad du khyab pas na de nyid ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o //
translated: Since it pervades everything, it is the same as space.

original: rtog ge ba rnams kyis rnam par brtag par mi nus pas rnam par mi rtog pa'o //🔽kun rdzob kyi bden pa yongs su dag pas na dag pa'o //
analyzed: rtog ge ba rnams kyis rnam par brtag par mi nus pas rnam par mi rtog pa'o // kun rdzob kyi bden pa yongs su dag pas na dag pa'o //
translated: Since it cannot be imagined by logicians, it is non-conceptual.🔽Since the conventional truth is pure, it is pure.

original: don dam pa'i bden pa de la yang dag par sgrib cing kun nas 'gebs la /
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa de la yang dag par sgrib cing kun nas 'gebs la /
translated: That ultimate truth is completely obscured and covered by the conventional truth.

original: mig gi dbang po'i yul du gyur pas na kun rdzob ste /
analyzed: mig gi dbang po'i yul du gyur pas na kun rdzob ste /
translated: The conventional is so called because it is the object of the sense of sight.

original: rdo rje 'chang ba'i sku'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang ba'i sku'o //
translated: It is the body of Vajradhara.

original: 'ang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni yang zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: 'ang zhes bya ba'i sgra ni yang zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: The word “also” means “again.”

original: don dam pa'i bden pa mngon par rtogs pas stong par gyur nas /
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa mngon par rtogs pas stong par gyur nas /
translated: Having become empty through the realization of the ultimate truth,🔽it appears again.

original: yang snang bar gyur ba'o zhes gang bshad pa de ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: yang snang bar gyur ba'o zhes gang bshad pa de ni ngo mtshar che'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: This is what is being said up to “it is amazing.”

original: don dam pa ni 'od gsal ba'o //🔽des dag bas na don dam pa'i dag pa ste /🔽don dam pa'i dag pa yang yin la /
analyzed: don dam pa ni 'od gsal ba'o // des dag bas na don dam pa'i dag pa ste / don dam pa'i dag pa yang yin la /
translated: The ultimate is clear light.🔽Since it is purified by that, it is the purification of the ultimate.

original: de kho na nyid kyi don kyang yin pas na rdo rje 'chang ste /
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyi don kyang yin pas na rdo rje 'chang ste /
translated: Since it is the purification of the ultimate and it is the meaning of reality, it is Vajradhara.

original: de nyid ni 'da' bar mi bya bas na dam tshig go //
analyzed: de nyid ni 'da' bar mi bya bas na dam tshig go //
translated: Since it is not to be transgressed, it is a commitment.

original: de ston pa'i gzhung gi tshogs kyang /
analyzed: de ston pa'i gzhung gi tshogs kyang /
translated: The collection of texts that teach that

original: don dam pa'i dag pa de kho na nyid kyi don gyi dam tshig ces bya ste /
analyzed: don dam pa'i dag pa de kho na nyid kyi don gyi dam tshig ces bya ste /
translated: are called the commitments of the meaning of reality, the purification of the ultimate.

original: dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation of the implied meaning.

original: sgron ma gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa las /
analyzed: sgron ma gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa las /
translated: This concludes the explanation of the commentary on the first chapter, having thirty-two verses, called “The Introduction.”

original: le'u @70b dgu pa mtha' drug gis bshad pa'o /🔽// / sgrub pa mchog dang tha mal pa la gnas shing /
analyzed: le'u @70b dgu pa mtha' drug gis bshad pa'o / // / sgrub pa mchog dang tha mal pa la gnas shing /
translated: Chapter 9 explains the six limits.🔽The yogi/nī who has mastered the practice of the three conducts—elaborate and so forth—

original: spros pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa gsum la goms pa nyams 'og tu chud pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
analyzed: spros pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa'i spyod pa gsum la goms pa nyams 'og tu chud pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
translated: while abiding in the supreme and ordinary accomplishments,

original: gang gi tshe dngos grub rnyed par ma gyur na de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe dngos grub rnyed par ma gyur na de'i tshe /
translated: when s/he does not attain power,

original: rang gi lha la snying pos bskul bar bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rang gi lha la snying pos bskul bar bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: should be urged with the essence mantra of one’s deity.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa le'u bcu pa nye bar ston par mdzad pa yin te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa le'u bcu pa nye bar ston par mdzad pa yin te /
translated: In order to teach this, the tenth chapter is introduced with “Then, etc.”

original: de nas 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: de nas 'di skad ces gsol to zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: “Then” is connected with “he said this.”

original: yang 'dus te zhes bya ba ni le'u dang por bshad pa'i rim gyis so //
analyzed: yang 'dus te zhes bya ba ni le'u dang por bshad pa'i rim gyis so //
translated: “Again gathered” is in the manner explained in the first chapter.

original: dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: “Great commitment vajra” is Great Vajradhara.

original: de'i de kho na nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni /
analyzed: de'i de kho na nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni /
translated: His manifest, perfect enlightenment is the suchness of that.

original: bden pa gnyis gnyis su med par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can no //🔽de nyid ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba yin pas /
analyzed: bden pa gnyis gnyis su med par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can no // de nyid ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba yin pas /
translated: It is characterized by the non-duality of the two truths.🔽That itself is the secret of body, speech, and mind,

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba'o //
translated: so it is the secret of body, speech, and mind.

original: gdul bya rnams kyi bsam pa'i bye brag ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pas na de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
analyzed: gdul bya rnams kyi bsam pa'i bye brag ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen pas na de bzhin gshegs pa ste /
translated: Since he knows the various inclinations of those to be tamed just as they are, he is the Tathāgata.

original: de la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Having paid homage to him, he said this:

original: sngags ni a'a li dang k'a li las skyes pa rnams te /
analyzed: sngags ni a'a li dang k'a li las skyes pa rnams te /
translated: Mantras are those born from the vowels and consonants,

original: sbrul dang mgo med ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sbrul dang mgo med ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: such as the nāga and headless ones.

original: de rnams kyi snying po ni gtso bo ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi snying po ni gtso bo ste /
translated: Their essence is the principal ones,

original: yi ge aom la sogs pa gsum mo //
analyzed: yi ge aom la sogs pa gsum mo //
translated: the three syllables om and so forth.

original: de rnams kyis bsdus pa ni gsal bar byas pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyis bsdus pa ni gsal bar byas pa'o //
translated: They are included in those, made clear.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
translated: Body, speech, and mind are the tathāgatas.

original: de rnams kyi gsang bar bsgrags pa ni gsang ba zhes btags so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi gsang bar bsgrags pa ni gsang ba zhes btags so //
translated: Their secret proclamation is designated as the secret.

original: dngos grub chen po'i tshul ni dngos grub chen po'i thabs so //
analyzed: dngos grub chen po'i tshul ni dngos grub chen po'i thabs so //
translated: The method of the great powers is the means for the great powers.

original: de rnams kyi mchog ni phul du byung ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi mchog ni phul du byung ba'o //
translated: The best of those is the most excellent.

original: yang dag pa ni mi slu ba ste /
analyzed: yang dag pa ni mi slu ba ste /
translated: The true is the non-deceptive.

original: de kho na nyid de bshad du gsol zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de kho na nyid de bshad du gsol zhes pa ni /
translated: That reality, please explain.

original: rab tu bstan du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu bstan du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa'o //
translated: Please teach.

original: de nas zhes pa ni zhus pa'i 'og tu'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes pa ni zhus pa'i 'og tu'o //
translated: Then, after the request,

original: shes rab dang / nye bar thob pa la ltos pas rnam par mdzes par gyur pas na rgyal po'o //
analyzed: shes rab dang / nye bar thob pa la ltos pas rnam par mdzes par gyur pas na rgyal po'o //
translated: the king, because of his beauty in dependence on wisdom and near attainment,

original: thabs kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid can yin pas na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: thabs kyi ye shes kyi bdag nyid can yin pas na rdo rje 'dzin pa'o //
translated: is the vajra-holder, because of his nature of the gnosis of method.

original: nyon mongs kun ni 'dod chags la sogs pa gsum mo //
analyzed: nyon mongs kun ni 'dod chags la sogs pa gsum mo //
translated: All afflictions are the three, attachment and so forth.

original: de rnams kyang dbye ba dang rjes su dbye bas phye na /
analyzed: de rnams kyang dbye ba dang rjes su dbye bas phye na /
translated: Those, when divided by the divisions and the subsequent divisions,

original: shin tu mad pas na rgya mtsho dang mnyam pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shin tu mad pas na rgya mtsho dang mnyam pa'i phyir /
translated: are very many, because they are equal to the ocean.

original: nyon mongs pa kun gyi rgya mtsho'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa kun gyi rgya mtsho'o //
translated: Therefore, they are the ocean of all afflictions.

original: de rnams kyi sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba la sogs @71a * //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba la sogs @71a * //
translated: Their suffering, mental dissatisfaction, and so forth,

original: pa'i rang bzhin zil gyis mnan nas /
analyzed: pa'i rang bzhin zil gyis mnan nas /
translated: Having overcome the nature of the three realms,

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis 'byung bar mdzad cing rol par mdzad pas na /
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i ngo bo nyid kyis 'byung bar mdzad cing rol par mdzad pas na /
translated: he arises and plays with the nature of supreme joy.

original: gtso bo'o // sdug bsngal thams cad rjes su sreg par mdzad pas na 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: gtso bo'o // sdug bsngal thams cad rjes su sreg par mdzad pas na 'bar ba'o //
translated: He is the chief, because he burns up all suffering.

original: de nyid kyis drag po ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyis drag po ste /
translated: He is fierce,

original: khro bo'i bdag nyid can du byung ba'o //🔽tha mal pa bas kyang rab tu rgyas pa'i spyan bgrad par mdzad pas /
analyzed: khro bo'i bdag nyid can du byung ba'o // tha mal pa bas kyang rab tu rgyas pa'i spyan bgrad par mdzad pas /
translated: because he arises with the nature of wrath.

original: spyan yangs pas so //
analyzed: spyan yangs pas so //
translated: He has wide eyes, because he opens his eyes wider than ordinary people.

original: gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to //
analyzed: gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to //
translated: He spoke this speech.

original: zhes bya ba ni gsung ba la rab tu 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni gsung ba la rab tu 'jug pa ste /
translated: This is the engagement in speech,

original: de la gzhol bar mdzad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽lus dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de la gzhol bar mdzad pa yin pa'i phyir ro // lus dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: because he is intent on that.

original: lus la sogs pa sku dang gsung dang thugs su bsgom pa ni /
analyzed: lus la sogs pa sku dang gsung dang thugs su bsgom pa ni /
translated: The body, etc., are the meditation on body, speech, and mind.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i tshul gyis bsgom pa yongs su shes pas /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i tshul gyis bsgom pa yongs su shes pas /
translated: The meditation on body, speech, and mind is the meditation on the vajra body, speech, and mind, because of the knowledge of the meditation on the vajra body, speech, and mind.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje bsgom par bya'o //
translated: The meditation on the vajra body, speech, and mind should be done.

original: ji ltar zhe na /🔽rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pas //
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na / rnam par mi rtog mi dmigs pas //
translated: How is that?🔽It is said:

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: By non-conceptuality and non-apprehension.🔽This is the distinction of action.

original: bya ba'i khyad par 'di ni lus so //
analyzed: bya ba'i khyad par 'di ni lus so //
translated: This is the body,

original: 'di ni ngag go //
analyzed: 'di ni ngag go //
translated: this is speech,

original: 'di ni yid do zhes de kho na nyid du med pas na rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni yid do zhes de kho na nyid du med pas na rnam par mi rtog pa'o //
translated: this is mind. Since they do not exist in reality, there is non-conceptuality.

original: gcig la gcig brten pa med pas na mi dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: gcig la gcig brten pa med pas na mi dmigs pa'o //
translated: Since they do not depend on each other, there is non-apprehension.

original: gsum po de dag gi ro gcig pa ni mnyam pa nyid de /
analyzed: gsum po de dag gi ro gcig pa ni mnyam pa nyid de /
translated: The single taste of those three is equality.

original: des na gang na yang mi gnas mnyam pa nyid ces bya ste /
analyzed: des na gang na yang mi gnas mnyam pa nyid ces bya ste /
translated: Therefore, it is called not dwelling anywhere, equality.

original: dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the non-intentional explanation.

original: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gis /
analyzed: de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gis /
translated: Thus, by the speech of the Bhagavān,

original: lus la sogs pa don dam par dbyer med par rab tu bstan nas /
analyzed: lus la sogs pa don dam par dbyer med par rab tu bstan nas /
translated: the inseparability of body, etc. in the ultimate has been well taught.

original: sdud par byed pas snying po yang dag par bskul ba'i thabs dang mthun pa'i gzhi rnam par dgod pa mdor bsdus nas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sdud par byed pas snying po yang dag par bskul ba'i thabs dang mthun pa'i gzhi rnam par dgod pa mdor bsdus nas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach in brief the method of encouraging the essence, the compiler sets forth the basis in accordance with the method:

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: Then, he said, etc.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i rim gyis so //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa'i rim gyis so //
translated: Then, by the process just explained,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin gyis dag pa /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin gyis dag pa /
translated: the Tathagatas, who are pure by nature,

original: pha rol tu phyin pa ni spyan la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa ni spyan la sogs pa'o //
translated: the perfections, which are Locana and so on,

original: sngags ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sngags ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ste /
translated: and the mantras, which are Vairocana and so on,

original: de dag gi tshul ni phan tshun kun du chags pa ste /
analyzed: de dag gi tshul ni phan tshun kun du chags pa ste /
translated: are the method of mutual union.

original: de nyid ni mi 'jigs pa nyid pas na rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni mi 'jigs pa nyid pas na rdo rje'o //
translated: That itself is the vajra, because it is fearless.

original: de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la thugs rtse gcig tu bzhag cing /
analyzed: de skad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la thugs rtse gcig tu bzhag cing /
translated: Having thus concentrated his mind one-pointedly in the samadhi called that,

original: snyoms par zhugs par mdzad nas /
analyzed: snyoms par zhugs par mdzad nas /
translated: and entered into union,

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsol ba 'debs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsol ba 'debs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: the Blessed One Vajradhara said this to all those Tathagatas who were supplicating:

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Blessed One, all Tathagatas and so on.

original: bcom ldan @71b 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan @71b 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni bod pa'o //
translated: Blessed One, all Tathagatas refers to Akshobhya and so on.

original: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba ni /
translated: All Tathagatas refers to Vairochana and so on.

original: 'di bstan pa'i bya ba la mngon par sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: 'di bstan pa'i bya ba la mngon par sbyor ba ste /
translated: He is engaged in the activity of teaching this.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rdzogs pa'o //
translated: All the Tathagatas are complete.

original: rig pa ni lha mo rnams te /
analyzed: rig pa ni lha mo rnams te /
translated: The knowledge is the goddesses.

original: de rnams ni lhan cig spyod pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas bye ba snyed de /
analyzed: de rnams ni lhan cig spyod pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas bye ba snyed de /
translated: They are as many as the ten million, by the division into the companions, etc.

original: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Many hundreds of thousands of niyutas of kotis means

original: de rnams tshad med pa nyid pas nye bar mtshon pa tsam du gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de rnams tshad med pa nyid pas nye bar mtshon pa tsam du gyur pa ste /
translated: that they are immeasurable, and so are merely indicated.

original: de rnams dang thabs cig tu'o //
analyzed: de rnams dang thabs cig tu'o //
translated: Together with them.

original: sems can yul la nye bar longs spyod pas thar pa thob par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: sems can yul la nye bar longs spyod pas thar pa thob par 'dod pa'o //
translated: They are sentient beings who desire to attain liberation by enjoying the objects.

original: de rnams kyi don bya ba ni 'dun pa dang rjes su mthun bas byang chub thob par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi don bya ba ni 'dun pa dang rjes su mthun bas byang chub thob par mdzad pa'o //
translated: The activity for their sake is the attainment of enlightenment, in accordance with their aspiration.

original: de'i bdag nyid kyis gar gyi gnas su zhugs pa'i gar mkhan dang 'dra bar /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyis gar gyi gnas su zhugs pa'i gar mkhan dang 'dra bar /
translated: Like an actor who has entered the stage in that guise,

original: 'jug pas gar gyi rol pa de ston par mdzad do //
analyzed: 'jug pas gar gyi rol pa de ston par mdzad do //
translated: he displays that dance of engagement.

original: ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: phyogs bcu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He declares, in the ten directions, etc.

original: 'jig rten ni sems can rnams so //
analyzed: 'jig rten ni sems can rnams so //
translated: The world is the sentient beings.

original: de 'dzin par byed pas na 'jig rten gyi khams te /
analyzed: de 'dzin par byed pas na 'jig rten gyi khams te /
translated: The world-realms are so called because they hold the world.

original: snod kyi 'jig rten ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams te /
analyzed: snod kyi 'jig rten ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams te /
translated: The physical world is the world-realms in the ten directions.

original: de dag nyid kyis mthas klas pa ni mthar thug pa ste /
analyzed: de dag nyid kyis mthas klas pa ni mthar thug pa ste /
translated: The infinite extent of those is the limit.

original: 'dir mthar thug pa med pa nyid mthar gyur pa yin la /
analyzed: 'dir mthar thug pa med pa nyid mthar gyur pa yin la /
translated: Here, the very absence of limit is the limit.

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rnams su /
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de rnams su /
translated: In those world-realms, which are the infinite extent of the world-realms in the ten directions,

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po rtag tu tshim par byed pa'i gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyis rol pa ni rnam par rol pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po rtag tu tshim par byed pa'i gzugs la sogs pa rnams kyis rol pa ni rnam par rol pa'o //
translated: he plays with the five sense objects, such as form, which always satisfy.

original: dgyes pa ni sna tshogs pa'i dga' bas lha mo rnams dang lhan cig dgyes par mdzad pa'o //
analyzed: dgyes pa ni sna tshogs pa'i dga' bas lha mo rnams dang lhan cig dgyes par mdzad pa'o //
translated: He delights with the goddesses in various kinds of joy.

original: yongs su spyod pa ni rig pa'i tshogs kyis mchod cing /
analyzed: yongs su spyod pa ni rig pa'i tshogs kyis mchod cing /
translated: He enjoys the assembly of knowledge-women,

original: de la yang sngar mchod pa mdzad pa 'di ni yongs su spyod pa'o //
analyzed: de la yang sngar mchod pa mdzad pa 'di ni yongs su spyod pa'o //
translated: and he also enjoys the worship that they perform.

original: yod kyang zhes bya ba ni don 'di lta bu yod pa'o //
analyzed: yod kyang zhes bya ba ni don 'di lta bu yod pa'o //
translated: “Even though they exist” means that this meaning exists.

original: de dag sngags spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la zhes bya ba la /🔽de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dgyes pa'i sgo nas /
analyzed: de dag sngags spyod pa la mngon par brtson pa rnams la zhes bya ba la / de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dgyes pa'i sgo nas /
translated: “For those who are intent on the practice of mantra” means🔽those who are intent on the practice of mantra.🔽Those are the Tathāgatas who, through delighting in the door of supreme joy,

original: mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba nyams su myong bar mdzad pa de dag go //
analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba nyams su myong bar mdzad pa de dag go //
translated: experience the bliss of supreme joy.

original: sngags ni sngags smra ba rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: sngags ni sngags smra ba rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: Mantra is the four kinds of mantra-speakers.

original: gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhe na /
translated: What are they?

original: sngags kyi ming dang / sngags kyi don dang / sngags spel ba dang / rdo rje'i tshig sgra spangs pa'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi ming dang / sngags kyi don dang / sngags spel ba dang / rdo rje'i tshig sgra spangs pa'o //
translated: The name of the mantra, the meaning of the mantra, the expansion of the mantra, and the vajra-word that abandons sound.🔽By those methods,

original: thabs de dag gis zhi ba la sogs pa la @72a * //
analyzed: thabs de dag gis zhi ba la sogs pa la @72a * //
translated: the engagement in pacification, etc.

original: rab tu 'jug pa ni sngags spyod pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu 'jug pa ni sngags spyod pa'o //
translated: is the practice of mantra.

original: de la mngon par brtson pa ni de la sems mngon par zhugs pa ste /
analyzed: de la mngon par brtson pa ni de la sems mngon par zhugs pa ste /
translated: Being intent on that is the mind engaged in that.

original: de la spyan ras kyis mi 'tsho'o //
analyzed: de la spyan ras kyis mi 'tsho'o //
translated: They do not look after it.

original: spyan ras kyis mi 'tsho ba'i rgyu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: spyan ras kyis mi 'tsho ba'i rgyu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the cause of not looking after it,

original: kye ma 'di dag ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: kye ma 'di dag ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, “Alas, these beings” and so on.

original: kye ma zhes bya ba ni ma gus pa'o //
analyzed: kye ma zhes bya ba ni ma gus pa'o //
translated: Alas! is a term of disrespect.

original: 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni sngags la gzhol ba rnams so //
analyzed: 'di dag ni zhes bya ba ni sngags la gzhol ba rnams so //
translated: These are those who are devoted to the mantra.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum du byung ba rnams so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa ni dus gsum du byung ba rnams so //
translated: The thus-gone are those who have appeared in the three times.

original: sngags ni 'don zhing slob dpon rnams kyis shu bur zlos pa gang yin pa de ni sngags te /
analyzed: sngags ni 'don zhing slob dpon rnams kyis shu bur zlos pa gang yin pa de ni sngags te /
translated: Mantras are those that are recited and repeated by the masters.

original: yul de la spyod pa ni sngags kyi spyod pa'o //
analyzed: yul de la spyod pa ni sngags kyi spyod pa'o //
translated: The practice is the practice of the mantra.

original: der 'dren zhing thob par byed pas na tshul lo //
analyzed: der 'dren zhing thob par byed pas na tshul lo //
translated: The method is that which leads to and obtains that.

original: de yang rnam pa bdun te /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa bdun te /
translated: That is also of seven kinds.

original: gang zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhe na /
translated: What are they?

original: dkyil 'khor tshogs dang thabs dang ni //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor tshogs dang thabs dang ni //
translated: The maṇḍala, the assembly, the means,🔽The bali, the gathering, the sequence,

original: gtor ma 'dus dang go rims dang // de nyid rnam pa bdun du grags //🔽de ni gsang sngags tshul zhes bshad //
analyzed: gtor ma 'dus dang go rims dang // de nyid rnam pa bdun du grags // de ni gsang sngags tshul zhes bshad //
translated: And the reality are known as the seven.

original: ces bya ba'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba'o //
translated: That is explained as the method of mantra.

original: de nyid rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas /
analyzed: de nyid rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas /
translated: Abiding in the samādhi of the perfection stage,

original: de 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir chos so //
analyzed: de 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir chos so //
translated: the dharma is that which holds that.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul gyi chos rdzogs par gyur pa ni phyir byung bar gyur pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul gyi chos rdzogs par gyur pa ni phyir byung bar gyur pa'o //
translated: The Dharma of the way of mantra practice, which is the complete transmission from one Tathāgata to another of this kind, has appeared externally.

original: chos las zhes bya ba yin mod kyi chos zhes bya ba ni lung gi tshig go //
analyzed: chos las zhes bya ba yin mod kyi chos zhes bya ba ni lung gi tshig go //

analyzed: mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba rjes su myong bar mdzad pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams /

analyzed: 'og nas bshad pa 'di @72b gsungs pa'o //

original: de gang zhe na /
analyzed: de gang zhe na /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i gsang bar gyur pa'i sngags thams cad ni /

analyzed: sprul la sogs pa'i gsang sngags kyi lha rnams so //

analyzed: de rnams kyi snying po ni gang gi srog yang dag par skul bar byed cing /

original: rab tu sad par byed pa ni /
analyzed: rab tu sad par byed pa ni /
translated: The one who awakens fully is

analyzed: sngags thams cad kyi snying po kun du skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba rab tu gsang ba ste /

analyzed: snod ma yin pa rnams la mchog tu sba bar bya ba'o //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni gti mug gi rigs can rnams so ;

analyzed: / de rnams kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi mi phyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis /

analyzed: yang dag par byon cing gshegs pas na dam tshig go //

analyzed: de la sngags pa rnams kyis dmigs shing yid la byas pas na /

analyzed: dmigs pa ste dam tshig de la dmigs pa ni yi ge aom mo //

analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi sku la sogs pa la dmigs pa ni yi ge h'um ngo //

analyzed: chos 'dzin pa thams cad kyi sku la sogs pa la dmigs pa ni yi ge a'a:'o //

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'og nas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni 'og nas bshad pa'o //

analyzed: nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid de de'i sku las yi ge aom //

original: gsung las yi ge a'a:/
analyzed: gsung las yi ge a'a:/
translated: from his speech, the syllable Ah,

original: thugs las yi ge h'um /
analyzed: thugs las yi ge h'um /

analyzed: go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gsung sa shing phyung bar gyur pa'o //
translated: just as they are, were emitted and brought forth.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

analyzed: tshig gi lam nges par brjod pas zhes bya ba ste /

original: tshig gi lam ni kha ste de'i zhal lo //
analyzed: tshig gi lam ni kha ste de'i zhal lo //
translated: the path of words is the mouth, and that is his face.

original: des nges par brjod pa ni ston pa'o //
analyzed: des nges par brjod pa ni ston pa'o //
translated: By that, it is expressed, that is, taught.

original: nges par brjod pa des thugs dang sku dag kyang gsal ba'i tshig gis gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: nges par brjod pa des thugs dang sku dag kyang gsal ba'i tshig gis gsungs pa'o //
translated: By that expression, his mind and body are also expressed by clear words.

original: ji lta bu'i gsung zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu'i gsung zhe na /
translated: What is it like?

original: bud med dang / skyes pa dang / ma ning gi ngo bo nyid kyi yi ge rnams te /
analyzed: bud med dang / skyes pa dang / ma ning gi ngo bo nyid kyi yi ge rnams te /
translated: The syllables of the nature of female, male, and neutral means

analyzed: de yang dag par bsags shing gang du bsdus par gyur pa de ni sngags bsdus te /
translated: those syllables are collected and gathered together, and that is the collected mantra.

original: de yi ge gsum du gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: de yi ge gsum du gsungs pa'o //
translated: That is said to be the three syllables.

analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de nas sngags bsdus pa gsungs pa'i 'og tu yi ge gsum po 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis te /

translated: together with their sons, the bodhisattvas,

analyzed: rnams gzigs pas rab tu 'dar zhing brgyal bar gyur to //

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran // zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: rigs thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje sems dpa' rjes su dran pa ste /
translated: Vajrasattva, the lord of all the clans, is recalled.

original: sems can thams cad rjes su 'dzin par mdzad pa'i ngo bo nyid dran pas /
analyzed: sems can thams cad rjes su 'dzin par mdzad pa'i ngo bo nyid dran pas /

original: brgyal ba ni dga' ba rgya chen po thob par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: brgyal ba ni dga' ba rgya chen po thob par gyur pa ste /
translated: they fainted, that is, they attained great bliss.

original: gyur pa zhes bya ba ni thob pa la bya'o //
analyzed: gyur pa zhes bya ba ni thob pa la bya'o //
translated: The term “fainted” is to be understood as “attained.”

analyzed: de nas de dran pa'i 'og tu phyag na rdo rje ste rdo rje 'chang chen pos /
translated: Then, after that recollection, Vajrapāṇi, that is, Mahāvajradhara,

analyzed: lha thams cad kyis 'da' bar mi bya ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi dam tshig 'og nas bshad pa 'di gsungs so //
translated: taught this pledge, the essence of what is not to be transgressed by any deity, which will be explained below.

original: nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the sky, etc.

original: nam mkha' ni de bzhin nyid de /
analyzed: nam mkha' ni de bzhin nyid de /
translated: The sky is suchness.

original: der 'jog cing bslan pas na nam mkha'i dbyings te /
analyzed: der 'jog cing bslan pas na nam mkha'i dbyings te /
translated: Since it is placed and repeated there, it is the realm of space,

analyzed: dam tshig sems dpa'o // de'i dbus ni snying ga ste /
translated: the pledge being.🔽In its center is the heart center,

original: de la gnas par bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: de la gnas par bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: and the mandala array placed there is

analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya zhing bsam par bya'o //

analyzed: de'i ste ye shes sems dpa' de'i dbus su gnas pa ni snying gar gnas pa ste /
translated: In the center of that, that is, in the heart center of the wisdom being,

analyzed: yi ge h'um ni ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' zhes bya'o //
translated: the syllable hūṃ is called the concentration being.

analyzed: gsum po de dag rang gi gzugs su ste rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu brtag cing bskyed par bya'o //
translated: Those three are to be fully imagined, that is, generated, in one’s form, that is, with one’s own nature.

analyzed: de rnams las ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dpa' rdo rje'i 'od zer shas cher 'bar zhing /
translated: From those, the vajra light rays of the samādhi being blaze intensely.🔽

original: rnam par 'phro ba rnam par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: rnam par 'phro ba rnam par bsam par bya ste /
translated: From those, one should imagine that the mind of meditative stabilization, the vajra light-rays, blaze forth and radiate.

original: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga rnams so //
translated: Vajra means the five Tathāgatas.

original: de rnams kyi 'od zer ni dkar po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi 'od zer ni dkar po la sogs pa'o //
translated: Their light-rays are white, etc.

original: de shas cher 'bar ba ni shin tu 'bar ba'o //
analyzed: de shas cher 'bar ba ni shin tu 'bar ba'o //
translated: Their blazing forth is their great blazing.

original: rnam par 'phro ba ni 'bar bar gyur pa nyid du bsam par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par 'phro ba ni 'bar bar gyur pa nyid du bsam par bya ba'o //
translated: Radiating is imagining that they become blazing.

original: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa /🔽rdzogs pa dang ma rdzogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa / rdzogs pa dang ma rdzogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ste /
translated: The Buddhas are Vairochana, etc.

analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: The perfect and imperfect Tathāgatas are those who dwell in the world systems of the ten directions.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi nus pa ste /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi nus pa ste /
translated: Their body, speech, and mind are the power of body, speech, and mind.

analyzed: dam tshig sems dpa' las byung ba'i dkar po la sogs pa'i 'od zer gyi lcags kyus thugs ka nas drang pa'i rnam pa bsgom zhing bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate and imagine that the hook of light rays, white and so on, which come from the commitment being, draws the wisdom being from his heart.

original: de ltar slob pa'i sgrub pa pos skad cig ma de ma thag nyid du drangs shing /
analyzed: de ltar slob pa'i sgrub pa pos skad cig ma de ma thag nyid du drangs shing /
translated: The practitioner who trains in this way, in that very instant, is drawn by the commitment being,

original: dam tshig sems dpa' la bcug pa nyid kyis /
analyzed: dam tshig sems dpa' la bcug pa nyid kyis /
translated: and by entering into the commitment being,

original: thams cad zil gyis mnan nas rdo rje 'chang bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: thams cad zil gyis mnan nas rdo rje 'chang bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: he becomes Vajradhara, who has overcome all.

original: @73b de ji lta bu'i ngo bo nyid du zhe na /🔽sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin //
analyzed: @73b de ji lta bu'i ngo bo nyid du zhe na / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin //
translated: What is his nature?

original: zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes pa ste /
translated: He is the holder of the vajra of body, speech, and mind.🔽He is the holder of the vajra of body, speech, and mind,

original: sku la sogs pa mi phyed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir /🔽sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin to //
analyzed: sku la sogs pa mi phyed pa'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin to //
translated: because he has the nature of the indivisibility of body and so on.

original: chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
analyzed: chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
translated: The great ones are the Tathagatas,

original: de rnams dgyes par byed pas rgyal po che'o //
analyzed: de rnams dgyes par byed pas rgyal po che'o //
translated: and he is the great king because he delights them.

original: kun ni rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: kun ni rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'o //
translated: All means the moving and unmoving.

original: de rnams kyi gtso bo ni tshangs ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi gtso bo ni tshangs ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: The chief of them is Brahma and so on.

original: de rnams kyang chad pas tshar gcod pa dang rjes su 'dzin par mdzad pas /
analyzed: de rnams kyang chad pas tshar gcod pa dang rjes su 'dzin par mdzad pas /
translated: And since he punishes and favors them all,

original: kun gyi gtso bo dbang phyug mchog ste /
analyzed: kun gyi gtso bo dbang phyug mchog ste /
translated: he is the supreme lord of all.

original: rnam pa de lta bu'i rdo rje 'chang chen por bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: rnam pa de lta bu'i rdo rje 'chang chen por bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: Thus, one should meditate on oneself as Great Vajradhara.

original: rang gi dkyil 'khor ni rang gi lus kyi dkyil 'khor ro //🔽de'i rang gi rdo rjes te /
analyzed: rang gi dkyil 'khor ni rang gi lus kyi dkyil 'khor ro // de'i rang gi rdo rjes te /
translated: One's own mandala is the mandala of one's own body.🔽One's own vajra is one's own mind.

original: rang gi sems kyis bskyed pa'i cho ga 'di nyid do //
analyzed: rang gi sems kyis bskyed pa'i cho ga 'di nyid do //
translated: This very rite is generated.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni bshad ma thag pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: This is what was just explained.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni dus gsum du byung ba rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhes bya ba ni dus gsum du byung ba rnams kyi'o //
translated: Of all the buddhas means of those in the three times.

original: snying po ni brtan par gyur pa'o //
analyzed: snying po ni brtan par gyur pa'o //
translated: The essence is what has become firm.

original: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs so //🔽de rnams kyi bsdus pa ni dgug pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs so // de rnams kyi bsdus pa ni dgug pa ste /
translated: The vajra is the mind of all the tathagatas.🔽Their gathering is the summoning.

original: 'dis bsdus shing drangs pas na bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis bsdus shing drangs pas na bsdus pa'o //
translated: It is a gathering because it is drawn in by this.

original: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi ngo bo nyid du bdag nyid bskyed nas /
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi ngo bo nyid du bdag nyid bskyed nas /
translated: Having thus generated oneself as the very essence of the mind of all the Tathagatas,

original: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar bskyed ba de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar bskyed ba de bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to demonstrate the generation of the retinue mandala,

original: rang sngags zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rang sngags zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “one’s own mantra,” and so forth.

original: rang ste bdag nyid kyi gnas bzhi ste /
analyzed: rang ste bdag nyid kyi gnas bzhi ste /
translated: One’s own, that is, one’s own, four places,

original: shar la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su gzugs kyi tshul te /
analyzed: shar la sogs pa'i gnas rnams su gzugs kyi tshul te /
translated: the places of east, and so forth, in the manner of forms,

original: ji skad du gsungs pa'i sku ma dog dang phyag mtshan gyi gzugs kyi tshul du'o //
analyzed: ji skad du gsungs pa'i sku ma dog dang phyag mtshan gyi gzugs kyi tshul du'o //
translated: in the manner of forms of bodies and emblems as described.

original: zhal gsum lta bu'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: zhal gsum lta bu'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: By the application of the three faces,

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: one is like,

original: cha 'dra zhing gsal bar gzung ba yin pas na lta bu ste /
analyzed: cha 'dra zhing gsal bar gzung ba yin pas na lta bu ste /
translated: since one is similar and clearly apprehended.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags la sogs pa'o //
translated: They are passion and so forth.

original: de rnams kyis sbyor bas na zhal gsum lta bu'i sbyor ba yis zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyis sbyor bas na zhal gsum lta bu'i sbyor ba yis zhes bya ba ste /
translated: By the application of those, by the application of the three faces,

original: des nye bar mtshon par byas pa'o //
analyzed: des nye bar mtshon par byas pa'o //
translated: that is illustrated.

analyzed: kha dog gsum gyis zhes pa ni yi ge gsum gyis sngags kyi skyes bu ste /

analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa gnas bzhir bsgom zhing bsams la bslab par bya'o //

original: rig pa 'dis ji ltar rang gi rigs de dang 'bral ba'i lha'i tshogs spro bar byas pa ste /
analyzed: rig pa 'dis ji ltar rang gi rigs de dang 'bral ba'i lha'i tshogs spro bar byas pa ste /

original: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyis so /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i nye bar mtshon pa nyid kyis so /
translated: by the very indication of the four Tathagatas.

original: @74a * // bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
analyzed: @74a * // bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
translated: The Blessed One, Vajra-Commitment, is Great Vajradhara.

original: des de skad ces bka' stsal pa'o //
analyzed: des de skad ces bka' stsal pa'o //
translated: He thus spoke.

original: de ltar bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par sprul nas yang ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par sprul nas yang ci zhig bya zhe na /

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

analyzed: de la zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs yang dag par bskul ba la'o //
translated: Thereupon means in the arousing of the mind of the Tathāgatas.

original: 'di ni zhes pa ni 'og nas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni zhes pa ni 'og nas bshad pa'o //
translated: This means what is explained below.

original: mchog ni dam pa'o //
analyzed: mchog ni dam pa'o //
translated: Supreme means highest.

original: rdo rje gsang ba ni de bzhin gshegs po'i gsang ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsang ba ni de bzhin gshegs po'i gsang ba'o //
translated: Vajra-secret means the secret of the Tathāgatas.

original: snying ga'i dbus su phra mo yi //
analyzed: snying ga'i dbus su phra mo yi //
translated: In the center of the heart, the subtle,

original: dkyil 'khor rnams ni bsam par bya //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rnams ni bsam par bya //
translated: The maṇḍalas should be contemplated.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

analyzed: dkyil 'khor nyid dang dbyer med pas dkyil 'khor pa rnams so //
translated: The maṇḍalas are the maṇḍala-beings because they are inseparable from the maṇḍalas.

original: dkyil 'khor pa de rnams kyi re re'i snying ga'i dbus su chud par snying ga'i zla ba la gnas pa phra ba bsgom par bya zhing /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor pa de rnams kyi re re'i snying ga'i dbus su chud par snying ga'i zla ba la gnas pa phra ba bsgom par bya zhing /
translated: In the center of each of those maṇḍalas, one should contemplate the subtle [vajra-being] abiding in the moon of the heart.

original: khyad par du bsam par bya ba yin pas na bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: khyad par du bsam par bya ba yin pas na bsam par bya ste /
translated: Since it is to be contemplated in particular, it is to be contemplated.

original: ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pas na phra ba ste /
analyzed: ye shes kyi rang bzhin yin pas na phra ba ste /
translated: Since it is the nature of gnosis, it is subtle.

original: ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: Up to: “One should contemplate the gnosis being.”

original: yi ge mchog du gyur ba'i tshig / de yi dbus su bsam par bya //
analyzed: yi ge mchog du gyur ba'i tshig / de yi dbus su bsam par bya //
translated: The supreme syllable, the word, should be contemplated in its center.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is saying:

original: ye shes sems dpa' de'i dbus su chud cing thugs kyi zla bar chud pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' de'i dbus su chud cing thugs kyi zla bar chud pa de bzhin du /
translated: In the center of that gnosis being, abiding in the heart and in the moon of the heart,

original: so so'i yi ge ste mi 'gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid mchog tu gyur pa ni /
analyzed: so so'i yi ge ste mi 'gyur pa'i ngo bo nyid mchog tu gyur pa ni /
translated: the individual syllable, which is the supreme unchanging nature,

original: mi shigs pa las byung ba'i phyir phul du byung ba yin no //
analyzed: mi shigs pa las byung ba'i phyir phul du byung ba yin no //
translated: is the best because it arises from the indestructible.

original: tshig ni yi ge h'um ngo //
analyzed: tshig ni yi ge h'um ngo //
translated: The word is the syllable hūṃ.

original: rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa //
analyzed: rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa //
translated: The great five-pronged vajra

original: rtag tu sbyor bas bsgom par bya //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rtag tu sbyor bas bsgom par bya // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: is always meditated upon by means of union.

original: sbyor bas zhes pa sgrub pa po nges par legs pa la sbyor bar byed pas na sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: sbyor bas zhes pa sgrub pa po nges par legs pa la sbyor bar byed pas na sbyor ba ste /
translated: The one who is called “by means of union” is the adept, because he is united with definite goodness.

original: ting nge 'dzin gyis sems dpa'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyis sems dpa'o //
translated: He is the being of meditative concentration.

original: de las rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa kha rnam par gyis pa bsam zhing bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de las rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa kha rnam par gyis pa bsam zhing bsgom par bya'o //
translated: From that, one should imagine and meditate on the great five-pronged vajra, its mouth wide open.

original: tshul 'dis na dam tshig dang ye shes dang ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' zhes grags pa'i gsum po de dag mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste /
analyzed: tshul 'dis na dam tshig dang ye shes dang ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' zhes grags pa'i gsum po de dag mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste /
translated: By this method, the three renowned ones—the being of commitment, the being of gnosis, and the being of meditative concentration—are indivisible, and so are the vajra.

original: de bsam zhing bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de bsam zhing bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine and meditate on that.

original: rdo rje kyo ba'i sbyor ba yis //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rdo rje kyo ba'i sbyor ba yis // zhes bya ba la /
translated: By means of the union of the vajra hook,

original: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
translated: the vajras are the tathāgatas.

original: de rnams kyi lcags kyu dang 'dra bas na kyo ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi lcags kyu dang 'dra bas na kyo ba ste /
translated: They are like hooks, and so are called “hooks.”

original: blang po che'i bzhin no //
analyzed: blang po che'i bzhin no //
translated: They are like the great hook.

original: de'i sbyor ba ni rdo rje kyo ba'i sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba ni rdo rje kyo ba'i sbyor ba ste /
translated: The union of that is the union of the vajra hook.

original: rdo rje kyo ba'i sbyor ba de las rdo rje gsum rnam par bsdom par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje kyo ba'i sbyor ba de las rdo rje gsum rnam par bsdom par bya'o //
translated: From that union of the Vajra Hook, one should “bind the three vajras.”

original: sbyor ba de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sbyor ba de nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach just that union,

original: de yi snying gar zhes bya ba la @74b sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de yi snying gar zhes bya ba la @74b sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “at his heart,” and so on.

original: de yis zhes pa ni rdo rje gsum gyis so //
analyzed: de yis zhes pa ni rdo rje gsum gyis so //
translated: “ By that” means by the three vajras.

original: snying ga ste bsgrub par bya ba'i lha'i snying gar brdab par bya zhing bskyod par bya ste /
analyzed: snying ga ste bsgrub par bya ba'i lha'i snying gar brdab par bya zhing bskyod par bya ste /
translated: One should “tap” and “agitate” at the heart, that is, at the heart of the deity to be accomplished.

original: bdag po la sogs pa sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor pa rnams gcig tu gyur pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi lcags kyus /
analyzed: bdag po la sogs pa sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi dkyil 'khor pa rnams gcig tu gyur pa'i 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi lcags kyus /
translated: The assembly of the maṇḍala, which is of the nature of the three beings, the lord, and so on, should be unified by the hook of the mass of light rays.

original: bsgrub par bya ba'i lha'i thugs kar sems dpa' gsum du grags pa bskul bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ji snyed pa'i lha rnams kyi tshogs bskul bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: bsgrub par bya ba'i lha'i thugs kar sems dpa' gsum du grags pa bskul bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i sgras ni ji snyed pa'i lha rnams kyi tshogs bskul bar bya ba'o //
translated: One should “agitate” the three beings at the heart of the deity to be accomplished. The word “and so on” indicates that one should agitate the assembly of all the deities.

original: rdo rje lcags kyus brdab pas sgrub pa po la dgongs par bya ba bskyed pa'i 'og tu /
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyus brdab pas sgrub pa po la dgongs par bya ba bskyed pa'i 'og tu /

original: gnod mdzes rgyal po mdun du 'dug ste /
analyzed: gnod mdzes rgyal po mdun du 'dug ste /

original: bka' lung nod par bsams la /
analyzed: bka' lung nod par bsams la /

analyzed: de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bdag la dngos grub sbyin par bskul cig ces lung bsgo'o //
translated: The Tathagatas command him, “You must request the spiritual powers for me.”

original: 'di ni zhes pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i cho ga ste /
analyzed: 'di ni zhes pa ni bshad ma thag pa'i cho ga ste /
translated: “This” refers to the rite that has just been explained.

analyzed: de ni rdo rje can thams cad kyi zhes pa sgrub pa po thams cad kyi'o //

original: sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa'o //
translated: “The attainment of the enlightenment of the Buddhas”

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: sangs rgyas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /
translated: the Buddhas are the Tathāgatas.

analyzed: de rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems rab tu sgrub pa ni 'gugs pa'o //
translated: The attainment of their enlightenment mind is the summoning.

original: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: With regard to the vajra hook, etc.,

analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi rdo rje kyo ba bsgom pa ni /
translated: the meditation on the vajra hook that has the nature of the three beings, as just explained,

original: rdo rje padmo rigs la sogs //
analyzed: rdo rje padmo rigs la sogs //
translated: is the vajra hook of the lotus family, etc.

analyzed: zhes bya ba ste sogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rin po che dang las kyi rigs kyi sgrub pa pos kyang nyams su blangs pa'o //

analyzed: 'di ni zhes pa bshad ma thag pa'i snying ga bskul pa ste /
translated: “ This” refers to the invocation of the heart just explained.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rab tu bskul ba de ni /
translated: That invocation of the heart of the Tathāgata

analyzed: rol mo ltar 'byung bas na rol mo'i 'byung ba ste /

analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa gzhan du yongs su rtogs par byed pa'o //
translated: and the one who is dancing is known to be different from the dancer,

analyzed: de bzhin du 'dir yang thugs rdo rje gcig pu bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa po dang bsgrub pa'i tshul gyis yongs su rtog go zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //

analyzed: thugs yang dag par bskul ba 'di'i dus kyi tshad bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the time period of this invocation of the heart,

analyzed: rdo rje yi ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares the vajra, etc.

analyzed: rdo rje yi ni tshul mchog 'di // zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: rdo rje ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams te /

analyzed: cho ga gang gis khrid cing drangs pa gang yin pa de ni rdo rje'i tshul lo //

analyzed: de la mchog @75a * //
translated: Among those, it is supreme,

analyzed: tu gyur cing phul du byung bas na /

original: rdo rje yi ni tshul mchog ste /
analyzed: rdo rje yi ni tshul mchog ste /

original: de'i chog de rjes su bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i chog de rjes su bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: That rite should be accomplished.

original: zhag bdun bar du byas na ni /
analyzed: zhag bdun bar du byas na ni /
translated: If it is performed for seven days,

original: brtsams pa'i nyin mo nas bzung ste /
analyzed: brtsams pa'i nyin mo nas bzung ste /

analyzed: nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du bya ba'o //

analyzed: ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /

analyzed: 'grub par 'gyur ba ni sgrub pa po la'o // 'jigs shing zhes bya ba ni 'jigs par gyur pa ste /

original: 'da' bas 'jigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'da' bas 'jigs pa'o //

original: de ltar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang /
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang /
translated: In that way, the Tathagatas

original: skrag gyur nas zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: skrag gyur nas zhes bya ba ste /
translated: become frightened,

original: thugs rje'i dbang du gyur pas /
analyzed: thugs rje'i dbang du gyur pas /
translated: because of the power of compassion.

original: bgegs med pa'i thugs kyi sgrub pa po la /
analyzed: bgegs med pa'i thugs kyi sgrub pa po la /
translated: They see the adept who is free from obstacles,

original: mchog stsol bar gzigs bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: mchog stsol bar gzigs bar 'gyur te /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni byams pa la sogs pa'o // sngags kyi spyod pa'i mchog sgrub pas //
translated: The Bodhisattva is Maitreya, etc.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The supreme accomplishment of the mantra practice is

analyzed: byang chub nyid la slob pa'i grub pa'i skyes bu rnams so //

analyzed: de ltar nan tan mi byed pa'i sgrub pa po cir 'gyur zhe na /

original: rmongs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rmongs pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

analyzed: gal te rmongs pa'i bdag nyid can 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
translated: The Tathāgata is like that,

original: bdag ni tha mal pa'o zhes gang yongs su rtogs pa de ni rmongs pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni tha mal pa'o zhes gang yongs su rtogs pa de ni rmongs pa'o //

analyzed: de lta bu'i gti mug gi bdag nyid can gyi ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The nature of such a deluded person is

original: rmongs pa'i bdag nyid can te /
analyzed: rmongs pa'i bdag nyid can te /
translated: the deluded nature.

original: de ni sgrub pa po de'i srog gi tha ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni sgrub pa po de'i srog gi tha ma yin te /

analyzed: las gang gis dngos grub tu 'dod pa'i las des srog zad par 'gyur gyi dngos grub thob par yang mi 'gyur te /

original: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
analyzed: sgra ji bzhin pa'o //

analyzed: de ltar thun mong gi sgrub pa la zhugs pa rnams kyi snying po yang dag par bskul ba'i sbyor ba bstan nas /

analyzed: da ni dngos grub mchog la gnas pa rnams kyi bstan par bya ba'i phyir /

analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to // gsung ni 'di skad ces bya ba ni tshig 'di skad do //
translated: The meaning of “then” and so forth has been explained.🔽“This speech” means these words.

analyzed: bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni gsungs pa'o // gang su yang rung ba'i sngags kyi gsang ba la zhugs pa'i skyes bu ni /

original: sngags kyi skyes bu ji snyed pa'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi skyes bu ji snyed pa'o //
translated: is a mantra practitioner.

original: rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams so //

original: des yongs su rdzogs pas na yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: des yongs su rdzogs pas na yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
translated: Since they are perfected by that, they are perfected.

original: de rnams kyi dngos po thams cad brtag pa ni dbang po gnyis kyis sbyor bas 'gyur gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dngos po thams cad brtag pa ni dbang po gnyis kyis sbyor bas 'gyur gyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin te /

original: dngos po thams cad brtag par bya //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: dngos po thams cad brtag par bya // zhes bya ba la /

analyzed: dngos po thams cad ni bshad ma thag pa dang / 'og nas bshad pa ste sgrub pa dang bsgrub par bya ba la sogs pa'i rab tu sbyor ba'o //

original: de rnams kyi brtag pa ni bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi brtag pa ni bskyed pa'o //

original: de ni / dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: de ni / dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis // zhes bya ba ste /

original: dbang po gnyis ni bden pa gnyis so //
analyzed: dbang po gnyis ni bden pa gnyis so //

original: de'i sbyor ba ni gcig tu 'dus pa ste /
analyzed: de'i sbyor ba ni gcig tu 'dus pa ste /

original: des 'gyur ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub ci yang rung ba de ni /
analyzed: des 'gyur ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub ci yang rung ba de ni /

analyzed: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba dang bral bas 'grub par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: It is thought that one will not succeed without the practice of the union of the two organs.🔽This, etc.

analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la gang bshad ma thag pa'i sbyor bas sgrub pa rdzogs par byed pa 'di ni /
translated: This, which is the completion of the practice by the method just explained, is

analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'brel pa'i sngags kyi dam tshig ste /

original: 'da' bar mi bya ba gang yin pa de ni sngags kyi dam tshig go //
analyzed: 'da' bar mi bya ba gang yin pa de ni sngags kyi dam tshig go //

original: de rnams kyi bsgom pa ni bsgom pa'i thabs so //
analyzed: de rnams kyi bsgom pa ni bsgom pa'i thabs so //
translated: The cultivation of that is the method of cultivation.

original: rig ma'i dbang phyug ces bya ba la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: rig ma'i dbang phyug ces bya ba la sogs pas ni /
translated: The Lord of Knowledge, etc.

original: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor pa'i thabs gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor pa'i thabs gsungs pa yin te /
translated: teaches the method of the union of the two organs.

original: rig ma'i dbang phyug ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rig ma'i dbang phyug ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: The Lord of Knowledge is the perfection of wisdom.

original: der zhugs pas phung po la sogs pa rnams mi snang bar byas nas /
analyzed: der zhugs pas phung po la sogs pa rnams mi snang bar byas nas /
translated: Having entered there, having made the aggregates, etc., invisible,

original: rdo rje'i sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: rdo rje'i sbyor ba ste /
translated: one should practice the vajra union.

original: kun rdzob dang / don @76a * //
analyzed: kun rdzob dang / don @76a * //
translated: The conventional and ultimate

original: dam pa'i bden pa zhes grags pa'i sbyor ba ste /
analyzed: dam pa'i bden pa zhes grags pa'i sbyor ba ste /
