original: sbyor ba ni gcig tu byas pa yin la /
analyzed: sbyor ba ni gcig tu byas pa yin la /
translated: The practice is made into one,

original: de bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de bsgom par bya ba'o //
translated: and that is to be cultivated.

original: de nas grub par gyur na ci zhig bya zhe na /
analyzed: de nas grub par gyur na ci zhig bya zhe na /
translated: Then, when one has become accomplished, what is to be done?

original: chags la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: chags la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The verse beginning with “passion” is stated.

original: don dam pa'i bden pa la zhugs pa'i 'og tu bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can gyi rang gi phyag rgya chen po bskyed la /
analyzed: don dam pa'i bden pa la zhugs pa'i 'og tu bden pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid can gyi rang gi phyag rgya chen po bskyed la /

original: de khams gsum du yongs su mi sbong ba'i sbyor bas chags shing zhen pa dang / chags pas lta ba ni khams gsum na gnas pa'i sems can gyi tshogs rnams kyis 'di ni bdag cag gi pha'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i blo bskyed de /

translated: By the practice of not abandoning that into the three realms, one should be passionate and attached, and one should view with passion the hosts of sentient beings dwelling in the three realms, generating the thought “This is our father,” and so on.

original: tshogs pa dang bcas shing mang du gces par 'dzin pa'i lta bas blta bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa dang bcas shing mang du gces par 'dzin pa'i lta bas blta bar shes par bya'o //

analyzed: 'di ni zhes pa bshad ma thag pa gang yin pa de ni dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor te /

analyzed: dam tshig ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //

original: de'i dkyil ni snying por gyur pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dkyil ni snying por gyur pa'o //

analyzed: de len cing 'dzin pas na dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor te ;

original: / de gang zhe na cho ga'o //
analyzed: / de gang zhe na cho ga'o //

analyzed: de ltar thabs dang bcas shing 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i thugs yang dag par bskul ba bstan nas /

analyzed: de grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rab tu 'jug pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, “Then, all the tathāgatas, etc. ”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa kun ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs par yongs su brtag pa'i gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa kun ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs par yongs su brtag pa'i gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: de rnams kyi bdag nyid ni ngo bo nyid de don dam pa'i bden pa'o //

analyzed: de las skyes pas na de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi sras te /

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar byur pas na ;
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar byur pas na ;

original: / thams cad dbang bskur ro //
analyzed: / thams cad dbang bskur ro //

original: de nyid kyis na sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso ste /

original: des 'og nas bshad pa'i gsung 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa'o //
analyzed: des 'og nas bshad pa'i gsung 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa'o //
translated: He, with the following speech,

analyzed: 'jig rten khams ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

analyzed: gzugs rdo rje la sogs par yongs su brtags la /

analyzed: phyag rgya chen po ni rnam pa gnyis te /

original: gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang yin zhe na /

original: sngags kyi sku dang ye shes kyi sku'o //
analyzed: sngags kyi sku dang ye shes kyi sku'o //

analyzed: de la sogs pa'i sbyor ba ni de kho na nyid la dmigs pa ste /

analyzed: des gzugs la sogs @76b pa'i yul de rnams nye bar longs spyod par bya'o //

analyzed: bye ba grangs med rdo rje 'dzin // sangs rgyas gnas ni der spro bya //

analyzed: bye ba grangs med pa'i tshad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas gnas te /

analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to //

analyzed: byang chub 'di yis thob par 'gyur // zhes bya ba ni /

analyzed: 'di thams cad kyi rang gi ngo bo rtogs par mdzad pas na byang chub ste /

analyzed: de sbyor ba 'di yis thob par 'gyur ro //

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /

analyzed: rdo rje gsum po mkha' 'dra ba'i // zhes bya ste /

original: byang chub de 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub de 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Enlightenment is attained by this.

original: slob pa la gnas pa'i phan yon bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: slob pa la gnas pa'i phan yon bstan par bya ba'i phyir /

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

analyzed: slob pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyid /
translated: The bodhisattva who abides in the state of training🔽attains the sublime bliss of Vajrasattva, etc., and the longevity that is long-lived.

analyzed: des 'thob par 'gyur ba ste /

original: dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa'o //

analyzed: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyir /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po bskul ba'i le'u'o //

analyzed: sgron ma gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa las /

analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa le'u bcu gcig pa gsungs te /
translated: the eleventh chapter is stated, beginning with “thereupon.”

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje ni /

original: aom la sogs pa'i yi ge gsum mo //
analyzed: aom la sogs pa'i yi ge gsum mo //

analyzed: des bskyed par gyur pa'i skyes bu'i mchog ni lha ste /
translated: The supreme person generated by that is the deity.

analyzed: de gang zhe na /

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags gsang bar gyur pa'i rdo rje rig pa ni /

analyzed: rdo rje gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /

original: de skyed par byed pa'i yi ge aom la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: de skyed par byed pa'i yi ge aom la sogs pa ni /
translated: The syllables om and so forth that generate them are

original: rdo rje gsum yig ste /
analyzed: rdo rje gsum yig ste /
translated: the three vajra syllables.

original: de las sngags thams cad 'byung bas na sngags kyi mchog yin la /
analyzed: de las sngags thams cad 'byung bas na sngags kyi mchog yin la /
translated: Since all mantras arise from them, they are the supreme mantra.

original: des phyag rgya chen po rnam par bsgom par bya'o //🔽phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba ni sa 'og sa steng sa bla na rab tu mchod pa yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: des phyag rgya chen po rnam par bsgom par bya'o // phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba ni sa 'og sa steng sa bla na rab tu mchod pa yin pa'i phyir /
translated: By them, the great seal should be visualized.🔽The great seal is so called because it is worshipped above, below, and on the earth.

original: mchod pas che ba'i dga' zhing mgu bar 'gro zhing son par gyur pas na phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: mchod pas che ba'i dga' zhing mgu bar 'gro zhing son par gyur pas na phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: Since it is worshipped, it is the great seal, because it is delighted and pleased by worship, and it goes and arrives.

original: de rnam par bsgom pa ni nyams su blangs pa'o //
analyzed: de rnam par bsgom pa ni nyams su blangs pa'o //
translated: The cultivation of those is the practice.

original: byang chub thams cad ni mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga ste /
analyzed: byang chub thams cad ni mngon par byang chub pa rnam pa lnga ste /
translated: All enlightenment is the fivefold manifest enlightenment.

original: de 'thob pa'o //
analyzed: de 'thob pa'o //
translated: That is attained.

original: ye shes rdo rje ni sgrub pa po ste des bya ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje ni sgrub pa po ste des bya ba'o //
translated: The vajra of intuition is the adept, and that is done.

original: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni yi ge gsum gyi bya ba gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: aom zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni yi ge gsum gyi bya ba gang yin pa ste /
translated: With Om and so forth, whatever is done with the three syllables is stated.

original: yi ge aom ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ste /
analyzed: yi ge aom ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ste /
translated: The syllable Om is the essence of the Tathagata.

original: des rnal 'byor pa'i mi phyed pa'i lus skyed pas na rdo rje sku ni thob byed pa'o //
analyzed: des rnal 'byor pa'i mi phyed pa'i lus skyed pas na rdo rje sku ni thob byed pa'o //
translated: Since that generates the indivisible body of the yogi, the vajra body is what is to be attained.

original: byang chub ni de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: byang chub ni de kho na nyid do //
translated: Enlightenment is reality.

original: de las sbrul zhing byung ba'i bdag nyid gang yin pa de ni bdag med pa ste /
analyzed: de las sbrul zhing byung ba'i bdag nyid gang yin pa de ni bdag med pa ste /
translated: That which is emanated from that and arises is selfless,

original: 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: that is, Amitabha.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ni bdag med pa ste bdag med pa ni yi ge a'a: 'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ni bdag med pa ste bdag med pa ni yi ge a'a: 'o //
translated: Its essence is selflessness, and selflessness is the syllable A:.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid kyis rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mi phyed pa'i gsung skyed par byed pas na /
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid kyis rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mi phyed pa'i gsung skyed par byed pas na /
translated: Since its essence generates the indivisible speech of the yogi,

original: rdo rje gsung ni 'thob byed pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsung ni 'thob byed pa'o //
translated: is the attainment of the vajra speech.

original: sku dang gsung la brten par gyur pa'i thugs ni sku gsung thugs te /
analyzed: sku dang gsung la brten par gyur pa'i thugs ni sku gsung thugs te /
translated: The mind that is based on the body and speech is the body, speech, and mind.

original: ma bskyod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdo rje gsum dang mi phyed pas /
analyzed: ma bskyod pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rdo rje gsum dang mi phyed pas /
translated: Since it is inseparable from the three vajras, which are the essence of Akṣhobhya,

original: tha mi dad pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: tha mi dad pa nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: it is the very inseparability.

original: rdo rje mi phyed pa gsum mo //
analyzed: rdo rje mi phyed pa gsum mo //
translated: That is the three inseparable vajras.

original: thugs de rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud la skyed par byed pas na rdo rje mi phyed gsum 'thob pa ste /
analyzed: thugs de rnal 'byor pa'i rgyud la skyed par byed pas na rdo rje mi phyed gsum 'thob pa ste /
translated: Since that mind is generated in the continuum of the yogi, it is the attainment of the three inseparable vajras.

original: yi ge h'um la de skad ces gsungs so //
analyzed: yi ge h'um la de skad ces gsungs so //
translated: That is what is said about the syllable hūṃ.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung @77b dang thugs kyi sngags skyes bu ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung @77b dang thugs kyi sngags skyes bu ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: The person born from the mantra of the body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas is Mahāvajradhara.

original: bshad ma thag pa'i phyag rgya chen po bskyed pa rim bzhin du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i phyag rgya chen po bskyed pa rim bzhin du bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the creation stage of the just-explained great seal,

original: nam mkha' rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: nam mkha' rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “the vajra of space,” and so on.

original: nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus der chud cing gnas par dkyil 'khor rdo rje kun las skyes pa bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus der chud cing gnas par dkyil 'khor rdo rje kun las skyes pa bsam par bya ste /
translated: One should imagine the mandala born from all the vajras, which is situated in the middle of the vajra space.

original: rdo rje kun gyi spyan la sogs pa lha mo bzhi yin la /
analyzed: rdo rje kun gyi spyan la sogs pa lha mo bzhi yin la /
translated: The four goddesses such as Locanā are all vajras.

original: de rnams kyi rim gyis bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rim gyis bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya ba'o //
translated: One should meditate on the mandala generated by them in sequence.

original: de ru ste sa'i cha de'i steng du yi ge bhr'um gzhal yas khang bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de ru ste sa'i cha de'i steng du yi ge bhr'um gzhal yas khang bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa bsam par bya'o //
translated: There, on the surface of the ground, one should imagine the syllable bhrūṃ, which is the cause of the generation of the celestial mansion.

original: rdo rje'i sprin ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs te /
analyzed: rdo rje'i sprin ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs te /
translated: The vajra cloud is the assembly of the tathāgatas.

original: de rnams lhag par mos pas ji lta ba bzhin du spro ba ni 'phro ba ste /
analyzed: de rnams lhag par mos pas ji lta ba bzhin du spro ba ni 'phro ba ste /
translated: One should imagine the emanation of them just as they are by means of superior devotion.

original: de skyed cing 'dzin par byed pas na rdo rje sprin ni 'phro skyed pa ste yi ge bhr'um mo //
analyzed: de skyed cing 'dzin par byed pas na rdo rje sprin ni 'phro skyed pa ste yi ge bhr'um mo //
translated: The vajra cloud, which generates the emanation, is the syllable bhrūṃ.

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni yi ge bhr'um ston to //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni yi ge bhr'um ston to //
translated: The syllable bhrūṃ, etc., shows the syllable bhrūṃ.

original: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The vajra maṇḍala is the maṇḍala of the sun.

original: de'i dbus yi ge h'um gnas par bsgom par bya ba ste /
analyzed: de'i dbus yi ge h'um gnas par bsgom par bya ba ste /
translated: One should meditate on the syllable hūṃ situated in its middle.

original: yi ge h'um las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: yi ge h'um las byung ba'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: One should meditate on the sun maṇḍala arisen from the syllable hūṃ.

original: de bzhin du yi ge aom dang a'a: las byung ba'i zla ba dang padma'i dkyil 'khor yang bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du yi ge aom dang a'a: las byung ba'i zla ba dang padma'i dkyil 'khor yang bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should meditate on the moon and lotus maṇḍalas arisen from the syllables oṃ and āḥ.

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor gsum po bskyed nas /
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor gsum po bskyed nas /
translated: Having generated the three maṇḍalas in that way,

original: padma'i lte ba'i steng du sa bon gsum po de nyid rnam par dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni man ngag yin no //
analyzed: padma'i lte ba'i steng du sa bon gsum po de nyid rnam par dgod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni man ngag yin no //
translated: one should arrange the three seed syllables themselves on top of the center of the lotus. This is the esoteric instruction.

original: yi ge bhr'um gyis gnas bsgoms te //
analyzed: yi ge bhr'um gyis gnas bsgoms te //
translated: One should meditate on the abode with the syllable bhrūṃ.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
translated: And so on.

original: sngar bshad pa'i don nges par byed de /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i don nges par byed de /
translated: This ascertains the meaning explained previously.

original: de bzhin du gzhi'i dkyil 'khor bsams la mtshan ma gsum bsgom par bya'i gzhan du ni ma yin no//🔽snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /🔽dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhi'i dkyil 'khor bsams la mtshan ma gsum bsgom par bya'i gzhan du ni ma yin no// snying po zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi ni /
translated: In the same way, one should meditate on the three signs in the imagined basic maṇḍala, but not elsewhere.🔽The essence of the three times buddhas,

original: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi'o //
analyzed: dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi'o //
translated: the three times tathāgatas.

original: snying po ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te thugs kyi mtshan mar gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: snying po ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te thugs kyi mtshan mar gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The essence is the moon disk, because it is the sign of the mind.

original: sku gsung thugs ni yi ge gsum mo //
analyzed: sku gsung thugs ni yi ge gsum mo //
translated: The body, speech, and mind are the three syllables.

original: des gang la zhen cing gnas pa de ni sku gsung thugs ni mnyes byed pa ste /
analyzed: des gang la zhen cing gnas pa de ni sku gsung thugs ni mnyes byed pa ste /
translated: That which is delighted by them, and in which they abide, is the body, speech, and mind that are delighted.

original: zla ba'i gzugs dang mtshan ma gsum nye bar goms pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zla ba'i gzugs dang mtshan ma gsum nye bar goms pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on the moon form and the three signs.

original: de nas ci zhig ce na /
analyzed: de nas ci zhig ce na /
translated: Then what?

original: aom ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: aom ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: He declares, “The syllable OṀ,” and so on.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor der sangs rgyas kyi sku zhes bya bar btags pa yi ge aom dang / de bzhin @78a * //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor der sangs rgyas kyi sku zhes bya bar btags pa yi ge aom dang / de bzhin @78a * //
translated: In that moon disk, the syllable OṀ is designated as the Buddha’s body, and likewise🔽the syllable AḤ is the path of the Buddha’s speech, and

original: du sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi lam yi ge a'a: dang / ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi tshogs gang la yod pa de ni ye shes 'jing ste thugs so //
analyzed: du sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi lam yi ge a'a: dang / ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi tshogs gang la yod pa de ni ye shes 'jing ste thugs so //
translated: that which has a collection of the nature of intuition is intuition-born, that is, the mind.

original: de'i ngo bo nyid ni yi ge h'um ngo //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo nyid ni yi ge h'um ngo //
translated: Its essence is the syllable HŪṀ.

original: de ltar na yi ge gsum po 'di ni /
analyzed: de ltar na yi ge gsum po 'di ni /
translated: Thus, these three syllables

original: byang chub tshul mchog 'di yin te //
analyzed: byang chub tshul mchog 'di yin te //
translated: are the supreme method of enlightenment.

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: This is what is said.

original: byang chub ni bde ba chen po'i gnas so //
analyzed: byang chub ni bde ba chen po'i gnas so //
translated: Enlightenment is the abode of great bliss.

original: der 'khrid cing thob par byed pas na tshul te /
analyzed: der 'khrid cing thob par byed pas na tshul te /
translated: The path is that which leads to it and causes one to attain it.

original: de gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is that?

original: yi ge gsum yongs su gyur pa las yang dag par byung ba'i mngon par byang chub pa lnga ston par byed pa'i rdo rje'o //
analyzed: yi ge gsum yongs su gyur pa las yang dag par byung ba'i mngon par byang chub pa lnga ston par byed pa'i rdo rje'o //
translated: The vajra that causes the manifestation of the five manifest enlightenments that arise from the complete transformation of the three syllables.

original: de nyid mchog ste /
analyzed: de nyid mchog ste /
translated: That itself is supreme,

original: rigs thams cad kyi dam pa yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rigs thams cad kyi dam pa yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: because it is the best of all families.

original: de ni yi ge gsum po 'di yin no //
analyzed: de ni yi ge gsum po 'di yin no //
translated: That is these three syllables.

original: 'di ni zhes bya ba bshad ma thag pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: 'di ni zhes bya ba bshad ma thag pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That vajra which has just been explained,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad de /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad de /
translated: is the enlightenment of all the buddhas,

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu sgrub par byed pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi byang chub rab tu sgrub par byed pa ste /
translated: that is, of all the yogins of Great Vajradhara,

original: bskyed pa'i rim gyis phyag rgya chen po rdzogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim gyis phyag rgya chen po rdzogs par byed pa'o //
translated: which is accomplished by the creation stage, which perfects the great seal.

original: ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'di dag ni /
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'di dag ni /
translated: The vajra of wisdom, etc.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo ye shes kyi rdo rje rdo rje 'chang chen pos sprul pa ste rab tu bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i ngo bo ye shes kyi rdo rje rdo rje 'chang chen pos sprul pa ste rab tu bstan pa yin no //
translated: The essence of mahāmudrā is the wisdom vajra, which is the emanation of Great Vajradhara, who is fully revealed.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sangs rgyas te rin po che lta bu'i gang zag go //
analyzed: sangs rgyas te rin po che lta bu'i gang zag go //
translated: The buddhas are the persons who are like jewels.

original: de rnams kyi rgyu ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rgyu ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
translated: Their cause is the conventional truth.

original: 'bras bu ni don dam pa'i bden pa ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu ni don dam pa'i bden pa ste /
translated: The result is the ultimate truth.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag 'byung ba //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu dag 'byung ba //
translated: The arising of cause and result

original: zhes bya ba ni skyed pa zhes pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni skyed pa zhes pa ste /
translated: is the generation.

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu las byung ba'i yongs su dag pa'i lha'i sku yin la /
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu las byung ba'i yongs su dag pa'i lha'i sku yin la /
translated: The completely pure divine body that arises from cause and result

original: de'i don du rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sbrul pa'o //
analyzed: de'i don du rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sbrul pa'o //
translated: is for the sake of that, the emanation of Great Vajradhara.

original: 'di dag ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: 'di dag ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In this way,

original: sngags kyi rig pa zhes rtog pa la sogs par bsgrags pa ni /🔽dam tshig dag gis rdzogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: sngags kyi rig pa zhes rtog pa la sogs par bsgrags pa ni / dam tshig dag gis rdzogs par 'gyur //
translated: the mantra knowledge, which is proclaimed in the tantras and so forth,

original: zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste /
translated: is perfected by means of the pure pledges.

original: dam tshig ni bsrung ba dang bza' ba la sogs pa dang bcas par bshad pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig ni bsrung ba dang bza' ba la sogs pa dang bcas par bshad pa'o //
translated: The pledges are explained as the observances, the things to be eaten, and so forth.

original: tshogs par 'gyur ba ni sngon du bsnyen pa dang bcas par gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: tshogs par 'gyur ba ni sngon du bsnyen pa dang bcas par gsungs pa'o //
translated: The assembly is said to be the prior approximation.

original: 'di dag ni sangs rgyas skyes bu ste /
analyzed: 'di dag ni sangs rgyas skyes bu ste /
translated: These are the Buddhas, the Persons,

original: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa nyid yin te /
translated: Akṣhobhya and so forth,

original: de las gzhan ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: de las gzhan ma yin pa'o //
translated: and nothing else.

original: gang gis she na /
analyzed: gang gis she na /
translated: By whom?

original: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgom pa'i //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgom pa'i // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: By the meditation on the three vajras.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis so // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pas ni /
translated: The Tathāgatas.

original: don 'di nyid nye bar sdud par mdzad pa yin te /
analyzed: don 'di nyid nye bar sdud par mdzad pa yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is summarized by “all Tathāgatas” and so forth.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams @78b cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ni yi ge gsum mo //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams @78b cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ni yi ge gsum mo //
translated: The body, speech, and mind of all Tathāgatas are the three syllables.

original: de'i dam tshig ni de las byung ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rnam pa gsum mo //
analyzed: de'i dam tshig ni de las byung ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la sogs pa rnam pa gsum mo //
translated: Their commitment is the three aspects of the sun maṇḍala and so forth, which arise from that.

original: de la de'i de kho na nyid ni padma'i steng gi yi ge gsum mo //🔽ye shes zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de la de'i de kho na nyid ni padma'i steng gi yi ge gsum mo //🔽ye shes zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The reality of that is the three syllables on the lotus.🔽The gnosis is the three syllables on the moon.

original: thams cad yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: thams cad yongs su gyur pa las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The moon disk arises from the complete transformation of all.

original: rdo rje ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rnam par bkod pa'i yi ge gsum las byung ba rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rnam par bkod pa'i yi ge gsum las byung ba rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa'o //
translated: The vajra is the great five-pronged vajra arisen from the three syllables arranged on the moon disk.

original: des byin gyis brlabs shing bskyed pas na byin gyis rlob pa ste /
analyzed: des byin gyis brlabs shing bskyed pas na byin gyis rlob pa ste /
translated: Since it is consecrated and generated by that, it is the consecration.

original: phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs so //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs so //
translated: It is the form of the great seal.

original: de'i rgyu ni byed pa ste de skyed pa la thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rgyu ni byed pa ste de skyed pa la thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The cause of that is the act, and the samadhi in which the mind is one-pointedly focused on the generation of that is called by that name.

original: dben zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgrub pa po'i nan tan lhur bya ba'i gnas gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: dben zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgrub pa po'i nan tan lhur bya ba'i gnas gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The statement beginning with “in a solitary place” teaches the place of the practitioner’s earnest practice.

original: dben pa ni skye bo 'dus pa dang bral bar ro //
analyzed: dben pa ni skye bo 'dus pa dang bral bar ro //
translated: Solitary means free from the gathering of people.

original: nyams dga' ba zhes bya ba ni me tog dang 'bras bu dang / lo ma dang ldan pa'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs kyi yal gas khebs pa /
analyzed: nyams dga' ba zhes bya ba ni me tog dang 'bras bu dang / lo ma dang ldan pa'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs kyi yal gas khebs pa /
translated: Delightful means covered with various trees having flowers, fruits, and leaves.

original: yid du 'ong ba'i chu'i tshogs kyis rnam par mdzes pa /
analyzed: yid du 'ong ba'i chu'i tshogs kyis rnam par mdzes pa /
translated: It is beautified by a collection of delightful waters.

original: yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug pa'i sgrub pa po gang yin pas /
analyzed: yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su 'dug pa'i sgrub pa po gang yin pas /
translated: The practitioner who is seated in a place that is agreeable to the mind

original: bshad ma thag pa sbyor ba 'di kun du brtsam zhing bslab par bya ste /🔽des ni rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs te ;
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa sbyor ba 'di kun du brtsam zhing bslab par bya ste / des ni rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs te ;
translated: should undertake and train in all of these practices that have just been explained.🔽By that, one should accomplish the attainment of the great Vajradhara,

original: / rdo rje 'chang chen po 'grub par bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: / rdo rje 'chang chen po 'grub par bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: the vajra body, speech, and mind.

original: zla ba phyed kyis zhes bya ba ni bla ma dang lha rnams kyi yul la yid ches par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: zla ba phyed kyis zhes bya ba ni bla ma dang lha rnams kyi yul la yid ches par gyur pa ste /
translated: In half a month means that one becomes confident in the domain of the guru and the deity.

original: de la rtse gcig tu nges shing brtun pas 'grub par the tshom med pas nges par sku dang gsung dang thugs sgrub pa ste /
analyzed: de la rtse gcig tu nges shing brtun pas 'grub par the tshom med pas nges par sku dang gsung dang thugs sgrub pa ste /
translated: Since there is no doubt that one will accomplish that by being single-pointedly focused and diligent, one will certainly accomplish the body, speech, and mind.

original: rim pa 'dis bskyed pa'i rim pa la slob pa'i sngags pas rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par rtogs par byas na nges par tshe 'di nyid la rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: rim pa 'dis bskyed pa'i rim pa la slob pa'i sngags pas rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par rtogs par byas na nges par tshe 'di nyid la rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The thought is that if the mantrin who trains in the creation stage by this process makes manifest the perfection stage, he will certainly attain the state of Great Vajradhara in this very life.

original: de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgrub pa yang dag par bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pa'i bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgrub pa yang dag par bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the creation stage of the yoga of Great Vajradhara,

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dran pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dran pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the single-focus concentration of the yoga of Vairochana and so forth,

original: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares the “clear maṇḍala” and so forth.

original: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni //
analyzed: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni //
translated: The sublime clear maṇḍala

original: nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus bsams te //
analyzed: nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbus bsams te //
translated: is imagined in the center of the vajra space.

original: zhes bya ba dang / dngos po @79a * //
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang / dngos po @79a * //
translated: And,🔽the entity of the meditation on non-entity

original: med par bsgom pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i rim gyis /
analyzed: med par bsgom pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i rim gyis /
translated: and so forth, by the sequence of verses.

original: gzhal yas khang gi nang du lha sum cu rtsa gnyis rnam par dgod pa'i mthar thug par lhag par mos pas snyoms par zhugs te /
analyzed: gzhal yas khang gi nang du lha sum cu rtsa gnyis rnam par dgod pa'i mthar thug par lhag par mos pas snyoms par zhugs te /
translated: Having entered into union with the thought of the ultimate arrangement of the thirty-two deities within the celestial mansion,

original: aom sh'u n+ya t'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyis thams cad dngos po med par byas la /
analyzed: aom sh'u n+ya t'a zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sngags kyis thams cad dngos po med par byas la /
translated: one should make everything non-substantial with the mantra “Oṃ śūnyatā” and so forth.

original: aom la sogs pa'i yi ge gsum gyis zla ba dang nyi ma dang padma bskyed la /
analyzed: aom la sogs pa'i yi ge gsum gyis zla ba dang nyi ma dang padma bskyed la /
translated: One should generate the moon, sun, and lotus with the three syllables “oṃ” and so forth.

original: padma'i lte ba'i steng du yi ge gsum rnam par bsams nas /
analyzed: padma'i lte ba'i steng du yi ge gsum rnam par bsams nas /
translated: Having visualized the three syllables upon the center of the lotus,

original: de dag thams cad yongs su gyur pa las gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: de dag thams cad yongs su gyur pa las gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: one should visualize the clear maṇḍala from the transformation of all of those.

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam par bya'o //🔽rang gi sngags kyi dam tshig bskyed //
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsam par bya'o // rang gi sngags kyi dam tshig bskyed //
translated: One should visualize the moon maṇḍala.

original: ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: ces bya ba ni /
translated: “One should generate the pledge being of one’s mantra” means

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge gsum rnam par bkod la /
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du yi ge gsum rnam par bkod la /
translated: one should arrange the three syllables upon the moon maṇḍala.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lor bsgoms la /
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lor bsgoms la /
translated: From that, one should meditate on the wheel.

original: de las byung ba'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig sems dpa' bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi dam tshig sems dpa' bsgom par bya'o //
translated: From that, one should meditate on the pledge being of Vairocana.

original: de'i thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' bsgoms la /
analyzed: de'i thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' bsgoms la /
translated: Having meditated on the gnosis being at his heart,

original: de'i yang thugs kar yi ge aom ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' zhes grags pa snying por gyur pa /
analyzed: de'i yang thugs kar yi ge aom ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' zhes grags pa snying por gyur pa /
translated: one should visualize the syllable oṃ at his heart, known as the concentration being, which is the essence,

original: 'od zer lnga ste 'od zar rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa dgod par bya bas /
analyzed: 'od zer lnga ste 'od zar rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa dgod par bya bas /
translated: endowed with five lights, that is, with five-colored light,

original: rnam par snang mdzad mchog tu bsgoms la /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad mchog tu bsgoms la /
translated: as Vairocana, the supreme.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sprin chen po ste /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi sprin chen po ste /
translated: This is the great cloud of the Vairocana yogins.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi tshogs de rnams kyi yi ge aom las spro par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi tshogs de rnams kyi yi ge aom las spro par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on the emanation from the syllable oṃ of those hosts of Vairocanas.

original: 'di yis zhes pa ting nge 'dzin 'di yis sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: 'di yis zhes pa ting nge 'dzin 'di yis sangs rgyas te /
translated: By this, by this concentration, the buddhas

original: bskyed pa'i rim pa shes rnams kyi rnam par snang mdzad kyis rang gi rigs rnams rgya mtsho dang 'dra par 'byung par 'gyur pas na /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i rim pa shes rnams kyi rnam par snang mdzad kyis rang gi rigs rnams rgya mtsho dang 'dra par 'byung par 'gyur pas na /
translated: of those who know the creation stage, the Vairocanas, will arise like an ocean,

original: de sgrub pa po gang gi yin pa de'i lus 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de sgrub pa po gang gi yin pa de'i lus 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: and the body of the one who accomplishes that will be accomplished.

original: ye shes lnga ldan bstan na ni //
analyzed: ye shes lnga ldan bstan na ni //
translated: If the five gnoses are taught,

original: zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la /
translated: it is said:

original: shes pa lnga ni mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa lnga rnams te /
analyzed: shes pa lnga ni mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa lnga rnams te /
translated: The five cognitions are the five cognitions of eye, etc.

original: de rnams gang la gnas pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de rnams gang la gnas pa'i gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams gang yin pa de ni /
translated: The objects of form, etc., which are the abodes of those,

original: ye shes lnga ldan te de nyams su myong bas 'khor ba ji srid par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: ye shes lnga ldan te de nyams su myong bas 'khor ba ji srid par gnas pa'o //
translated: are endowed with the five pristine wisdoms, and by experiencing them, one abides as long as cyclic life endures.

original: sangs rgyas sku ni zhes pa ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa'i rdo rje'i sku'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas sku ni zhes pa ni mtshan ma thams cad dang ldan pa'i rdo rje'i sku'o //
translated: The buddha body is the vajra body endowed with all the signs.

original: de dang 'dra ba'i mdog na de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul 'grub pa'o //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i mdog na de 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul 'grub pa'o //
translated: The color like that is the accomplishment of such a magical creation.

original: rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas //🔽zhes pa ni /
analyzed: rdo rje bskal pa gsum du gnas // zhes pa ni /
translated: The vajra abides for three eons.

original: rdo rje sems dpa'i gtso bor gyur nas /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa'i gtso bor gyur nas /
translated: Having become the chief of the vajra beings,

original: bskal @79b pa gsum du gnas pas zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: bskal @79b pa gsum du gnas pas zhugs pa'o //
translated: one enters into abiding for three eons.

original: zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par 'gyur //🔽zhes pa ni /
analyzed: zla ba phyed kyis 'grub par 'gyur // zhes pa ni /
translated: One will be accomplished in half a month.

original: ting nge 'dzin la kun tu zhen pa tsam gyis te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la kun tu zhen pa tsam gyis te /
translated: This is merely the total adherence to meditative concentration,🔽without regard for the elaborations of activity.🔽This is the thought.

original: bya ba'i spros pa ltos pa med pa nyid kyis so zhes bya bar dgongs so zhes bcom ldan 'das sku rdo rje gsang ba ste /
analyzed: bya ba'i spros pa ltos pa med pa nyid kyis so zhes bya bar dgongs so zhes bcom ldan 'das sku rdo rje gsang ba ste /
translated: The Bhagavat is the secret body vajra.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs pa'o //
translated: is spoken by Great Vajradhara.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: All Ones Gone Thus is the moon mandala.

original: der rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: der rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: The vajra there is the wheel of the nature of non-duality.

original: de'i 'od zer gyi bkod pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs te /
analyzed: de'i 'od zer gyi bkod pa ni phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs te /
translated: The array of its light rays is the form of the great seal.

original: de bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje 'od zer bkod pa zhes bya'o //🔽chos kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin du thams cad bskyed la /
analyzed: de bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rdo rje 'od zer bkod pa zhes bya'o // chos kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa la de bzhin du thams cad bskyed la /
translated: The samadhi that generates that is called “the array of light rays of the vajra body of all Ones Gone Thus.”🔽The Dharma mandala, etc.

original: chos kyi 'khor te padma'i mchog dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams la /
analyzed: chos kyi 'khor te padma'i mchog dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams la /
translated: is as follows: Having generated everything in the same way, one should imagine the Dharma wheel, a supreme red lotus with eight petals.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las rang gi sngags kyis skyes bu 'od dpag tu med pa bskyed la /
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las rang gi sngags kyis skyes bu 'od dpag tu med pa bskyed la /
translated: From its complete transformation, one generates the being Amitabha born from one’s mantra.

original: de'i thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' bsgoms nas /
analyzed: de'i thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' bsgoms nas /
translated: Having meditated on the awareness being at his heart,

original: ngag gi lam ye shes sems dpa' la /
analyzed: ngag gi lam ye shes sems dpa' la /
translated: on the path of speech, the awareness being,

original: ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dpa' yi ge a'a: bsam pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dpa' yi ge a'a: bsam pa ste /
translated: one should imagine the samadhi being, the syllable A.

original: kha dog sna lnga pa'i padma chen po mi phyed pa'i ngo bo nyid /
analyzed: kha dog sna lnga pa'i padma chen po mi phyed pa'i ngo bo nyid /
translated: It is a great five-colored lotus, the nature of indivisibility.

original: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mchog bsgom pa ste /
analyzed: 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mchog bsgom pa ste /
translated: The supreme meditation on Lokeśvara is the meditation on the great five-colored lotus, which is the nature of the indivisible.

original: 'od dpag tu med par gtogs pa'i sems kyi 'jug pas bkod pa'o //
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med par gtogs pa'i sems kyi 'jug pas bkod pa'o //
translated: This is the arrangement of the mind belonging to Amitābha.

original: dam tshig ye shes rdzogs byas te //
analyzed: dam tshig ye shes rdzogs byas te //
translated: Having completed the pledge and the awareness,

original: tshig gi dam tshig lnga yi mchog //🔽zhes bya ba la /🔽dam tshig ni dam tshig sems dpa'o //🔽ye shes ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
analyzed: tshig gi dam tshig lnga yi mchog // zhes bya ba la / dam tshig ni dam tshig sems dpa'o // ye shes ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
translated: the supreme of the five pledges of speech,🔽one should meditate on the supreme of the five pledges of mind.

original: tshig gi dam tshig ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: tshig gi dam tshig ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dpa' ste /
translated: Here, the pledge is the pledge being, the awareness is the awareness being, and the pledge of speech is the concentration being.

original: rdzogs par byang ni sems dpa' gsum bo de dag gcig tu byas nas bsgom pa'o //🔽tshul 'di nyid kyis ni lnga'i mchog ste /
analyzed: rdzogs par byang ni sems dpa' gsum bo de dag gcig tu byas nas bsgom pa'o // tshul 'di nyid kyis ni lnga'i mchog ste /
translated: Having completed the enlightenment is the meditation on those three beings as one.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po rnams sems dpa' sum brtsegs byas nas bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga po rnams sems dpa' sum brtsegs byas nas bsgom par bya'o //
translated: By this very method, the supreme of the five is the meditation on the five tathāgatas as three-stacked beings.

original: chos kyi tshig gi lam ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: chos kyi tshig gi lam ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: The path of the words of the Dharma is the concentration of Amitābha.

original: gnas pa ni yang dag par thob pa'o //
analyzed: gnas pa ni yang dag par thob pa'o //
translated: The abiding is the attainment.

original: rdo rje ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
translated: The vajra is the conventional truth.

original: chos ni don dam pa'i bden pa ste /
analyzed: chos ni don dam pa'i bden pa ste /
translated: The Dharma is the ultimate truth.

original: chos dang ldan pa'i rdo rje ni rdo rje chos te /
analyzed: chos dang ldan pa'i rdo rje ni rdo rje chos te /
translated: The vajra endowed with the Dharma is Vajradharma.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang ste 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang ste 'thob par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: One will attain the state of Great Vajradhara.

original: ye shes lnga ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //🔽de bzhin gshegs @80a * //
analyzed: ye shes lnga ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to // de bzhin gshegs @80a * //
translated: The meaning of “endowed with the five gnoses” and so forth has been explained.

original: pa thams cad ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
analyzed: pa thams cad ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
translated: All tathāgatas are the gnosis being.

original: gsung rdo rje ni ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'o //
analyzed: gsung rdo rje ni ting nge 'dzin sems dpa'o //
translated: Vajra speech is the concentration being.

original: dam tshig ni dam tshig sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: dam tshig ni dam tshig sems dpa' ste /
translated: The pledge is the pledge being.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig gang du 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rdo rje'i dam tshig gang du 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The concentration that is the source of the pledge of all tathāgatas’ vajra speech is called that.

original: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa sems pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po dang 'dra par thams cad bskyed la /
analyzed: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa sems pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po dang 'dra par thams cad bskyed la /
translated: The thought “vajra maṇḍala” and so forth is to generate everything like Great Vajradhara.

original: rang gi sngags kyis skyes bu dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed nas /
analyzed: rang gi sngags kyis skyes bu dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed nas /
translated: Having generated the pledge being, the person born from one’s mantra,

original: sems de ye shes sems dpa' la ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' zhes bya ba ye ge h'um de la gnas pa ste /
analyzed: sems de ye shes sems dpa' la ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' zhes bya ba ye ge h'um de la gnas pa ste /
translated: That mind is the gnosis being, abiding in the concentration being, that is, the syllable hūṃ.

original: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar gnas par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs kar gnas par bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine it abiding in the heart of the gnosis being.

original: de ltar sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid /
analyzed: de ltar sems dpa' gsum gyi bdag nyid can dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid /
translated: Thus, one should visualize the reality of the great commitment, which has the nature of the three beings,

original: mi bskyod pa'i kha dog lnga pa'i 'od zer can gyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i rnam par bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i kha dog lnga pa'i 'od zer can gyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i rnam par bsgom par bya ba'o //
translated: endowed with the maṇḍala of Akṣobhya, who has five colors and light rays.

original: rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba mi bskyod pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje kun dang rgyal ba mi bskyod pa'o //
translated: The vajra is all the victors, Akṣobhya.

original: de'i gnas ni phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs so //
analyzed: de'i gnas ni phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs so //
translated: His abode is the form of the great seal.

original: ye shes rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa'i sgrub pa pos so //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje ni mi bskyod pa'i sgrub pa pos so //
translated: The vajra of gnosis is the practitioner of Akṣobhya.

original: bya ba ni bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba ni bskyed pa'o //
translated: The action is the generation.

original: de ltar rtag pa nyid kyis thun bzhir bslab par byas na /
analyzed: de ltar rtag pa nyid kyis thun bzhir bslab par byas na /
translated: Thus, if one trains in the four periods with constancy,

original: de dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par rtogs nas tshe 'di nyid la phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin mngon par rtogs nas tshe 'di nyid la phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate that, through the maturation of the roots of virtue, having realized the vajra-like samadhi, one will attain the Great Seal siddhi in this very life,🔽it is said,

original: ston pa rdo rje thugs 'dra ba //🔽zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ston pa rdo rje thugs 'dra ba // zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The teacher is like the vajra mind.

original: lha dang mi rnams la rjes su ston par mdzad pas na ston pa'o //
analyzed: lha dang mi rnams la rjes su ston par mdzad pas na ston pa'o //
translated: The teacher is so called because he teaches gods and humans.

original: rdo rje ni dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: Vajra is the ultimate truth.

original: thugs ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
analyzed: thugs ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'o //
translated: Mind is the conventional truth.

original: de dag la las bsgrub bas na rdo rje thugs 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: de dag la las bsgrub bas na rdo rje thugs 'dra ba'o //
translated: Since he accomplishes those, he is like the vajra mind.

original: ye shes yon tan ni 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la sogs pa brgyad po da rnams kyi rgya mtshor 'gyur ba ni 'byung gnas yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ye shes yon tan ni 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la sogs pa brgyad po da rnams kyi rgya mtshor 'gyur ba ni 'byung gnas yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The ocean of the qualities of wisdom refers to the eight qualities such as the power of desire and so forth.

original: ye shes lnga ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: ye shes lnga ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of endowed with the five wisdoms and so forth has been explained.

original: rdo rje ni dam tshig sems dpa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni dam tshig sems dpa'o //
translated: Vajra is the commitment being.

original: thugs ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
analyzed: thugs ni ye shes sems dpa'o //
translated: Mind is the wisdom being.

original: gsang ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: gsang ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dpa' ste /
translated: The secret is the mind of concentration.

original: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi bdag nyid can yin pas /
analyzed: de ltar ting nge 'dzin gsum gyi bdag nyid can yin pas /
translated: Thus, since he has the nature of the three concentrations,

original: rdo rje thugs kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba /
analyzed: rdo rje thugs kyi gsang ba zhes bya ba /
translated: he is called the “secret of the vajra mind.”

original: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so //
translated: The Bhagavān Mahāvajradhara has spoken.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rab tu byed @80b pa'i don sdud pa yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rab tu byed @80b pa'i don sdud pa yin te /
translated: The meaning of the chapter is summarized by “tathāgata” and so forth.

original: da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: All tathāgatas is Mahāvajradhara.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa gsum mo //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa gsum mo //
translated: Body, speech, and mind are the three, Vairocana, and so forth.

original: dam tshig gi don yod par grub pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi don yod par grub pa'o //
translated: Commitment is Amoghasiddhi.

original: rdo rje ni rin chen 'byung ldan te 'di rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ni tha mi dad par nye bar btags pas na /
analyzed: rdo rje ni rin chen 'byung ldan te 'di rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin ni tha mi dad par nye bar btags pas na /
translated: Vajra is Ratnasaṃbhava. Since their concentration is designated as nondifferent,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje zhes bya ste /
translated: it is called the “vajra body, speech, and mind of all tathāgatas.”

original: snga ji bzhin ba'o //
analyzed: snga ji bzhin ba'o //
translated: It is just as before.

original: de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi 'bras bu'i tshul gyis rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi 'bras bu'i tshul gyis rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the completion stage by way of the result of the yoga of such realization,

original: de mngon sum nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de mngon sum nyid du bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach that [result] in a direct way,

original: ye shes dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ye shes dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares the “mandala of gnosis,” and so on.

original: shes pas na ye shes te /
analyzed: shes pas na ye shes te /
translated: It is gnosis because it knows,

original: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'o //
analyzed: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'o //
translated: the moving and unmoving.

original: de'i dkyil 'khor ni tshogs te 'jig rten gsum mo //
analyzed: de'i dkyil 'khor ni tshogs te 'jig rten gsum mo //
translated: Its mandala is the collection, the three worlds.

original: de'i dbus su rdo rje chen po ste rang gi phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs su bsgom par bya zhing /
analyzed: de'i dbus su rdo rje chen po ste rang gi phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs su bsgom par bya zhing /
translated: In the middle of that, one should meditate on the great vajra, the form of one’s own great seal.

original: bdag po nyid du bzhag nas lus rnams kun te rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba rnams la /
analyzed: bdag po nyid du bzhag nas lus rnams kun te rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba rnams la /
translated: Having placed oneself as the lord, in all bodies, the moving and unmoving,

original: yi ge kham nam mkhar byed pas rjes su gzhig pa'i rim gyis dngos po med par byas la /
analyzed: yi ge kham nam mkhar byed pas rjes su gzhig pa'i rim gyis dngos po med par byas la /
translated: one should make them nonexistent by way of the reverse sequence, making the syllable kṣaṃ the space.

original: bdag nyid kyang rim gyis zhugs pa de byas na /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyang rim gyis zhugs pa de byas na /
translated: Having done that, one’s own self also enters in sequence.

original: rdo rje ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam par 'gyur zhing sems dang gsum gyi bdag nyid can gcig tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam par 'gyur zhing sems dang gsum gyi bdag nyid can gcig tu 'gyur ro //
translated: The vajra gnosis becomes equal to space, and one becomes a single identity with the nature of the three minds.

original: kham zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: kham zhes bya ba ni 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: “Kham” is clear light.

original: de la yang sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: de la yang sangs rgyas te /
translated: And in that, the buddhas

original: de rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' ste sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid /
analyzed: de rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid gzugs kyi phung po la sogs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' ste sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid /
translated: are Vairochana and so forth, the nature of the form aggregate and so forth, and the bodhisattvas are Kshitigarbha and so forth, the nature of the eye and so forth.

original: mig la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang yang dang yang du ste /
analyzed: mig la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang yang dang yang du ste /
translated: Again and again,

original: gzugs kyi phung por gtogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis skad cig re re zhing mchod par gyur pas so //
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung por gtogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rim gyis skad cig re re zhing mchod par gyur pas so //
translated: they are offered in every instant by the form aggregate and so forth.

original: ye shes gsum gyi bdag nyid can du rang nyid la rab tu zhugs par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: ye shes gsum gyi bdag nyid can du rang nyid la rab tu zhugs par 'gyur bas /
translated: Since one enters into oneself, who is the nature of the three exalted wisdoms,

original: shes rab dang thabs dang nye bar thob pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rtog pa yin pas na /
analyzed: shes rab dang thabs dang nye bar thob pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis rtog pa yin pas na /
translated: one is conceptual by the nature of wisdom, method, and near attainment.

original: skal pa gsum du ye shes gsum mo //
analyzed: skal pa gsum du ye shes gsum mo //
translated: The three exalted wisdoms are the three fortunes.

original: de dang mnyam par gyur cing rnam par zhugs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de dang mnyam par gyur cing rnam par zhugs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: That which is equal to that and enters into that🔽is the three exalted wisdoms.

original: skal pa gsum gyi dam tshig ste 'od gsal par gnas pa'o //
analyzed: skal pa gsum gyi dam tshig ste 'od gsal par gnas pa'o //
translated: The pledge of the three fortunes is to abide in clear light.

original: der gnas ba sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzigs par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: der gnas ba sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzigs par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Abiding there, even the Buddhas do not see it.

original: sangs rgyas ni ye shes gsum yin @81a * //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni ye shes gsum yin @81a * //
translated: The Buddhas are the three intuitions,

original: la ; / des kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: la ; / des kyang mthong bar mi 'gyur ba ste /
translated: and they do not see it either.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba ni snang ba med pa bzhin du gnas pa'o //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du mthong ba ni snang ba med pa bzhin du gnas pa'o //
translated: Seeing it as it is, one abides in the absence of appearances.

original: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba la /
translated: The Blessed One, the pledge of the vajra of space, has declared this.

original: nam mkha' rdo rje ni 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' rdo rje ni 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: The vajra of space is clear light.

original: de la mnyam par byung bar gyur pas na nam mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig ste /
analyzed: de la mnyam par byung bar gyur pas na nam mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig ste /
translated: The pledge of the vajra of space is to arise in union with that.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: It is Great Vajradhara.

original: 'og nas bshad pa'i ldang ba'i dam tshig bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'og nas bshad pa'i ldang ba'i dam tshig bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the pledge of rising, which will be explained below,

original: sku dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sku dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares body, and so on.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs ni phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: Body, speech, and mind are the great seal.

original: de'i mi snang ba ni 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: de'i mi snang ba ni 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: Its non-appearance is clear light.

original: de las byung bar gyur pas na 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: de las byung bar gyur pas na 'byung ba'o //
translated: Since it arises from that, it is an element.

original: bkod pa ni g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid can te /
analyzed: bkod pa ni g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi bdag nyid can te /
translated: The array is the embodiment of all the animate and inanimate,

original: ye shes kyi sku'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi sku'o //
translated: the wisdom body.

original: de'i phreng ba ni bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i skus 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phreng ba ni bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i skus 'jug pa'o //
translated: Its garland is the engagement with the forms of Vairochana, etc. , in accordance with the inclinations of the disciples.

original: de'i ting nge 'dzin gang la sems kyi skad cig ma rtse gcig tu dmigs pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de'i ting nge 'dzin gang la sems kyi skad cig ma rtse gcig tu dmigs pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The samadhi in which the mind is focused one-pointedly on that is called the samadhi of the garland of elements.

original: ting nge 'dzin de dag thams cad nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de dag thams cad nyid bstan par bya ba'i phyir rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: In order to teach all of those samadhis, he says the vajra mandala, etc.

original: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni //
translated: In the middle of the vajra mandala,

original: zhes pa 'od gsal ba'i dbus las byung ba'o //
analyzed: zhes pa 'od gsal ba'i dbus las byung ba'o //
translated: arisen from the middle of the clear light.

original: rang sngags skyes bu ni 'dir yongs su dag pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs su bsam zhing bsgom mo //
analyzed: rang sngags skyes bu ni 'dir yongs su dag pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs su bsam zhing bsgom mo //
translated: The being of one's own mantra is the thoroughly pure Great Seal form, which is imagined and cultivated here.

original: de'i 'og tu sems can tha mal pa'i yul du gyur pa'i sprul pa'i sku yongs su bzung la /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu sems can tha mal pa'i yul du gyur pa'i sprul pa'i sku yongs su bzung la /
translated: Then, having taken up the nirmāṇakāya that is the object of ordinary beings,

original: srog dang rtsol ba'i yan lag tu gyur cing mi shigs pa ha zhes bya ba'i sa bon snying gar bzhag ste /
analyzed: srog dang rtsol ba'i yan lag tu gyur cing mi shigs pa ha zhes bya ba'i sa bon snying gar bzhag ste /
translated: one should place the seed syllable of the indestructible drop, which is the branch of prāṇa and āyāma, at the heart.

original: de'i 'og tu 'od zer rnam par bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu 'od zer rnam par bsgom par bya ste /
translated: Then, one should meditate on the light rays.

original: srog dang rtsol ba la gnas pa'i 'od zer bcu po de rnams kyi bsgom pa ni /
analyzed: srog dang rtsol ba la gnas pa'i 'od zer bcu po de rnams kyi bsgom pa ni /
translated: The meditation on those ten light rays that are based on prāṇa and āyāma

original: g-yas la sogs pa'i dbye bas 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis rab tu zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: g-yas la sogs pa'i dbye bas 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rim gyis rab tu zhugs pa'o //
translated: is the entry by way of the divisions of right and so on, in the order of entry and so on.

original: ha zhes bya ba ni brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa ston pa'o//
analyzed: ha zhes bya ba ni brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa ston pa'o//
translated: The syllable ha is the teaching of the inexpressible of the inexpressible.

original: 'jam pa ni rnam par mi 'jig pa'o //
analyzed: 'jam pa ni rnam par mi 'jig pa'o //
translated: Smooth is non-disintegration.

original: dpal ni 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: dpal ni 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: Splendor is clear light.

original: de las byung bas na 'jam dpal gyi dam tshig go //
analyzed: de las byung bas na 'jam dpal gyi dam tshig go //
translated: Since it arises from that, it is Mañjuśrī’s pledge.

original: phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyis yang dag par longs spyod cing yul du byas pas na /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyis yang dag par longs spyod cing yul du byas pas na /
translated: Since it is enjoyed and made an object by those who are irreversible,

original: de nyid ni longs spyod pa ste ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi lus so //
analyzed: de nyid ni longs spyod pa ste ye shes kyi rang bzhin gyi lus so //
translated: He is the enjoyer, the body of the nature of intuition.

original: de thob @81b nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i sprul pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs gang la mnga' ba de ni sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can no //
analyzed: de thob @81b nas sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i sprul pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs gang la mnga' ba de ni sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can no //
translated: Having attained that, he is the possessor of the vajra of body, speech, and mind, because he has the vajra of body, speech, and mind, which are emanations.

original: sa bcu ni 'od zer bcu ste de la rab tu gnas pa'o //
analyzed: sa bcu ni 'od zer bcu ste de la rab tu gnas pa'o //
translated: The ten stages are the ten light rays, and he is well-established in them.

original: byang chub ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: Enlightenment is the ultimate truth.

original: sems dpa' ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa ste /
analyzed: sems dpa' ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa ste /
translated: The being is the conventional truth.

original: de'i bdag nyid kyi sku gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bdag ste /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyi sku gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i bdag ste /
translated: The body which is of the nature of those two is the nature of the Bodhisattva.

original: gang bshad ma thag pa'i rim gyis sgom pa po de ni 'di lta bur 'gyur pa'o //
analyzed: gang bshad ma thag pa'i rim gyis sgom pa po de ni 'di lta bur 'gyur pa'o //
translated: The one who meditates in the manner just explained becomes like that.

original: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ting nge 'dzin gsal bar byed de /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni ting nge 'dzin gsal bar byed de /
translated: The phrase the Bodhisattva, etc., clarifies the samadhi.

original: bden pa gnyis kyis yongs su gzung ba'i gzugs ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes so //
analyzed: bden pa gnyis kyis yongs su gzung ba'i gzugs ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes so //
translated: The form which is taken up by the two truths is the intuition of the Bodhisattva.

original: de nyid dam tshig yin la de nyid ni khams gsum pa rnams tshim par byed pas na zla ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid dam tshig yin la de nyid ni khams gsum pa rnams tshim par byed pas na zla ba'o //
translated: That is the commitment, and that is the moon, since it satisfies the three realms.

original: 'khor ba ji srid par gnas nas sems can gyi don mdzad pas na rdo rje ste /
analyzed: 'khor ba ji srid par gnas nas sems can gyi don mdzad pas na rdo rje ste /
translated: It is the vajra, since it abides for as long as cyclic existence exists and accomplishes the aims of sentient beings.

original: de bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya ste /
analyzed: de bskyed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang de skad ces bya ste /
translated: The samadhi that generates that is called that.

original: dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the explanation of the intention.

original: bshad ma thag pa'i rim pas bzung ba'i sprul pa'i sku'i mig la sogs pa'i skye mched rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas 'bras bu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i rim pas bzung ba'i sprul pa'i sku'i mig la sogs pa'i skye mched rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas 'bras bu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the result by way of the purity of the sense-spheres of the emanation body, which is apprehended by the previously explained process,

original: 'od zer 'bar ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'od zer 'bar ba'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: it is said, blazing light rays, and so on.

original: dang po mig gi spu pas stong par byas pas khong stod du bya ba thong pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha' ste /
analyzed: dang po mig gi spu pas stong par byas pas khong stod du bya ba thong pa gang yin pa de ni nam mkha' ste /
translated: First, the eye is hollowed out by a thousandth of an inch, and that which is hollowed out is space.

original: de'i dbus su chud par yi ge thl'im la 'od zer shin tu 'bar ba ste /
analyzed: de'i dbus su chud par yi ge thl'im la 'od zer shin tu 'bar ba ste /
translated: In the middle of that, the syllable a is placed, blazing with light rays.

original: nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis 'bar bar gyur pa gang gis 'phen cing bcug pa de ni mtshon cha'i mchog ste /
analyzed: nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od zer rnams kyis 'bar bar gyur pa gang gis 'phen cing bcug pa de ni mtshon cha'i mchog ste /
translated: That is the supreme weapon.

original: mchog ni brgya byin la sogs pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs rnams so //
analyzed: mchog ni brgya byin la sogs pa'i bgegs kyi tshogs rnams so //
translated: The supreme ones are the hosts of obstacles such as Indra.

original: de'i don gyi mtshon cha yin pas na mtshon mchog go //
analyzed: de'i don gyi mtshon cha yin pas na mtshon mchog go //
translated: Since it is the weapon for that purpose, it is the supreme weapon.

original: de yang de las byung ba'i mig bskyod pas /
analyzed: de yang de las byung ba'i mig bskyod pas /
translated: Moreover, by moving the eye that arises from that,

original: bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms pas na mtshon cha'i mchog ste /
analyzed: bgegs thams cad rnam par 'joms pas na mtshon cha'i mchog ste /
translated: all obstacles are destroyed, and therefore it is the supreme weapon.

original: yi ge thl'im ngo //
analyzed: yi ge thl'im ngo //
translated: The syllable is hriṃ.

original: de ni rdo rje'i lus ngag gis te /
analyzed: de ni rdo rje'i lus ngag gis te /
translated: That is to be meditated on with the vajra body and speech,

original: sa'i snying po'i ngo bo nyid kyis bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: sa'i snying po'i ngo bo nyid kyis bsgom par bya'o //
translated: by means of the nature of Kṣitigarbha.

original: rdo rje'i sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur //🔽zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje'i sku dang 'dra bar 'gyur // zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One becomes like the vajra body.🔽One becomes like Great Vajradhara.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po dang 'dra bar 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa na /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po dang 'dra bar 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa na /
translated: In infinite world systems,

original: gnas pa'i dngos po thams cad lag mthil gyi skyu ru ra bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: gnas pa'i dngos po thams cad lag mthil gyi skyu ru ra bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: all things are seen like a myrobalan fruit in the palm of the hand.

original: thl'im zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'i don ston pa'i sa bon no//
analyzed: thl'im zhes bya ba ni bshad pa'i don ston pa'i sa bon no//
translated: The word “thus” is the seed of the teaching of the meaning explained.

original: @82a * // nam mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: @82a * // nam mkha' rdo rje'i dam tshig ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: The commitment of the vajra of space is Great Vajradhara.
