translated: The instruction is that one should meditate on the vajra utpala.

original: dam tshig ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ste /
analyzed: dam tshig ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba ste /
translated: The commitment is Sarvanivarana Viskambini.

original: de skyed par byed pa'i yi ge aom yang dam tshig aom yin te /
analyzed: de skyed par byed pa'i yi ge aom yang dam tshig aom yin te /
translated: The syllable om which generates her is also the commitment om.

original: reg bya'i dbang po'i gnas su 'od gsal pas sbyangs pa sngon du 'gro bas /
analyzed: reg bya'i dbang po'i gnas su 'od gsal pas sbyangs pa sngon du 'gro bas /
translated: Having purified the sense of touch by means of clear light,

original: de'i dam tshig yi ge ao rab tu bsgoms la rdo rje nyid autpala ste /
analyzed: de'i dam tshig yi ge ao rab tu bsgoms la rdo rje nyid autpala ste /
translated: one should meditate on the commitment syllable om, and the vajra itself is the utpala.

original: kha zum pa'i rnam pas na rdo rje autpala zhes bya ste de bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: kha zum pa'i rnam pas na rdo rje autpala zhes bya ste de bsgom pa'o //
translated: Since it is in the form of a closed mouth, it is called the vajra utpala, and one should meditate on that.

original: rdo rje gsum ni reg rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni reg rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: The three vajras are the three aspects of touch.

original: de dang mnyam par gyur pas na rdo rje dam tshig gsum ste /
analyzed: de dang mnyam par gyur pas na rdo rje dam tshig gsum ste /
translated: Since he is equal to that, he is the three vajra commitments.

original: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba de bsgom pas so //
analyzed: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba de bsgom pas so //
translated: By meditating on that Sarvanivarana Viskambini,

original: rdo rje gsum ni gdon mi za bar grub pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni gdon mi za bar grub pa ste /
translated: the three vajras are the unfailing accomplishments.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa rnams phyag rgya gcig gi padmor gtogs pa'i reg rdo rje dang 'dra bar rjes su myong bas /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa rnams phyag rgya gcig gi padmor gtogs pa'i reg rdo rje dang 'dra bar rjes su myong bas /
translated: Since the infinite world systems are experienced as being like the vajra of touch in the lotus of the single seal,

original: da dang 'dra par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: da dang 'dra par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: they become like him.

original: 'di'i phan yon bstan pa ni lus zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /🔽gang de ltar sgom pa de lus la sogs pa rdo rje thogs med de /
analyzed: 'di'i phan yon bstan pa ni lus zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste / gang de ltar sgom pa de lus la sogs pa rdo rje thogs med de /
translated: The teaching of the benefits of that is the body, etc.🔽The one who meditates in that way has a body, etc., vajra that is unobstructed,

original: don yod par grub pa de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: don yod par grub pa de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: and becomes like that Amoghasiddhi.

original: dpal ni mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba ste /
analyzed: dpal ni mchog tu dga' ba'i bde ba ste /
translated: Glory is the bliss of supreme joy.

original: de 'di la yod pas na dpal ldan no //
analyzed: de 'di la yod pas na dpal ldan no //
translated: Since he has that, he is glorious.

original: ye shes ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'o //
analyzed: ye shes ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'o //
translated: Wisdom is Sarvanivarana Viskambini.

original: de'i rgya mtshon gnas te don yod par grub pa'o //
analyzed: de'i rgya mtshon gnas te don yod par grub pa'o //
translated: His symbol is Amoghasiddhi.

original: sems can thams cad kyi don ni sems can kun don te /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don ni sems can kun don te /
translated: The aim of all sentient beings is the aim of all sentient beings.

original: sems can thams cad skyed pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
analyzed: sems can thams cad skyed pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
translated: It has the characteristic of generating all sentient beings.

original: gang las de 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni /
analyzed: gang las de 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni /
translated: From which it arises,🔽the aim of all sentient beings will arise.

original: sems can kun don 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gdon mi za ba ste /
analyzed: sems can kun don 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gdon mi za ba ste /
translated: Thus the Blessed One, the invincible Vajra,

original: rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: the Great Vajra Holder, has declared.

original: gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig ni don yod par grub pa'o //
analyzed: gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig ni don yod par grub pa'o //
translated: The invincible commitment is Amoghasiddhi.

original: de las 'byung ba ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba gang @84a * //🔽yin pa ste /
analyzed: de las 'byung ba ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba gang @84a * // yin pa ste /
translated: From that arises the one who is the remover of all obscurations.

original: de'i 'od zer ni de dang 'dra bar byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le ste /
analyzed: de'i 'od zer ni de dang 'dra bar byung ba'i byang chub kyi sems kyi thig le ste /
translated: His light rays are the bindu of bodhicitta that arises like that.

original: de rnams gang du 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de rnams gang du 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The samādhi from which they arise is called that.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mig la sogs par dgod pa bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mig la sogs par dgod pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the placement of the bodhisattvas in the eyes, etc.,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgod pas kyang bskyed par bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgod pas kyang bskyed par bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach that one should also generate the Tathāgata’s smile,

original: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, in the middle of the realm of space, etc.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings ni de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ni de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The realm of space is suchness.

original: de'i dbus su chud pas na nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa ste /🔽bskyed pa'i rim gyis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'od bzang po ste /
analyzed: de'i dbus su chud pas na nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas pa ste / bskyed pa'i rim gyis rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'od bzang po ste /
translated: Since it is situated in the middle of that, it is situated in the middle of the realm of space.🔽The excellent light of the maṇḍala of perfect buddhahood is the body of Great Vajradhara.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i skur bsam zhing bdag nyid bsgom par byas la /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i skur bsam zhing bdag nyid bsgom par byas la /
translated: Having contemplated that, one should meditate on oneself.

original: de'i mig gi gnas su rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad rab tu bsgoms la /
analyzed: de'i mig gi gnas su rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad rab tu bsgoms la /
translated: In the location of one’s eyes, one should meditate on Vajra Vairocana.

original: sku gsum aom ni rab tu bsgom //🔽zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sku gsum aom ni rab tu bsgom // zhes bya ba la /
translated: The three bodies’ Oṃ is well meditated.

original: sku gsum aom ni rdo rje rnam par sdang mdzad do //
analyzed: sku gsum aom ni rdo rje rnam par sdang mdzad do //
translated: The three bodies’ Oṃ is Vajra Acala.

original: rab tu bsgom zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rab tu bsgom zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “Well meditated”

original: rim bzhin du zhes bya bar sbyar te /
analyzed: rim bzhin du zhes bya bar sbyar te /
translated: means in sequence.

original: sku gsum rnam par snang mdzad yin te /
analyzed: sku gsum rnam par snang mdzad yin te /
translated: The three bodies are Vairocana.

original: de skyes pa'i yi ge aom ni sku gsum aom ste /🔽de mig gi sbubs su bsgoms la de yongs su gyur pa las /
analyzed: de skyes pa'i yi ge aom ni sku gsum aom ste / de mig gi sbubs su bsgoms la de yongs su gyur pa las /
translated: The syllable oṃ that produces it is the oṃ of the three bodies.🔽Meditate on that in the cavity of the eye.

original: rnam par snang mdzad nyid mig gi dbang po'i rang bzhin du bsgom mo //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad nyid mig gi dbang po'i rang bzhin du bsgom mo //
translated: From that, Vairocana himself is meditated on as the nature of the eye sense-faculty.

original: rdo rje gsum ni gzugs rnam pa gsum ste /
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni gzugs rnam pa gsum ste /
translated: The three vajras are the three aspects of form.

original: mig gi dbang po'i ngo bo nyid kyis mnyam par dmigs pas na /
analyzed: mig gi dbang po'i ngo bo nyid kyis mnyam par dmigs pas na /
translated: Since the eye sense-faculty is apprehended as the same nature,

original: rdo rje dam tshig gsum ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: rdo rje dam tshig gsum ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: the three vajra commitments are Vairocana.

original: de mig tu bsgoms shing rnam par bsams pas rnam par snang mdzad de /
analyzed: de mig tu bsgoms shing rnam par bsams pas rnam par snang mdzad de /
translated: Meditating on that in the eye and visualizing it, one becomes the same as Vairocana,

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po dang snga ma bzhin du nge mnyam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po dang snga ma bzhin du nge mnyam par 'gyur ro //
translated: the Great Vajradhara, as before.

original: de'i phan yon bstan pa ni lus dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de'i phan yon bstan pa ni lus dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The benefits of that are taught beginning with “the body” and so on.

original: de ltar bsgom pa'i sgrub pa po gang yin pa /
analyzed: de ltar bsgom pa'i sgrub pa po gang yin pa /
translated: The practitioner who meditates in that way

original: lus la sogs pa'i rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra ba'i 'od de /
analyzed: lus la sogs pa'i rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad dang 'dra ba'i 'od de /
translated: has a body and so forth that is the vajra of Vairocana, with a light like that of Vairocana.

original: rnam par snang mdzad dang gzi brjid 'dra zhing ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid dang / ye shes kyi lus kyis mngon par byang chub cing ;
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad dang gzi brjid 'dra zhing ye shes kyi ngo bo nyid dang / ye shes kyi lus kyis mngon par byang chub cing ;
translated: Since he is similar to Vairocana in splendor, and is the very essence of pristine awareness, and since he is fully enlightened and realizes the pristine awareness body,

original: / rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir na ye shes byang chub pa'o //
analyzed: / rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir na ye shes byang chub pa'o //
translated: he is the pristine awareness enlightenment.

original: sku gsum mi phyed pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang ngo //
analyzed: sku gsum mi phyed pa ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'i go 'phang ngo //
translated: The indivisibility of the three bodies is the state of Great Vajradhara.

original: de sgrub par byed pas ni /
analyzed: de sgrub par byed pas ni /
translated: Since he accomplishes that,

original: sku gsum mi phyed sgrub byed 'gyur //
analyzed: sku gsum mi phyed sgrub byed 'gyur //
translated: he is the one who accomplishes the indivisibility of the three bodies.

original: zhes bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: zhes bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnam par snang mdzad kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Thus did the Blessed One, Vajra Vairocana, declare.

original: lus dang ngag @84b dang sems nyid kyis dmigs shing bzung bas na /
analyzed: lus dang ngag @84b dang sems nyid kyis dmigs shing bzung bas na /
translated: Since he is perceived and apprehended by means of body, speech, and mind,

original: lus dang ngag dang yid dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang yid dmigs pa ste /
translated: he is the object of body, speech, and mind.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sku'o //
translated: He is the body of Great Vajradhara.

original: de'i mig gi dbang po'i gnas na gnas nas gzugs rnam pa gsum shes shing mngon par rtogs pas na mngon par byang chub pa'o //
analyzed: de'i mig gi dbang po'i gnas na gnas nas gzugs rnam pa gsum shes shing mngon par rtogs pas na mngon par byang chub pa'o //
translated: Since he abides in the abode of the eye faculty of that [Vajradhara], and since he knows and realizes the three kinds of forms, he is the full enlightenment.

original: de nyid mi shigs par 'byung bas na rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de nyid mi shigs par 'byung bas na rdo rje ste /
translated: Since that arises as indestructible, it is a vajra.

original: de skyed par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin de ston par byed pa la ni lus dang ngag dang yid dmigs pa mngon par byang chub pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ste /
analyzed: de skyed par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin de ston par byed pa la ni lus dang ngag dang yid dmigs pa mngon par byang chub pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ste /
translated: The samadhi that generates that is called the vajra samadhi of the manifest enlightenment of the focus of body, speech, and mind.

original: dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o //
translated: This is an explanation that is not the intended meaning.

original: rnam par dpen pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sgrub pa po'i gnas gsungs pa yin te /
analyzed: rnam par dpen pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sgrub pa po'i gnas gsungs pa yin te /
translated: The state of the practitioner is stated by “isolated,” and so on.

original: skye bo 'dus pa rnam par spangs pas rnam par dben pa'i ri'i rtse mo me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pas brgyan pa ste /
analyzed: skye bo 'dus pa rnam par spangs pas rnam par dben pa'i ri'i rtse mo me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pas brgyan pa ste /
translated: Isolated means free of crowds of people, on the peak of a mountain adorned with flowers, fruit, and so on.🔽The river is a stream, and the nearby places are the gardens and so on.

original: klung ste chu bo 'bab pa skyed mos tshal la sogs pa dang nye ba'i phyogs rnams dang / dur khrod la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni shing gcig pa dag /
analyzed: klung ste chu bo 'bab pa skyed mos tshal la sogs pa dang nye ba'i phyogs rnams dang / dur khrod la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni shing gcig pa dag /
translated: The cemetery and so on. The word and so on refers to the solitary tree and so on.

original: khang stong dang / lha'i khang pa la sogs pa yid dang mthun pa'i gnas gzhan dag tu yang /
analyzed: khang stong dang / lha'i khang pa la sogs pa yid dang mthun pa'i gnas gzhan dag tu yang /
translated: In other places that are agreeable to the mind, such as empty houses, temples, and so on,

original: bsam gtan bsdus pa ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan bsdus pa ste /
translated: one should practice the concentration that is summarized🔽in the collections of meditative stabilizations such as the Heart of the

original: sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs su bya ba /
analyzed: sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs su bya ba /
translated: Earth.

original: bshad ma thag pa de dag bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa de dag bsgom par bya'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: One should cultivate those just explained.

original: drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to //
translated: This is the interpretable meaning.

original: ri bo rnam par dben pa ste /
analyzed: ri bo rnam par dben pa ste /

translated: Akṣobhya, Ratnasaṃbhava, Amitābha, and Amoghasiddhi.

analyzed: de rnams snga ma bzhin du rna ba'i skye mched la sogs pa la /
translated: Those, as before, in the ear sense-sphere, etc.,

analyzed: 'od gsal ba la dmigs pa sngon du 'gro bas bsgoms la /
translated: having meditated on the clear light as the object,

original: mngon par shes pa lnga po'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga po'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: by the yoga of the five superknowledges,

original: zhes pa rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sbyor bas sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i gnas su sangs rgyas te /
analyzed: zhes pa rdo rje 'chang chen po'i sbyor bas sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i gnas su sangs rgyas te /
translated: by the yoga of Great Vajradhara, having become a Buddha in the abode of Kṣitigarbha, etc.,

analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa de rnams kyi bsgom pa bya'o //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rdo rje 'chang chen po ni sgrub pa po'o //
