original: de rnams kyi dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'i dam tshig go //
analyzed: de rnams kyi dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje ni mi phyed pa'i dam tshig go //
translated: Their great commitment vajra is the indivisible commitment.

original: de ston par mkhyen pas dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje mngon par mkhyen pa ste /
analyzed: de ston par mkhyen pas dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje mngon par mkhyen pa ste /
translated: Knowing that to be taught, he is the one who knows the great commitment vajra.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes pa ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o //🔽bskyed pa'i rim pas sa bon rnam par dgod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes pa ste sgra ji bzhin pa'o // bskyed pa'i rim pas sa bon rnam par dgod pa sngon du 'gro bas /
translated: Great Vajradhara spoke thus.

original: mngon par shes pa lnga bsgrub pa nye bar bstan nas /
analyzed: mngon par shes pa lnga bsgrub pa nye bar bstan nas /
translated: Having previously taught the accomplishment of the five superknowledges through the generation stage, the arrangement of the seed syllables,

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the completion stage,

original: rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares the great vajra, etc.

original: rtse lnga pa ni dbang po rnam pa lnga ste mdung ltar yul rnams la 'bigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rtse lnga pa ni dbang po rnam pa lnga ste mdung ltar yul rnams la 'bigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The five-pronged [vajra] is the five sense faculties, because they pierce the objects like a spear.

original: de nyid ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
translated: That itself is Great Vajradhara,

original: mi shigs par 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi shigs par 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it arises as indestructible.

original: 'bar ba lnga ni rnam par ldang ba la sogs pa 'od zer rnam pa lnga'o //
analyzed: 'bar ba lnga ni rnam par ldang ba la sogs pa 'od zer rnam pa lnga'o //
translated: The five flames are the five-fold light of arising, etc.

original: de rnams kyis brgyan zhing spud pa ni /
analyzed: de rnams kyis brgyan zhing spud pa ni /
translated: Adorned with those,

original: spro ba dang bsdu bas bskyed pa'o //
analyzed: spro ba dang bsdu bas bskyed pa'o //
translated: generated by the emanation and gathering.

original: gnas lnga ni gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gnas lnga ni gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'o //
translated: The five places are form, sound, etc.

original: de ru rab tu sbyor zhing rab tu 'byung pas rdo rje mngon shes ni rdo rje 'chang chen po yin te /
analyzed: de ru rab tu sbyor zhing rab tu 'byung pas rdo rje mngon shes ni rdo rje 'chang chen po yin te /
translated: Since he is engaged in and has emerged from that, the vajra with superknowledge is Great Vajradhara.🔽

original: de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'o //🔽me stag mang po 'khrug pa yi //🔽zhes pa ni /
analyzed: de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'o // me stag mang po 'khrug pa yi // zhes pa ni /
translated: There, by being engaged and emerging, one becomes like the vajra superknowledge, which is Great Vajradhara.

original: 'od zer lnga'i bdag nyid can no //
analyzed: 'od zer lnga'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: The vajra is the five-colored light,

original: rang sngags ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can yi ge gsum mo //
analyzed: rang sngags ni 'jug pa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin can yi ge gsum mo //
translated: and the wheel is the three syllables, which are the nature of entry and so forth.

original: de rgyun mi 'chad par zo chun gyi 'khrul 'khor dang 'dra bar nyin dang mtshan du rab tu bskor bas na 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: de rgyun mi 'chad par zo chun gyi 'khrul 'khor dang 'dra bar nyin dang mtshan du rab tu bskor bas na 'khor lo'o //
translated: Since that is turned continuously, like a waterwheel, day and night, it is a wheel.

original: rdo rje lnga ni kha dog lnga ste /
analyzed: rdo rje lnga ni kha dog lnga ste /
translated: The five vajras are the five colors.

original: de rnams kyi sbyor bas drangs pas rdo rje mngon shes dang 'dra par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi sbyor bas drangs pas rdo rje mngon shes dang 'dra par 'gyur ro //
translated: Since one is drawn by the application of those, one becomes like the vajra superknowledge.

original: rdo rje nam mkha' ni rang gi phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs so //🔽de'i dkyil du chud pa ni gnas pa ste /
analyzed: rdo rje nam mkha' ni rang gi phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs so // de'i dkyil du chud pa ni gnas pa ste /
translated: The vajra space is one’s own form of the great seal.

original: 'khor lo ni dbang po'i tshogs so //
analyzed: 'khor lo ni dbang po'i tshogs so //
translated: The wheel is the collection of sense organs.

original: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'o //
translated: The buddhas are Vairocana and so forth.

original: des nye bar mtshon pa'i 'bar ba'i 'od ni dkar @85b bo la sogs pa'i 'od zer te /
analyzed: des nye bar mtshon pa'i 'bar ba'i 'od ni dkar @85b bo la sogs pa'i 'od zer te /
translated: The blazing light, illustrated by that, is the light rays of white and so forth.

original: 'od de dang 'dra ba ni de dang mnyam pa'i kha dog bsam zhing shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'od de dang 'dra ba ni de dang mnyam pa'i kha dog bsam zhing shes par bya ba'o //
translated: The color like that light is the color equal to that, which is to be imagined and known.

original: sangs rgyas ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams ni 'dir phung po lnga'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams ni 'dir phung po lnga'o //
translated: The Buddhas are the five aggregates, such as form, here.

original: 'jug pa ni mnyam par sbyor bas so //
analyzed: 'jug pa ni mnyam par sbyor bas so //
translated: The engagement is by means of the union.

original: sangs rgyas ni 'dir phung po lnga'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni 'dir phung po lnga'o //
translated: The Buddhas are the five aggregates, here.

original: de rnams kyi gnas ni ye shes kyi sku rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi gnas ni ye shes kyi sku rdo rje 'chang chen po ste /
translated: Their abode is the gnosis body of Great Vajradhara.

original: de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: One becomes like that.

original: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag nye bar bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag nye bar bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the other samadhis of the completion stage,

original: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says the mandala of the Buddhas, and so forth.

original: rtogs pa'i phyir na sangs rgyas te gang zhig rtogs she na /
analyzed: rtogs pa'i phyir na sangs rgyas te gang zhig rtogs she na /
translated: Because of realization, there are Buddhas. What is realized?

original: shes bya'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: shes bya'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The mandala of the knowable.

original: bdag gi lus ni khams gsum pa'i lus su lhag par mos pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gi lus ni khams gsum pa'i lus su lhag par mos pa'o //
translated: One’s own body is the imagination of the body of the three realms.

original: snang mdzad gzhag ces bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad du brtag pa'o //🔽snying gar yi ge aom bsams la //
analyzed: snang mdzad gzhag ces bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad du brtag pa'o // snying gar yi ge aom bsams la //
translated: The installation of Vairochana is the imagination of Vairochana.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Having contemplated the syllable Om at the heart,

original: khams gsum pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku rdo rje'i thugs kar yi ge aom zhes bya ba /
analyzed: khams gsum pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi sku rdo rje'i thugs kar yi ge aom zhes bya ba /
translated: the mantra is the syllable Om at the heart of the Vajra Body, which is the nature of the three worlds.

original: ye shes sems dpa' bsams la sngags la zhes bya ba ye shes sems dpa' la /
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' bsams la sngags la zhes bya ba ye shes sems dpa' la /
translated: Having contemplated the knowledge being,

original: rnam par shes pa bsgom pa ni thig le'i bdag nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dpa' bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa bsgom pa ni thig le'i bdag nyid can gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dpa' bsgom par bya'o //
translated: the contemplation of consciousness is the contemplation of the concentration being, which has the nature of a drop.

original: de ltar slob par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
analyzed: de ltar slob par byed pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
translated: The yogi who practices in this way,

original: sems 'gog pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su chud pas thig ler bsgom pa yang spangs nas /
analyzed: sems 'gog pa'i rdo rje'i dbus su chud pas thig ler bsgom pa yang spangs nas /
translated: having abandoned the contemplation of the drop, which is the penetration into the center of the vajra of the cessation of mind,

original: gang gi tshe 'od gsal ba'i mthar thug par gyur pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'od gsal ba'i mthar thug par gyur pa de'i tshe /
translated: when he reaches the culmination of clear light,

original: rnal 'byor pa de sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po de sgrub par byed pas na /
analyzed: rnal 'byor pa de sangs rgyas kun gyi mchog rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po de sgrub par byed pas na /
translated: then that yogi accomplishes the supreme of all Buddhas, the Great Vajra Holder.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchog sgrub par 'gyur zhing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchog sgrub par 'gyur zhing /
translated: One will accomplish the supreme of all buddhas.

original: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra la /
analyzed: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra la /
translated: Since it fulfills all wishes, it is like a wish-fulfilling gem.

original: tshogs gnyis dang nye bar ldan pas /
analyzed: tshogs gnyis dang nye bar ldan pas /
translated: Since it is endowed with the two accumulations,

original: dpal ldan te de lta bur 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: dpal ldan te de lta bur 'gyur ba'o //
translated: it is glorious.

original: de bzhin du rang gi sems khams gsum pa'i sems kyi ngo bo nyid mi bskyod par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rang gi sems khams gsum pa'i sems kyi ngo bo nyid mi bskyod par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should meditate on one’s mind as the essence of the mind of the third realm, Akṣobhya.

original: de nas khams gsum pa'i dam tshig sems dpa'i snying gar yi ge h'um ye shes sems dpa' bsgoms nas /
analyzed: de nas khams gsum pa'i dam tshig sems dpa'i snying gar yi ge h'um ye shes sems dpa' bsgoms nas /
translated: Then, in the heart of the pledge being of the three realms, one should meditate on the letter hūṃ, the awareness being.

original: sems ni thig ler gyur bar gzhag / ces bya ba /🔽dam tshig sems dpa'i snying gar gnas pa'i ye shes sems dpa' zhes grags pa la /
analyzed: sems ni thig ler gyur bar gzhag / ces bya ba / dam tshig sems dpa'i snying gar gnas pa'i ye shes sems dpa' zhes grags pa la /
translated: “The mind is placed in the form of a drop”

original: rang gi sems thig ler gyur pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dpa'i gzugs can gzhag go //
analyzed: rang gi sems thig ler gyur pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sems dpa'i gzugs can gzhag go //
translated: means that in the heart of the pledge being, which is renowned as the awareness being, one should place one’s mind in the form of a drop, the concentration being.

original: @86a * // rang gi gsung rdo rje yang snga ma bzhin du khams gsum pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid du bsams la /
analyzed: @86a * // rang gi gsung rdo rje yang snga ma bzhin du khams gsum pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid du bsams la /
translated: One’s own vajra speech is also imagined as the nature of the three realms, as before.

original: de tshe dpag tu med par rab tu bsgoms nas /🔽dam tshig sems dpa'i snying gar yi ge a'a:ye shes sems dpa' bsams te /
analyzed: de tshe dpag tu med par rab tu bsgoms nas / dam tshig sems dpa'i snying gar yi ge a'a:ye shes sems dpa' bsams te /
translated: Then, having meditated on it as limitless,🔽one should imagine the syllable Aḥ at the heart of the pledge-being, the gnosis-being.

original: rdo rje zhes pa rang gi sems ting nge 'dzin sems dpar gtogs par gzhag cing dgod par bya'o //🔽'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
analyzed: rdo rje zhes pa rang gi sems ting nge 'dzin sems dpar gtogs par gzhag cing dgod par bya'o // 'di ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
translated: “Vajra” is one’s own mind, which is the concentration being.

original: bshad ma thag pa'i dam tshig gsum gyi phan yon nye bar sdud pa yin te /
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i dam tshig gsum gyi phan yon nye bar sdud pa yin te /
translated: This is the summary of the benefits of the three pledges just explained.

original: dam tshig mchog ni bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: dam tshig mchog ni bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa'o //
translated: The supreme pledge is the meditation on the creation stage.

original: de'i mchog yin pas na dam tshig gi mchog gi mchog go//
analyzed: de'i mchog yin pas na dam tshig gi mchog gi mchog go//
translated: Since it is supreme among those, it is the supreme of supreme pledges.

original: rdo rje gsum ni sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid do //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum ni sems can thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid do //
translated: The three vajras are the body, speech, and mind of all sentient beings.

original: des rang gi lus dang ngag dad yid rdo rje dang mi phyed pa nyid du bsgom pa ni /
analyzed: des rang gi lus dang ngag dad yid rdo rje dang mi phyed pa nyid du bsgom pa ni /
translated: The meditation on one’s own body, speech, and mind as indivisible from those

original: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgom pa'o //
analyzed: rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgom pa'o //
translated: is the meditation on the three indestructible realities.

original: 'gog pa'i dam tshig ni 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: 'gog pa'i dam tshig ni 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The pledge of cessation is the retention.

original: gang gis shes pa de ni 'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes so //
analyzed: gang gis shes pa de ni 'gog pa'i dam tshig ye shes so //
translated: He who knows this is the gnosis of the pledge of cessation.

original: sangs rgyas ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams so //🔽de rnams kyi dngos grub ni tha mal pa'i lus dang bral nas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas ni gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams so // de rnams kyi dngos grub ni tha mal pa'i lus dang bral nas /
translated: The buddhas are the aggregates of form and so forth.

original: zab cing rgya che ba'i bdag nyid can gyi ye shes kyi lus yongs su len pa ste /
analyzed: zab cing rgya che ba'i bdag nyid can gyi ye shes kyi lus yongs su len pa ste /
translated: Their success is the attainment of the body of gnosis, which is profound and vast, by being free from the ordinary body.

original: de 'thob cing rnyed par 'gyur bas na sangs rgyas dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de 'thob cing rnyed par 'gyur bas na sangs rgyas dngos grub thob 'gyur ba'o //
translated: That is attained and obtained, so it is the attainment of the success of buddhahood.

original: don 'di nyid rnam pa gzhan gyis gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: don 'di nyid rnam pa gzhan gyis gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to make this very meaning clear in another way,

original: rdo rje nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje nam mkha' zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: the vajra space, etc. is stated.

original: rdo rje nam mkha' ni 'od gsal ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje nam mkha' ni 'od gsal ba'o //
translated: The vajra space is the clearlight transparency.

original: der 'dzin pas na nam mkha'i dbyings te /
analyzed: der 'dzin pas na nam mkha'i dbyings te /
translated: The sphere of space is the retention of that.

original: khams gsum pa der gnas par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: khams gsum pa der gnas par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on the abiding in that, the three worlds.

original: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya ba ni /
analyzed: gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya ba ni /
translated: The meditation on the clear mandala is

original: sku rdo rje'o //
analyzed: sku rdo rje'o //
translated: the vajra body.

original: khams gsum pa'i lus dang ngag dang sems la yi ge aom ye shes sems dpa' bsgoms te /🔽khams gsum pa'i lus dang ngag dang sems nye bar bcom nas /
analyzed: khams gsum pa'i lus dang ngag dang sems la yi ge aom ye shes sems dpa' bsgoms te / khams gsum pa'i lus dang ngag dang sems nye bar bcom nas /
translated: One should meditate on the syllable oṃ as the gnosis being in the body, speech, and mind of the three realms.🔽Having destroyed the body, speech, and mind of the three realms,

original: ye shes kyi sku bsgom mo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: ye shes kyi sku bsgom mo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: one should meditate on the gnosis body.

original: de ltar bsgom pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar bsgom pas cir 'gyur zhe na /
translated: What happens by meditating in this way?

original: bsams na de ni bskal par gnas //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: bsams na de ni bskal par gnas // zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: If one wishes, one can remain for an eon.

original: sems can thams cad kyi yid la re ba'i rtog pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas bskal pa ste /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi yid la re ba'i rtog pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pas bskal pa ste /
translated: An eon is the fulfillment of the wishes of all sentient beings.

original: der gnas pa 'khor ba ji srid par sku gsum gyi bdag nyid can du gyur nas /
analyzed: der gnas pa 'khor ba ji srid par sku gsum gyi bdag nyid can du gyur nas /
translated: Remaining there, for as long as cyclic existence lasts, one becomes the embodiment of the three bodies,

original: skye bo @86b ma lus pa'i mngon par 'dod pa'i don rdzogs par nus pas gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: skye bo @86b ma lus pa'i mngon par 'dod pa'i don rdzogs par nus pas gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: and one remains able to fulfill the wishes of all beings.

original: ting nge 'dzin gnyis po dag kyang bshad pa 'di nyid kyis shes par bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gnyis po dag kyang bshad pa 'di nyid kyis shes par bya'o //
translated: One should understand the two meditative stabilizations through this very explanation.

original: rdo rje gsum gyi rtog pa'i dam tshig gis zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi rtog pa'i dam tshig gis zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The pledge of the imagination of the three vajras is as follows.

original: sku rdo rje la sogs pas 'gro ba'i don rtog cing rdzogs par byed pas na /
analyzed: sku rdo rje la sogs pas 'gro ba'i don rtog cing rdzogs par byed pas na /
translated: Since the vajra of body and so on think and accomplish the welfare of beings,

original: rdo rje gsum gyi rtog pa'i dam tshig ste rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje gsum gyi rtog pa'i dam tshig ste rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: they are the commitments of the thought of the three vajras, which is Great Vajradhara.

original: sku dang gsung dang thugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phan yon yin te /🔽sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi ste /
analyzed: sku dang gsung dang thugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni phan yon yin te / sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje yi ste /
translated: The benefits are stated beginning with “body, speech, mind, and so on.”🔽The two kinds of yogis of Great Vajradhara,

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pa rnam pa gnyis po 'di la /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'i rnal 'byor pa rnam pa gnyis po 'di la /
translated: who are endowed with the vajra of body, speech, and mind,

original: bla ma rnams kyis dbang bskur zhing gnang ba thob pa phyin chad nas brtsams te /
analyzed: bla ma rnams kyis dbang bskur zhing gnang ba thob pa phyin chad nas brtsams te /
translated: should begin with receiving empowerment and permission from the gurus.

original: 'di rnal 'byor pa gang zhig klog pa dang gzhan rnams la ston pa dang / sems kyang rung ste zhes bya ba ste /🔽gang rang nyid slob pa de yang rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di rnal 'byor pa gang zhig klog pa dang gzhan rnams la ston pa dang / sems kyang rung ste zhes bya ba ste / gang rang nyid slob pa de yang rdo rje 'dzin 'drar 'gyur te /
translated: The yogis who read this, teach it to others, and contemplate it🔽will become like Vajradhara.

original: sgom pa po nyid 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad do zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: sgom pa po nyid 'ba' zhig tu ni ma zad do zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The thought is that not only the meditator but also anyone who studies this will become like Vajradhara.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags ni aom la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags ni aom la sogs pa ste /
translated: The mantras of all the tathagatas are om and so on.

original: des bskyed pa'i dam tshig ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: des bskyed pa'i dam tshig ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: The commitment generated by that is Great Vajradhara.

original: de nyid ni sngags la mchog tu gzhol ba rnams kyi de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: de nyid ni sngags la mchog tu gzhol ba rnams kyi de kho na nyid do //
translated: That itself is the reality of those who are devoted to the mantra.

original: rig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: rig pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: Knowledge is the perfection of wisdom.

original: de las yang dag par byung ba'i skyes bu ni rig pa'i skyes bu'o //
analyzed: de las yang dag par byung ba'i skyes bu ni rig pa'i skyes bu'o //
translated: The person who has arisen from that is the person of knowledge.

original: de nyid ni ye shes kyi dam tshig yin pas na mchog ste /
analyzed: de nyid ni ye shes kyi dam tshig yin pas na mchog ste /
translated: That itself is the commitment of gnosis, and thus is supreme.

original: gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi dam tshig ni /
analyzed: gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi dam tshig ni /
translated: That which is the commitment of the mantra of all the tathagatas

original: de kho na nyid kyang yin la rig pa'i skyes bu'i mchog kyang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid rdo rje'i rig pa'i skyes bu mchog gi le'u ste dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: de kho na nyid kyang yin la rig pa'i skyes bu'i mchog kyang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngags kyi dam tshig de kho na nyid rdo rje'i rig pa'i skyes bu mchog gi le'u ste dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
translated: is the reality and the supreme person of knowledge. That is the chapter on the commitment of the mantra of all the tathagatas, the reality of the supreme person of knowledge, which is an explanation through the intention.

original: sgron ma gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa las /
analyzed: sgron ma gsal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa las /
translated: In the commentary called Illuminating Lamp,

original: le'u bcu gcig pa mtha' drug gis bshad pa'o /
analyzed: le'u bcu gcig pa mtha' drug gis bshad pa'o /
translated: the eleventh chapter is explained through the six limits.

original: // / de ltar las kyi lam rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
analyzed: // / de ltar las kyi lam rnam par dag pa bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the pure path of action,

original: rim pa gnyis kyi phyag rgya chen po yongs su thim pa rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rim pa gnyis kyi phyag rgya chen po yongs su thim pa rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the dissolution of the great seal of the two stages,🔽then, etc.

original: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa le'u bcu gnyis pa gsungs te /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa le'u bcu gnyis pa gsungs te /
translated: The twelfth chapter is spoken.

original: sa 'og dang sa steng dang sa bla ba rnams la ston par mdzad pas na ston pa'o //🔽de nyid ni 'byin pa po yin pas @87a * //
analyzed: sa 'og dang sa steng dang sa bla ba rnams la ston par mdzad pas na ston pa'o // de nyid ni 'byin pa po yin pas @87a * //
translated: He is the teacher because he teaches those on the lower, upper, and heavenly realms.

original: na skyed pa'o //
analyzed: na skyed pa'o //
translated: He is the producer because he is the creator.

original: ye shes mchog ni rin po che lta bu'i gang zag go //
analyzed: ye shes mchog ni rin po che lta bu'i gang zag go //
translated: The supreme intuition is the person who is like a jewel.

original: de rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'jog pas sgrub par mdzad pas na ye shes mchog sgrub pa'o //
analyzed: de rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'jog pas sgrub par mdzad pas na ye shes mchog sgrub pa'o //
translated: He is the producer of the supreme intuition because he establishes him in the vajra-like meditative concentration.

original: dam tshig rdo rje gsum ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: dam tshig rdo rje gsum ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: The three vajra commitments are the great Vajradhara.

original: de'i de kho na nyid ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: de'i de kho na nyid ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: His reality is the ultimate truth.

original: de rdo rje gsung gis 'og nas bshad pa'i mtshan nyid bka' stsal pa'o //
analyzed: de rdo rje gsung gis 'og nas bshad pa'i mtshan nyid bka' stsal pa'o //
translated: He declares it with the vajra speech, which has the characteristics explained below.

original: mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: mkha' dang mtshungs pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: Equal to space.

original: mkha' ni go 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: mkha' ni go 'byed pa'o //
translated: Space is the opening up of the sky.

original: de dang mtshungs pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: de dang mtshungs pa ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: The ultimate truth is similar to that.

original: de dang mnyam zhing gcig tu gyur pa ni mkha' dang mtshungs par mnyam par gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de dang mnyam zhing gcig tu gyur pa ni mkha' dang mtshungs par mnyam par gyur pa ste /
translated: Becoming equal to that, becoming one with that, is becoming equal to space.

original: thams cad kyang don dam pa'i bden pa'i mthar thug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad kyang don dam pa'i bden pa'i mthar thug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all of them are the ultimate truth.

original: de ltar nam mkha' dang mnyam par gyur pa thob pas /
analyzed: de ltar nam mkha' dang mnyam par gyur pa thob pas /
translated: Thus, having attained equality with space,

original: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par mi rtog ngo bo nyid do //
translated: that which becomes the nature of non-conceptuality is the non-conceptual nature.

original: de nyid kyis na chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa la /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa la /
translated: By that very [non-conceptuality], the purity of phenomena

original: rol mo bzhin du spros par gyur pa 'og nas 'chang pa 'di dag rab tu bsgom pa ston pa ste /
analyzed: rol mo bzhin du spros par gyur pa 'og nas 'chang pa 'di dag rab tu bsgom pa ston pa ste /
translated: is like a musical instrument, becoming elaborate. The following teaches the practice of those.

original: dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pa ma yin pas bshad pa'o //
translated: This is an explanation that is not the intended meaning.

original: dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i gnas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i gnas bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the place for accomplishing all powers,

original: dgon pa chen po'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: dgon pa chen po'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares the great forest, and so on.

original: dgon po chen po'i sa phyogs zhes bya ba mchog tu gyur pa'i sa phyogs dang / chu'i tshogs la sogs pas yid du 'ong zhing /
analyzed: dgon po chen po'i sa phyogs zhes bya ba mchog tu gyur pa'i sa phyogs dang / chu'i tshogs la sogs pas yid du 'ong zhing /
translated: The “place of a great monastery” is a supreme place, delightful with a collection of water and so forth,🔽and a mountain adorned with flowers, fruits, and so forth, and other places isolated from people.

original: me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pas brgyan pa'i ri bo dang / skye bos rnam par dben pa'i sa phyogs gzhan rnams su yang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad gang du bsdus shing bsags par gyur pa de ni /
analyzed: me tog dang 'bras bu la sogs pas brgyan pa'i ri bo dang / skye bos rnam par dben pa'i sa phyogs gzhan rnams su yang 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub thams cad gang du bsdus shing bsags par gyur pa de ni /
translated: In those places, all mundane and supramundane powers are gathered and accumulated.

original: dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ste bsgrub par bya ba sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub par bya ba ste /
analyzed: dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa ste bsgrub par bya ba sangs rgyas nyid bsgrub par bya ba ste /
translated: That is the gathering of all powers, the accomplishment of buddhahood to be accomplished.

original: drang ba'i don to //
analyzed: drang ba'i don to //
translated: This is the provisional meaning.

original: lung gis bshad pa brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: lung gis bshad pa brjod par bya ste /
translated: The explanation by scripture should be stated.

original: nam mkha' brtags pa'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: nam mkha' brtags pa'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: The application of investigating space

original: phung po dgon pa chen por 'dod //
analyzed: phung po dgon pa chen por 'dod //
translated: is asserted as the great monastery of the aggregates.

original: gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: gnas med gnas pa'i sbyor ba yis //
translated: The application of abiding without abiding

original: gnas chen po ni sa phyogs yin //
analyzed: gnas chen po ni sa phyogs yin //
translated: is the great place, the place.

original: 'dir ni longs spyod rdzogs pa shang //
analyzed: 'dir ni longs spyod rdzogs pa shang //
translated: Here, the enjoyment body is the sky.

original: dngos grub sna tshogs me tog ldan //
analyzed: dngos grub sna tshogs me tog ldan //
translated: The various powers are its flowers.

original: sprul pa'i 'bras bus yang dag brgyan //
analyzed: sprul pa'i 'bras bus yang dag brgyan //
translated: It is adorned with the fruit of emanation.

original: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub ri //
analyzed: yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub ri //
translated: The stage of perfect enlightenment

original: dngos med dben pa nyams dga' ba'o //
analyzed: dngos med dben pa nyams dga' ba'o //
translated: is the delightful isolation of non-entity.

original: rdo rje zhes bya der bsgrub bya //🔽zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: rdo rje zhes bya der bsgrub bya // zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The vajra is to be accomplished there.

original: @87b nges pa'i don to //
analyzed: @87b nges pa'i don to //
translated: This is the definitive meaning.

original: mam zhes bya ba ni 'og nas 'chad pa'i ting nge 'dzin ston pa'i sa bon no //
analyzed: mam zhes bya ba ni 'og nas 'chad pa'i ting nge 'dzin ston pa'i sa bon no //
translated: The syllable mam is the seed of the teaching of the samadhi that will be explained below.

original: lus dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: lus dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: As for body, etc.,

original: yid kyi rang bzhin gyis bsten cing bsnyen pa yin pas 'jam pa'o //
analyzed: yid kyi rang bzhin gyis bsten cing bsnyen pa yin pas 'jam pa'o //
translated: it is soft because it is attended and served by the nature of mind.

original: de nyid ni mi phyed pa nyid pas na rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de nyid ni mi phyed pa nyid pas na rdo rje'o //
translated: It is vajra because of its indivisibility.

original: de'i rab tu bsgom pa ni rdo rje 'jam pa rab tu bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: de'i rab tu bsgom pa ni rdo rje 'jam pa rab tu bsgom par bya ba'o //
translated: The cultivation of that is the cultivation of the soft vajra.

original: gang du zhe na /
analyzed: gang du zhe na /
translated: Where?

original: rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje la'o //
analyzed: rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rje la'o //
translated: In one's own body, speech, and mind vajras.

original: rang gi lus la sogs pa 'ba' zhig tu yang ma zad kyi /
analyzed: rang gi lus la sogs pa 'ba' zhig tu yang ma zad kyi /
translated: Not only that,

original: de nas khams gsum pa'i lus dang sems la spros pas kyang byas te /
analyzed: de nas khams gsum pa'i lus dang sems la spros pas kyang byas te /
translated: one should also emanate into the bodies and minds of the three realms.

original: de nas ni rdo rje 'jam pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nas ni rdo rje 'jam pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Then, one becomes like Vajra Mañju.

original: dpag tshad brgya yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: dpag tshad brgya yis zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: One hundred yojanas, etc.

original: dpag tshad brgya pa ni dpag tshad brgya ste /
analyzed: dpag tshad brgya pa ni dpag tshad brgya ste /
translated: One hundred yojanas is one hundred yojanas.

original: khyon de tsam du che zhing tshad med grangs med pa'o //
analyzed: khyon de tsam du che zhing tshad med grangs med pa'o //
translated: That much is the extent, immeasurable and innumerable.

original: rdo rje 'bar ba ni rang gi sku gang yin pa de ni 'bar ba'i rdo rje ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar ba ni rang gi sku gang yin pa de ni 'bar ba'i rdo rje ste /
translated: The blazing vajra is the blazing vajra of one's own body.

original: de'i 'od kyi snang ba'o //
analyzed: de'i 'od kyi snang ba'o //
translated: That is the light of its radiance.

original: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pas na /
analyzed: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pas na /
translated: Adorned with the thirty-two marks of a great being,

original: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o //
translated: it is adorned with all ornaments.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i sku mnga' bas na dag pa'i bdag nyid do //
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i sku mnga' bas na dag pa'i bdag nyid do //
translated: Having a body like an illusion, it is of pure nature.

original: 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa gsal bar byed pas na snang bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa gsal bar byed pas na snang bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Illuminating immeasurable world systems with light, it is illuminating.

original: des 'di ltar gyur pa'i ye shes kyi sku brnyes pas /
analyzed: des 'di ltar gyur pa'i ye shes kyi sku brnyes pas /
translated: By attaining the wisdom body that has become like that,

original: tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis nams kyang ste /
analyzed: tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyis nams kyang ste /
translated: Brahma and other gods are never able to see it.

original: nam yang mthong bar mi nus na /
analyzed: nam yang mthong bar mi nus na /
translated: If they are never able to see it,

original: gzhan dag gis lha smos kyang ci dgos te /
analyzed: gzhan dag gis lha smos kyang ci dgos te /
translated: What need is there to mention the gods?

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i spyod yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i spyod yul yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the domain of the irreversible.

original: rdo rje 'jam pa mchog gi dam tshig ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje 'jam pa mchog gi dam tshig ces bya ba ni /
translated: The pledge of the supreme vajra gentleness is

original: 'jam dpal gyi phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: 'jam dpal gyi phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin no //
translated: the nature of Mañjuśrī’s great seal.

original: de ni so so'i skye bo rnams kyis mi mthong zhing mi reg pa nyid kyis na /
analyzed: de ni so so'i skye bo rnams kyis mi mthong zhing mi reg pa nyid kyis na /
translated: Since that is not seen or touched by ordinary beings,

original: ting nge 'dzin 'di ni mi snang ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin 'di ni mi snang ba zhes bya'o //
translated: this meditative absorption is called the “invisible.”

original: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyi sku 'di nyid 'od gsal bas rnam par sbyangs pas bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin gyi sku 'di nyid 'od gsal bas rnam par sbyangs pas bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to establish that very illusory body as purified by clear light,

original: rdo rje mi phyed ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: rdo rje mi phyed ces bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, “The vajra is the indivisible three,” and so on.

original: rdo rje mi phyed gsum ni thugs te /
analyzed: rdo rje mi phyed gsum ni thugs te /
translated: The vajra is the indivisible three, which is the mind.

original: de las byung ba'i yul dang dbang po rnams kyis so //🔽bshang gci ni yul dang dbang po rnams te /
analyzed: de las byung ba'i yul dang dbang po rnams kyis so // bshang gci ni yul dang dbang po rnams te /
translated: The objects and faculties that arise from that are the feces and urine.

original: de phan tshun bsres pas na dam tshig lnga rnams kyis so //
analyzed: de phan tshun bsres pas na dam tshig lnga rnams kyis so //
translated: The objects and faculties are mixed together, and so the five pledges are the five nectars.

original: lcags gsum las byung ba ni snang ba rnam pa gsum dang ldan pa'i skur byas shing bskyed nas /🔽kha ste 'od gsal bar ril @88a * //
analyzed: lcags gsum las byung ba ni snang ba rnam pa gsum dang ldan pa'i skur byas shing bskyed nas / kha ste 'od gsal bar ril @88a * //
translated: which is made of the three metals,

original: por 'dzin pa'am rjes su gzhig pa dag gis bcug nas bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: por 'dzin pa'am rjes su gzhig pa dag gis bcug nas bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate by entering into the clear light, either by the totalities or by the subsequent dissolutions.

original: 'od gsal ba der sangs rgyas kun gyis te rtog ge pa thams cad kyis mi phyed cing yul ma yin pa'i thugs kyi ye shes sku bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: 'od gsal ba der sangs rgyas kun gyis te rtog ge pa thams cad kyis mi phyed cing yul ma yin pa'i thugs kyi ye shes sku bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In that clear light, one should meditate on the body of the pristine wisdom of the mind, which is indivisible and not an object of all the logicians, all the buddhas.

original: gang de ltar sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa de ni /
analyzed: gang de ltar sgom pa'i rnal 'byor pa de ni /
translated: The yogi/nī who meditates in that way

original: de ma thag tu de ldang bar gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can nyid du rdo rje 'jam pa dang 'od 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ste /
analyzed: de ma thag tu de ldang bar gyur pa'i mtshan nyid can nyid du rdo rje 'jam pa dang 'od 'dra bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ste /
translated: will immediately become like Vajra Mañju, having the characteristic of rising up.

original: dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
analyzed: dgongs pas bshad pa'o //
translated: This is the intentional explanation.

original: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis ting nge 'dzin nye bar bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis ting nge 'dzin nye bar bstan nas /
translated: Thus, the bodhisattva Mañjuśrī having taught the samādhi,

original: 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub nye bar bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub nye bar bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the powers of the wheel-holder and so forth,🔽he says,

original: 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'khor lo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: The wheel, etc.

original: dang por rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas la /
analyzed: dang por rnam par snang mdzad kyi ting nge 'dzin mngon du byas la /
translated: First, one should manifest the concentration of Vairocana.

original: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa mdog dkar ba phan tshun bsnol mar 'phro ba lta bu'i 'od zer rnams kyis brgyan pa 'od zer mdangs can 'phro ba rang gi sngags te /
analyzed: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa mdog dkar ba phan tshun bsnol mar 'phro ba lta bu'i 'od zer rnams kyis brgyan pa 'od zer mdangs can 'phro ba rang gi sngags te /
translated: One should visualize a wheel with eight spokes, white in color, adorned with light rays that radiate in mutual embrace, and radiating brilliant light.

original: rnam par snang mdzad bskyed pa'i yi ge aom las /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad bskyed pa'i yi ge aom las /
translated: From the syllable oṃ, which generates Vairocana,

original: 'khor lo bskyed la mdun du bsgoms nas /
analyzed: 'khor lo bskyed la mdun du bsgoms nas /
translated: one should generate the wheel and meditate on it in front.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis te /
translated: One should meditate on it as the abode of all the buddhas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang ldan pa'i bzhugs pa'i gnas te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dang ldan pa'i bzhugs pa'i gnas te /
translated: the abode of those belonging to the Tathāgata family,

original: gzhir gyur par bsgoms la /🔽ji srid du dro bar gyur pa'am /
analyzed: gzhir gyur par bsgoms la / ji srid du dro bar gyur pa'am /
translated: as the basis.🔽One should meditate on it until it becomes warm,

original: du ba 'thul ba'am rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bsgoms la /
analyzed: du ba 'thul ba'am rab tu 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bsgoms la /
translated: smoky, or blazing.

original: de blangs nas 'dug pa'i rnal 'byor pa gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de blangs nas 'dug pa'i rnal 'byor pa gang yin pa de ni /
translated: One who takes that and remains as a yogin,

original: sangs rgyas dang 'dra ba ste rdo rje 'chang chen po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang 'dra ba ste rdo rje 'chang chen po dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro //
translated: One becomes like a Buddha, like Great Vajradhara.

original: de ltar dngos grub thob pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i mthu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: de ltar dngos grub thob pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i mthu bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the power of the knowledge-holder who has attained power in this way,

original: ri rab sum cu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: ri rab sum cu zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “The retinue of thirty-six Sumerus,” and so on.

original: ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi tshad kyi rdul phra rab ji snyed pa de snyed kyi tshad kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'khor de la 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ri rab sum cu rtsa drug gi tshad kyi rdul phra rab ji snyed pa de snyed kyi tshad kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'khor de la 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The retinue that arises for him is as many as the atoms in thirty-six Sumerus.

original: ji lta bu zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bu zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: thams cad kyang rdo rje 'dzin pa dang 'dra bar rnam par mi 'jig pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: thams cad kyang rdo rje 'dzin pa dang 'dra bar rnam par mi 'jig pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
translated: All of them have the nature of indestructibility, like Vajradhara.

original: ting nge 'dzin gang gis 'khor lo dang mnyam pa thob pa de ni /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang gis 'khor lo dang mnyam pa thob pa de ni /
translated: The samādhi by which one attains equality with the wheel is

original: 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: the samādhi called “the commitment of the wheel.”

original: rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: rdo rje chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
translated: “Great vajra,” and so on,

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor dang 'dra bar blta bar bya ste /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor dang 'dra bar blta bar bya ste /
translated: should be viewed as similar to the yoga of Vairocana.

original: rang gi sngags ni yi ge h'um ngo //
analyzed: rang gi sngags ni yi ge h'um ngo //
translated: His mantra is the syllable hūṃ.

original: dkyil 'khor ni nam mkha'i @88b dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor ni nam mkha'i @88b dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The maṇḍala is the maṇḍala of the sky.

original: bud med rnams yon tan can gyi gnas su 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bud med rnams yon tan can gyi gnas su 'gyur zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Women become the abode of qualities.

original: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug tu 'gyur bar ston te /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i dbang phyug tu 'gyur bar ston te /
translated: This shows that he becomes the lord of desire.

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because he is like Great Vajradhara.

original: drag po dag gis phyag byas pa //
analyzed: drag po dag gis phyag byas pa //
translated: He is worshipped by the Rudras.

original: zhes bya ba'i lhag pa'i tshig gis ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i lhag pa'i tshig gis ni /
translated: This additional verse

original: khams gsum gyis phyag bya ba nyid du ston te /
analyzed: khams gsum gyis phyag bya ba nyid du ston te /
translated: shows that he is worshipped by the three realms.

original: drag po ni khams gsum gyis phyag byas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: drag po ni khams gsum gyis phyag byas pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because Rudra is worshipped by the three realms.

original: rdo rje chen por 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen por 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chen por 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang chen por 'gyur ba'o //
translated: He becomes the Great Vajra.

original: rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: Vajra means Great Vajradhara.

original: dam tshig ni mnyam par 'gro zhing bzhud pas na mnyam pa ste /
analyzed: dam tshig ni mnyam par 'gro zhing bzhud pas na mnyam pa ste /
translated: Samaya means going and coming equally,

original: mkha' 'gro ma yin pas na rdo rje'i dam tshig lhan cig spyod pa sdug pa rnams te /
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yin pas na rdo rje'i dam tshig lhan cig spyod pa sdug pa rnams te /
translated: and since he is not a ḍāka, he is the beloved vajra-samaya-sādhana-s.

original: de dang de rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de dang de rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: That samādhi is so called because of that and those.

original: chos rnams ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i rigs dang ldan pa rnams so //
analyzed: chos rnams ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i rigs dang ldan pa rnams so //
translated: The phenomena are those endowed with the family of Amitābha.

original: de rnams kyi gnas ni bskyed pa'i gzhi'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi gnas ni bskyed pa'i gzhi'o //
translated: Their abode is the basis of generation.

original: rdo rje chos ni 'jig rten dbang phyug ste /
analyzed: rdo rje chos ni 'jig rten dbang phyug ste /
translated: Vajradharma is Lokeśvara.

original: de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba'o //
translated: One becomes like him.

original: ri rab ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: ri rab ces bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the line “Meru and so on,”

original: ri rab sum cu rtsa drug las byung ba'i rdul phra rab ji snyed pa gang yin pa de skyed kyi grangs dang mnyam pa'i dag pa'i bdag nyid ni padma'i rigs kyi sangs rgyas te thabs kyi ngo bo nyid dang / mchod pa'i mchog ste shes rab kyi ngo bo nyid dang /
analyzed: ri rab sum cu rtsa drug las byung ba'i rdul phra rab ji snyed pa gang yin pa de skyed kyi grangs dang mnyam pa'i dag pa'i bdag nyid ni padma'i rigs kyi sangs rgyas te thabs kyi ngo bo nyid dang / mchod pa'i mchog ste shes rab kyi ngo bo nyid dang /
translated: the pure nature is the buddha of the lotus family, the nature of method, and the supreme offering, the nature of wisdom, which are equal in number to the atoms that arise from thirty-six Merus.

original: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor te tshogs der 'jog par byed cing /
analyzed: de rnams kyi dkyil 'khor te tshogs der 'jog par byed cing /
translated: One should place the maṇḍala, the assembly of those, there.

original: sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad rang gi bdag po nyid kyis sgrub pa po la dbang bskur ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs thams cad rang gi bdag po nyid kyis sgrub pa po la dbang bskur ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
translated: All the hosts of mantras and seals empower the adept with their own lords.

original: padmo ni padma'i rigs dang ldan pa rnams so //
analyzed: padmo ni padma'i rigs dang ldan pa rnams so //
translated: The lotus is the lotus family.

original: de dang mnyam pa ni ting nge 'dzin gang la dbyer mi phyed pa'i don de la de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de dang mnyam pa ni ting nge 'dzin gang la dbyer mi phyed pa'i don de la de skad ces bya'o //
translated: The sameness with that is the meaning of the samādhi that is indivisible.

original: ye shes lnga ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: ye shes lnga ldan zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of “endowed with the five gnoses” and so forth has been explained.

original: gsang ba gsum la bsnyen bkur byed //🔽ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: gsang ba gsum la bsnyen bkur byed // ces bya ba ni /
translated: One should worship the three secrets.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'brel ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsum la bsnyen bkur byed cing rtogs par 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang 'brel ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba gsum la bsnyen bkur byed cing rtogs par 'gyur ba ste /
translated: One should worship and realize the three secrets of body, speech, and mind, which are connected with all tathāgatas.

original: de'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //🔽'od zer lnga dang lhag pa dang chad pa med par mnyam pa'i mdog gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid can du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o // 'od zer lnga dang lhag pa dang chad pa med par mnyam pa'i mdog gang yin pa de ni /
translated: One becomes of their nature.🔽The color that is equal, without excess or deficiency, with the five lights

original: 'od zer lnga'i mdog 'dra'i 'od do //
analyzed: 'od zer lnga'i mdog 'dra'i 'od do //
translated: is the light that has the color of the five lights.

original: rang gi sngags kyis zhes bya ba ni rang gi sngags @89a * //
analyzed: rang gi sngags kyis zhes bya ba ni rang gi sngags @89a * //
translated: One's own mantra means from one's own mantra.

original: las zhes bya bar rigs so //
analyzed: las zhes bya bar rigs so //
translated: It is reasonable to say from one's own mantra.

original: ral gri ni 'od zer lnga pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: ral gri ni 'od zer lnga pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: The sword is the one with five lights.

original: mig yangs ni sgrub pa po'o //
analyzed: mig yangs ni sgrub pa po'o //
translated: The wide-eyed one is the practitioner.

original: lag na thogs pa ni lag gis blangs pa'o //
analyzed: lag na thogs pa ni lag gis blangs pa'o //
translated: Holding it in the hand means taking it with the hand.

original: rdo rje gsum las byung ba'i rig pa ni phyag rgya chen po ste /
analyzed: rdo rje gsum las byung ba'i rig pa ni phyag rgya chen po ste /
translated: The knowledge born from the three vajras is the great seal.

original: de'i bdag nyid kyis 'dzin par byed pas na /🔽rdo rje gsum rig 'dzin par 'gyur //
analyzed: de'i bdag nyid kyis 'dzin par byed pas na / rdo rje gsum rig 'dzin par 'gyur //
translated: Since one holds it with the nature of that,

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: one becomes a holder of the knowledge of the three vajras.

original: khams gsum po kun gyi gang rdzu 'phrul che ba'i che ba de rnams kyis /
analyzed: khams gsum po kun gyi gang rdzu 'phrul che ba'i che ba de rnams kyis /
translated: Those who are the greatest of all the great wonders in the three realms,

original: mchod pa dang tshangs pa ste /
analyzed: mchod pa dang tshangs pa ste /
translated: those who are worshipped, and Brahma,

original: tshangs pa'i gtso bo dang dbang po ste brgya byin dang lha min te /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i gtso bo dang dbang po ste brgya byin dang lha min te /
translated: the chief of Brahma, Indra, and the asura,🔽the chief of the asuras, they all will pay homage.

original: lha ma yin gyi gtso bo de dag gis kyang phyag byas par 'gyur ba dang / stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gcig pu dpa' ba ste /
analyzed: lha ma yin gyi gtso bo de dag gis kyang phyag byas par 'gyur ba dang / stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su gcig pu dpa' ba ste /
translated: Since one becomes the lord in the trichiliocosm,

original: der bdag por gyur pas so //
analyzed: der bdag por gyur pas so //
translated: one is the sole hero there.

original: gsang ba ni tha mal pa'i sgrub pa la gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gsang ba ni tha mal pa'i sgrub pa la gnas pa'o //
translated: Secret means abiding in the ordinary practice.

original: de rnams kyi mchog ni gtso bo ste der 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de rnams kyi mchog ni gtso bo ste der 'gyur ba'o //
translated: Of those, the supreme is the principal one, that which is to become.

original: gang rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: gang rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Of those who, etc.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin te sgrub pa po gang 'dod cing gsol ba 'debs pa rdo rje thugs las rab tu byung zhing /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'dzin te sgrub pa po gang 'dod cing gsol ba 'debs pa rdo rje thugs las rab tu byung zhing /
translated: The vajra-holder of body, speech, and mind, the practitioner, who desires and prays, arises from the vajra mind,

original: yid la kun tu rtog pa'i de lta bu ste /
analyzed: yid la kun tu rtog pa'i de lta bu ste /
translated: and is such a mental conception.

original: de 'dra ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi dngos grub 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa ster zhing stsol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de 'dra ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi dngos grub 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa ster zhing stsol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Such a nature of the powers, mundane and supramundane, is granted and bestowed.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi ral gri ni ral gri thams cad de /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi ral gri ni ral gri thams cad de /
translated: The sword of the nature of all the Tathagatas is all swords.

original: de dang dbyer med pas ting nge 'dzin kyang ral gri thams cad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de dang dbyer med pas ting nge 'dzin kyang ral gri thams cad ces bya'o //
translated: Since it is inseparable from that, the samadhi is also called “all swords.”

original: de ltar 'khor lo dang rdo rje la sogs pa'i dngos grub bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar 'khor lo dang rdo rje la sogs pa'i dngos grub bstan nas /
translated: Having thus taught the powers of the wheel, vajra, and so forth,🔽now, in order to teach the power of the lotus, he says:

original: da ni phyi rol gyi rdzas las byung ba'i ri lu'i dngos grub ma yin pa sngags nyid kyi ri lu'i dngos grub nges par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni phyi rol gyi rdzas las byung ba'i ri lu'i dngos grub ma yin pa sngags nyid kyi ri lu'i dngos grub nges par bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to teach the elixir pill of mantra itself, which is not the elixir pill arisen from external substances,

original: aom ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: aom ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “Oṃ is the pill,” and so forth.

original: yi ge aom nyid tsan ka'i 'bras bu'i tshad tsam gyi ri lu bsams la /
analyzed: yi ge aom nyid tsan ka'i 'bras bu'i tshad tsam gyi ri lu bsams la /
translated: One should imagine the letter Oṃ itself as a pill the size of a juniper berry.

original: dbus te ri lu'i nang du rang gi lha'i gzugs te /
analyzed: dbus te ri lu'i nang du rang gi lha'i gzugs te /
translated: In the middle, that is, inside the pill, one should imagine the form of one’s deity,

original: sa bon bdag po'i gzugs su bsams la kha ste mgo'i sgor 'jug pa'i rang bzhin du rnam par bsams shing /
analyzed: sa bon bdag po'i gzugs su bsams la kha ste mgo'i sgor 'jug pa'i rang bzhin du rnam par bsams shing /
translated: that is, the seed-syllable in the form of the lord. One should imagine it as having the nature of entering the mouth, that is, the door of the head.

original: bsgom pa yang dang yang du bslab par bya'o //
analyzed: bsgom pa yang dang yang du bslab par bya'o //
translated: One should train again and again in the meditation.

original: gang de ltar slob pa de ni de ma thag tu ste de nas brtsams nas /
analyzed: gang de ltar slob pa de ni de ma thag tu ste de nas brtsams nas /
translated: One who trains in that way will immediately, that is, from that point on,

original: byang chub sems dpa' dang 'od 'dra bar 'gyur te /🔽byang chub ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' dang 'od 'dra bar 'gyur te / byang chub ni don dam pa'i bden pa'o //
translated: become like a bodhisattva in radiance.🔽Awakening is the ultimate truth.

original: sems dpa' ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa ste /
analyzed: sems dpa' ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa ste /
translated: The being is the relative truth.

original: de dag mi gnyis par gnas pa gang yin pa de @89b byang chub sems dpa' ste /
analyzed: de dag mi gnyis par gnas pa gang yin pa de @89b byang chub sems dpa' ste /
translated: That which is the non-duality of those is the Bodhisattva,

original: rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: the Great Vajradhara.

original: de dang 'dra ba'i 'od de rdzu 'phrul gang la yod pa ni /
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba'i 'od de rdzu 'phrul gang la yod pa ni /
translated: The light that is like that, which is the miracle,

original: byang chub sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i 'od 'drar 'gyur //
translated: is the light of the Bodhisattva.

original: zhes bya ste sgrub pa po de lta bur 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ste sgrub pa po de lta bur 'gyur ba'o //
translated: The practitioner becomes like that.

original: gzi brjid blta bar dka' bas na //
analyzed: gzi brjid blta bar dka' bas na //
translated: Since the splendor is difficult to behold,

original: nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing //
analyzed: nyi ma shar ba'i 'od 'dra zhing //
translated: it is like the light of the rising sun.

original: zhes bya'o // 'dzam bu chu po'i gser gyi mdog / ces bya ba ni phan yon no //
analyzed: zhes bya'o // 'dzam bu chu po'i gser gyi mdog / ces bya ba ni phan yon no //
translated: The color of the gold of the Jambū River is the benefit.

original: de bzhin du yi ge a'a: gnas pa'i bdag nyid can mdog dmar po kha ste lkog ma'i gnas su bsam pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du yi ge a'a: gnas pa'i bdag nyid can mdog dmar po kha ste lkog ma'i gnas su bsam pa'o //
translated: Similarly, one should think of the letter Aḥ as the nature of the place, red in color, at the throat.

original: byang chub ye shes ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
analyzed: byang chub ye shes ni rdo rje 'chang chen po'o //
translated: Enlightened wisdom is the Great Vajradhara.

original: yi ge h'um yang ri lu'i gzugs kyis snying ga'i padma dkar po'i steng du ldang ba'i bdag nyid can bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge h'um yang ri lu'i gzugs kyis snying ga'i padma dkar po'i steng du ldang ba'i bdag nyid can bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should think of the letter Hūṃ as the nature of the place, white in color, in the form of a pill, rising on the white lotus of the heart.

original: da ni phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs kyis kyang grub pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni phyag rgya chen po'i gzugs kyis kyang grub pa bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate the powers of the great seal,

original: mkha' dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: mkha' dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares, “the realm of space,” and so on.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings ni de bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings ni de bzhin nyid do //
translated: The realm of space is suchness.

original: der gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
analyzed: der gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
translated: The maṇḍala that manifests there is

original: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsams la /
analyzed: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bsams la /
translated: the maṇḍala of the moon.

original: de'i dkyil du gnas pa'i rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsgoms nas /🔽de'i lag tu 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bsgoms nas /
analyzed: de'i dkyil du gnas pa'i rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid bsgoms nas / de'i lag tu 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bsgoms nas /
translated: Having contemplated that, one should meditate on oneself as Vairocana abiding in its center.🔽Having meditated on an eight-spoked wheel in his hand,

original: de'i lag tu 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bsgoms na /
analyzed: de'i lag tu 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bsgoms na /
translated: if one meditates on an eight-spoked wheel in his hand,

original: 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'khor lo'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: one becomes a wheel-vidyādhara.

original: 'di dag ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: 'di dag ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: How is this done?

original: 'khor lo chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: 'khor lo chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: [The Bhagavān] declares, “the great wheel,” and so on.

original: 'khor lo chen po'i rigs ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs te /
analyzed: 'khor lo chen po'i rigs ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs te /
translated: The great wheel family is the family of Vairocana.

original: de dang por bsgoms la sangs rgyas skur ni rab sbyor zhing ste /
analyzed: de dang por bsgoms la sangs rgyas skur ni rab sbyor zhing ste /
translated: Having first meditated on that, one should apply oneself to the buddha body.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas /
translated: Endowed with the yoga of Vairocana,

original: ye shes 'di ni zhes bya ba rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgrub pa 'di ni /
analyzed: ye shes 'di ni zhes bya ba rnam par snang mdzad kyi sgrub pa 'di ni /
translated: this knowledge, i.e., this practice of Vairocana,

original: ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba sgrub pa pos bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba sgrub pa pos bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: the knowledge-vajra, i.e., the adept, should practice.

original: mkha' dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: mkha' dbyings zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: In the sky-realm, etc.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la /
translated: One should meditate on the sun-disk in the sky-realm,

original: de'i dbus su gnas par gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can mi bskyod bar bdag nyid bsgoms pa ste /
analyzed: de'i dbus su gnas par gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid can mi bskyod bar bdag nyid bsgoms pa ste /
translated: and in its center, one should meditate on oneself as the nature of non-dual knowledge, as Akṣobhya.

original: lag tu rdo rje zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: lag tu rdo rje zhes bya ba ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The vajra in the hand, etc.

original: de bzhin du nam mkha'i dbyings la rin po che bsams la /🔽de'i dbus su gnas par rin chen rdo rje ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du nam mkha'i dbyings la rin po che bsams la / de'i dbus su gnas par rin chen rdo rje ste /
translated: Similarly, one should meditate on the jewel in the sky-realm,

original: rin chen 'byung ldan du bdag nyid bsgom mo //
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan du bdag nyid bsgom mo //
translated: and in its center, one should meditate on oneself as Ratnasaṃbhava, as Ratna-vajra.

original: lag tu rin chen zhes bya ba ni bshang zin to //
analyzed: lag tu rin chen zhes bya ba ni bshang zin to //
translated: The jewel in the hand, etc.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings la chos kyi dbyings te /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings la chos kyi dbyings te /
translated: In the sky-realm, one should meditate on the dharma-realm,

original: @90a * // padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams la /
analyzed: @90a * // padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams la /
translated: Visualize an eight-petaled lotus,

original: de'i dbus su gnas par tshe dpag tu med par bdag nyid rab tu bsgoms nas /
analyzed: de'i dbus su gnas par tshe dpag tu med par bdag nyid rab tu bsgoms nas /
translated: and in its center, abiding in the middle of the pledge wheel,

original: thams cad snga ma bzhin du bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad snga ma bzhin du bskyed par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate on oneself as Amitāyus, and generate everything as before.

original: nam mkha'i dbyings la dam tshig gi dbus su gnas pa ste /
analyzed: nam mkha'i dbyings la dam tshig gi dbus su gnas pa ste /
translated: In the realm of space, in the middle of the pledge wheel,

original: sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas par ro //
analyzed: sna tshogs rdo rje la gnas par ro //
translated: abiding in the center of a variegated vajra.

original: gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
analyzed: gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i don ni bshad zin to //
translated: The meaning of “unfailing” and so forth has been explained.

original: de ltar 'khor lo la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams sgrub pa bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar 'khor lo la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams sgrub pa bshad nas /
translated: Having explained the accomplishment of the signs of the wheel and so forth,

original: gzhan yang khro bo'i rgyal po'i mtshan ma la sogs pa dag kyang bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: gzhan yang khro bo'i rgyal po'i mtshan ma la sogs pa dag kyang bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: in order to demonstrate that one should also accomplish the signs of the kings of wrath and so forth,

original: rtse gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
analyzed: rtse gsum zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos pa yin te /
translated: [the Bhagavān] declares the three-pronged and so forth.

original: rdo rje'i khyad par gyis bsgrubs na //
analyzed: rdo rje'i khyad par gyis bsgrubs na //
translated: Having accomplished the vajra distinctions,

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: means

original: mi bskyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgrub pa ste /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bsgrub pa ste /
translated: accomplishment by means of the Akṣobhya meditative absorption.

original: mi bskyod pa'i bsam gtan des ni tri sh'u la la sogs pa 'di dag 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i bsam gtan des ni tri sh'u la la sogs pa 'di dag 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: By that meditation of Akṣhobhya, these, the trident, etc., are accomplished.

original: gang gis bsgrub ce na /
analyzed: gang gis bsgrub ce na /
translated: By what is it accomplished?

original: sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa yis //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /🔽sku gsung thugs ni gang tha mal pa'i dngos po spangs nas /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa yis // zhes bya ba gsungs te / sku gsung thugs ni gang tha mal pa'i dngos po spangs nas /
translated: By the accomplishment of body, speech, and mind.

original: phul du byung ba'i dngos por sgrub par nus pa de ni /
analyzed: phul du byung ba'i dngos por sgrub par nus pa de ni /
translated: The body, speech, and mind are that which is able to abandon ordinary things and accomplish excellent things.

original: sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa ste /
analyzed: sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub pa ste /
translated: That is the accomplishment of body, speech, and mind.

original: des 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no //
analyzed: des 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no //
translated: By that, it is accomplished, not by others.

original: dam tshig chen po ni theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: dam tshig chen po ni theg pa chen po'o //
translated: The great commitment is the Great Vehicle.

original: de'i dngos grub ni bshad ma thag pas te /
analyzed: de'i dngos grub ni bshad ma thag pas te /
translated: Its accomplishment is just explained.

original: de ston pa'i rdo rje ni dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub rdo rje'o //
analyzed: de ston pa'i rdo rje ni dam tshig chen po'i dngos grub rdo rje'o //
translated: The vajra that teaches that is the vajra of the great commitment’s accomplishment.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal to zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Thus he spoke.

original: rab tu byed pa nye bar sdud pa'o //
analyzed: rab tu byed pa nye bar sdud pa'o //
translated: This is the summary of the chapter.

original: dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos grub sgrub pa'i thabs bstan par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the method of accomplishing the powers,

original: lam gyi bzhi mdo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
analyzed: lam gyi bzhi mdo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
translated: he says, in the crossroads charnel grounds, etc.

original: bram ze'i rigs la sogs pa las byung ba'i phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi dang ngam /
analyzed: bram ze'i rigs la sogs pa las byung ba'i phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi dang ngam /
translated: The four types of consorts who come from the brahmin class and so forth.

original: yang na shing gcig drung ste gcig bu nyid dang ngo //
analyzed: yang na shing gcig drung ste gcig bu nyid dang ngo //
translated: Or else, the solitary tree is the single one.

original: mtshan ma gcig ces pa ni rab tu mnyam pa'i cha lugs 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma gcig ces pa ni rab tu mnyam pa'i cha lugs 'dzin pa'o //
translated: The single sign is to maintain a very even appearance.

original: zhi ba'i gnas ni gdol pa la sogs pa'i bud med rnams te /
analyzed: zhi ba'i gnas ni gdol pa la sogs pa'i bud med rnams te /
translated: The peaceful place is the women of the candala and so forth.
